Text_English: <span color="ffffff">The Light of Luemos</>
Text_Korean: 0<span color="ffffff">盧莫斯光柱</>

Text_English:
What brings you here, stranger? Are you here because of the light?
Hmm, the light appeared in Luemos, not in Elysium, /page just when Remiel left to the Forest of Fairies.
Will you take a look? /page The city has been quiet for some time.
I will join you as I was going to go there anyway.
Text_Korean:
你是通過磨難的人。你有沒有照著啟示來到光柱面前？
但光柱並沒有出現在極樂世界，而是出現在魯莫斯城。 /page 這是拉米爾大人前往仙女森林時發生的一件奇怪的事情。
每個人都感到困惑。 /page 而且，像 Ruemos 現在被封鎖了，人們和新聞都被切斷了。
所以我正要檢查Ruemos的情況，所以我們一起去。

Text_English:
Luemos is in danger. We must find Lord Alfrid.
Gote must be with him, but we should hurry. /page We should be careful of the demons.
Let's look for clues first.
Text_Korean:
Ruemos有危險，所以我們需要找到阿爾弗雷德勳爵。
我身邊有副官戈特，但情況緊急，我們必須抓緊時間。 /page 但是惡魔已經控制住了，所以出去很危險。
讓我們從尋找線索開始。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 1-1</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Investigate the City!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 1-1</> /div<span color="#ffffff">查看市內情況！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">The Missing Lord</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">領主失踪</>

Text_English:
I see you have unusual powers.
Defeating the sword captain, that's impressive. /page Speaking of which, would you help finding Lord Alfrid?
I need someone like you right now.
Text_Korean:
的確，那些通過磨難的人擁有非凡的力量。
擊敗黑暗骷髏騎士指揮官真是太棒了。 /page 那麼請你幫我找到阿爾弗雷德大人嗎？
我知道這是一個不合理的要求，但現在我需要一個像你這樣的人才。

Text_English:
Rachel can summon demons and control humans.
She's one of the most annoying demon I've ever met. /page It must be Rachel that turned Luemos into a demon's lair.
But how did she appear in the first place?
Text_Korean:
黑暗女士雷切爾擁有召喚惡魔和控制人類的能力。
在我遇到的所有惡魔中，他是困擾人心的惡魔。 /page Rachel 一定是利用她的力量將 Ruemos 變成了一個邪惡的巢穴。
但是這樣的惡魔是如何出現在魯莫斯的呢？

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 1-2</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Look for Lord Alfrid!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 1-2</> /div<span color="#ffffff">尋找領主下落的線索！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">A Dangerous Competition</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">危險的競爭</>

Text_English:
Chased by a dangerous demon like Rachel,
Lord Alfrid must be in some sort of trouble. /page No matter what,
we must find Alfrid and Gote before Rachel.
Text_Korean:
好像是暗黑反派蕾切爾這樣的危險惡魔正在尋找阿爾弗雷德大人。 /page 我不確定這有多危險，但有一件事是肯定的。
我們必須在瑞秋之前找到阿爾弗雷德和哥特。

Text_English:
It seems that Gote doesn't know what Alfrid found,
but it must be important because Rachel is chasing after him.
Text_Korean:
看來戈特連阿爾弗雷德大人發現的秘密都不知道。
但是，如果您查看 Rachel 所追求的，這似乎是非常重要的信息。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 1-3</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Find Out What Rachel Seeks!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 1-3</> /div<span color="#ffffff">在瑞秋之前找到線索！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Crisis in the City</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">孤城危機</>

Text_English:
It looks like the entire city is under the control of the demons.
Nothing is getting out including us. /page Something important is hiding in the shadows.
It's good that we found Gote, but I'm worried about Lord Alfrid. /page Only Alfrid would know what's going on.
We must hurry.
Text_Korean:
看來魯莫斯已經落入惡魔之手了。
這些惡魔正在將這座城市四分五裂，就好像他們在隱藏什麼重要的事情一樣。 /page幸運的是，我遇到了哥特，但我必須找到阿爾弗雷德。
他是唯一一個知道佔領這座城市的黑暗秘密的人。

Text_English:
Rachel took Gote. This is not good.
She will not let him go easy. /page Gote will be swallowed by evil… We must save him before it's too late.
There's no time. Let's go after Rachel!
Text_Korean:
很遺憾，哥特被瑞秋俘虜了。
我認識的瑞秋不會獨自離開哥特。 /page 我會使用那可怕的力量... .你必須在那之前保存它。
現在不是追雷切爾的時候！

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 1-4</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Demons in the City!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 1-4</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗佔領城市的惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Saving Gote</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">哥特中尉救援</>

Text_English:
Rachel went to the central square.
Get ready. We will be able to catch her soon. /page I hope nothing bad would happen,
but that demon will surely not agree. /page Watch out for traps, and always be careful.
Text_Korean:
黑暗女士雷切爾一定是去了主廣場。
如果你追得快，你可以趕上，但你需要在這之前做好準備。 /page
我希望它不會像我之前與瑞秋戰鬥時那樣發生，但惡魔不會按照我們的意願行事。 /page 並且可能會有一些陷阱，所以請小心。

Text_English:
Gote is gone… This is a sad day…
Remember, he did not die in vain. /page This is not new for Rachel.
In fact, she enjoyed making friends and allies fight against each other.
Text_Korean:
哥特死了……我已經做好了準備，但親眼看到它......
我的心好痛...但哥特不會怨恨。不要責怪自己。 /page 雷切爾過去常常讓她的盟友用劍指著對方。
我很高興看到它。我不能容忍那個該死的惡魔。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 1-5</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Chase Rachel!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 1-5</> /div<span color="#ffffff">關注瑞秋！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Search for Rachel</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">黑暗女神瑞秋的下落</>

Text_English:
Rachel said that she was looking for Alfrid.
We cannot lose him. /page We should track her down.
It will give us more clues as well as a chance to avenge Gote's death.
Text_Korean:
蕾切爾說她一定會去找阿爾弗雷德大人。
即使是主，我也不能失去。 /page 先追踪瑞秋怎麼樣？
我相信會有機會找到線索並為哥特報仇。

Text_English:
I wonder who that is. But we don't have time.
Let's head to the place it told us. I hope Lord Alfrid is there.
Text_Korean:
我想知道歡迎是什麼。但我沒有時間做這個。
讓我們朝著煥英指出的方向前進。我希望阿爾弗雷德大人會在這裡。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 1-6</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Find Rachel and Look for Clues!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 1-6</> /div<span color="#ffffff">跟隨瑞秋尋找線索</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">A Troublesome Journey</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">不容易的旅程</>

Text_English:
Be prepared for we do not know what lies ahead.
It won't be easy if we keep bumping into demons like Silvermane. /page But with you, we will be able to find Alfrid.
You are growing stronger. Save Luemos, my friend.
Text_Korean:
準備好你的思想，就像你走在一條不確定的道路上一樣。
要看到像銀鬃這樣越來越強大的惡魔並不容易。 /page 但是有了你，我想我們可以找到阿爾弗雷德。
你變得越來越強壯。請成為魯莫斯的希望。

Text_English:
Rachel doesn't know where Alfrid is.
Still, I am more angry than relieved. /page How dare she mocks us. This is unacceptable.
Text_Korean:
蕾切爾顯然還沒有找到阿爾弗雷德大人。
一方面，更多的是憤怒而不是寬慰。 /page 為了取笑哥特和我們，我認為我們不能就這樣離開它。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 1-7</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Break Through!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 1-7</> /div<span color="#ffffff">突破幻象指示的路徑！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gote's Revenge</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">為哥特復仇</>

Text_English:
Thankfully, it seems that the demons are unable to capture Lord Alfrid.
That's probably because he knows the area well. /page Use this opportunity to fulfill
Gote's dying wish. /page I want revenge.
Let's start by making it happen.
Text_Korean:
幸運的是，阿爾弗雷德似乎在躲避惡魔方面做得很好。
這可能要歸功於您的地理知​​識。 /page利用阿爾弗雷德的掙扎和雷切爾的疏忽創造的機會來保持
哥特的意志。 /page 我要報復瑞秋。
讓我們創造一個複仇的機會。

Text_English:
Rachel wasn't the only one going after Lord Alfrid!
Caligula was also behind this... /page What unspeakable treachery!
He was a faithful servant of Luemos!
Text_Korean:
我分心了！雷切爾曼不是針對阿爾弗雷德大人！
有卡里古拉... . /page Ruemos 的老僕人試圖殺死 Alfred
我不能原諒你！

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 1-8</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Track Down Rachel!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 1-8</> /div<span color="#ffffff">跟隨黑暗女士瑞秋！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Saving Lord Alfrid</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">領主救援</>

Text_English:
There are whispers about Caligula
controlling demon hounds and dark magic. /page We should have known sooner about his treachery...
Great job on taking care of Rachel. Gote must be grateful as well. /page Nonetheless, her last words were unnerving. She must have known something.
Hurry! We must save the lord.
Text_Korean:
此後謠言四起，卡利古拉是地獄的看門狗，痴迷於黑暗的力量。 /page 就算他的魔法知識太浪費了，他也應該把他踢出去…… .
懲罰瑞秋真是太好了。哥特人也必須心存感激。 /page 但雷切爾的話在我腦海中。他似乎知道了什麼。
快點找到主。

Text_English:
Caligula, you've become a demon!
He's been long gone... /page I feel sorry for Lord Alfrid and Gote.
We must defeat this evil.
Text_Korean:
卡利古拉，你變成了惡魔！
您不能將卡里古拉視為人類。 /page我為阿爾弗雷德大人和哥特感到難過。
我要報仇。幫我

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 1-9</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Find Lord Alfrid!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 1-9</> /div<span color="#ffffff">找到阿爾弗雷德勳爵！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">End of Darkness</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">擁抱黑暗的人的終結</>

Text_English:
We must find out what Caligula seeks,
and we must bring him to justice. /page The final battle is near. But be careful.
He could have powerful allies behind.
Text_Korean:
卡利古拉肯定有一些秘密和目的。
我們必須懲罰卡利古拉，阻止它，並進行報復。 /page 現在攤牌仍然存在。而如果卡利古拉足以犧牲這座城市，他說不定會和一個大惡魔聯手，所以要小心。

Text_English:
Remarkable. You defeated Caligula!
Saving Remiel also proves that you are the chosen one... /page I thought Remiel went to the Forest of Fairies,
but she was held captive all along... /page Speak with Remiel, my friend. There's much more behind this.
Text_Korean:
你做的非常出色。你殺死了卡利古拉並報了仇！
你顯然是一個預言人物，甚至拯救了拉米爾大人。 /page 但是，前往仙女森林的拉米爾被抓住了
他經歷了多麼可怕的事情...... /page 拉米爾想談談。讓我們談談。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 1-10</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat Caligula!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 1-10</> /div<span color="#ffffff">懲罰卡里古拉！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Remiel's Plan</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">拉米爾的計劃</>

Text_English:
Guide of Light. I am truly indebted to you. Thank you.
Please let me tell you my story. /pageA century ago, I trapped the Absolute Darkness inside me to protect its seal.
I have used the power of my light to keep it suppressed. /pageHowever, with the birth of a new evil, the Absolute Darkness began to grow strong again.
I thus headed to the Forest of Fairies in order to acquire a massive life force.
Text_Korean:
光明使者，我一直深受你的寵愛。謝謝你。
我會告訴你我經歷了什麼。 /page百年前，我把自己鎖在裡面，以保持絕對黑暗的封印。
它被我的光之力量壓制了。 /page 但是隨著新邪惡的出現，絕對的黑暗開始變得更加強大。
所以我前往仙女森林以獲得巨大的生命力。

Text_English:
However, I sensed the power of darkness at Luemos,
where I met the Death Priests who gave Caligula his power. /pageI shot up a potent beam of the power of light to stop them.
However, the Absolute Darkness reacted to a certain force and began to shake inside me, as if trying to take over me. /pageI could not maintain my power of light, and was captured to my humiliation.
That power came from the Death Cleric’s gem that seemed to be stained in blood.
Text_Korean:
然而，他在魯莫斯感受到了黑暗的力量，在那裡他遇到了一群被稱為死亡祭司的人，他們賦予了卡里古拉力量。 /page 我射出一道像柱子一樣的強光來阻止他們。
但是，在某種力量的作用下，絕對的黑暗彷彿要統治我一般顫抖起來。 /page 我無法承受光的力量，遭受了被抓的屈辱。
那股力量是死亡大祭司所擁有的染血寶石的力量。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] Elysium</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Conversation with Remiel</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] Elysium</> /div<span color="#ffffff">與拉米爾的對話</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">To the Forest of Fairies</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">去仙林…… </>

Text_English:
Lilith is at Plitvice, the forest of fairies.
She is my only hope. /page But I felt darkness and corruption there.
Perhaps the death priests are heading that way. /page Pathfinder, we must protect the forest.
Text_Korean:
一旦有威脅的力量出現，我必須快點。
我的希望是莉莉絲，它創造了無限的生命力。 /page 但我在她所在的仙女森林中感受到了腐敗的氣息。
我必須畫出一片仙境，一座聖域，保護光明使者莉莉絲。

Text_English:
My hero, I am Bella, the keeper of the forest.
I shall help you find the fairies and Lilith.
Text_Korean:
導光，請多多關照。這是貝拉，森林的守護者。
我會幫助你找到仙女並前往莉莉絲。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 2-1</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Push Forward the Entrance!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 2-1</> /div<span color="#ffffff">突破森林入口！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Searching for the Fairies….</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">尋找森林精靈... .</>

Text_English:
I can communicate with the fairies of the forest.
That's why I am the keeper of the forest. /page When I sensed the corruption,
I was worried about the fairies. We should look for them. /page They were close to Lilith.
Finding them will help us finding Lilith as well.
Text_Korean:
當我發現妖精森林中的腐敗正在蔓延時，我想起了
精靈。先找仙女怎麼樣？ /page 那些朋友是一直在密切幫助莉莉絲的精靈。
這對尋找莉莉絲一定有很大幫助。

Text_English:
It's good that we found Nice. She wanted to take you
to Lilith anyway. /page She is relieved to know that the hero of the light
is looking for Lilith, /page but we don't know what Ghost is up to.
I am worried.
Text_Korean:
很高興認識你。事實上，尼斯看到了你的實力，並試圖將你帶到莉莉絲身邊，甚至通過欺騙你。 /page
得知你是光明使者並且你正在轉向莉莉絲，我鬆了一口氣。 /page 但我不知道幽靈在襲擊莉莉絲時可能做了什麼。
我擔心發布。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 2-2</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Find the Fairies and Move Forward!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 2-2</> /div<span color="#ffffff">找到森林精靈，繼續前進！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">The Flow of Corruption</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">保護和腐蝕之觸</>

Text_English:
Nice, Rio, and Pan are fairies that used to help Lilith.
They were also close friends to her. /page If they are separated, it may be dangerous.
Why don't we bring them to Lilith? /page She would want that, too.
Nice said that she knows where Rio is. Let's go find him.
Text_Korean:
Nice、Rio 和 Fang 是幫助莉莉絲身邊的仙女。
所以莉莉絲大人也很感激和珍惜朋友。 /page 但是這些朋友很分散，所以讓他們一個人呆著會很危險。
我們為什麼不去拜訪莉莉絲？ /page 也許莉莉絲也會喜歡。
Nice 知道 Rio 在哪裡，所以我們去找他吧。

Text_English:
Ghost wants to corrupt Lilith.
If Lilith succumbs to corruption, we will not be able to restore the forest. /page Ghost will not let us disrupt his plan.
He would want us dead.
Text_Korean:
我認為幽靈的目的是腐化莉莉絲。
如果莉莉絲屈服於腐敗的力量，就不可能拯救森林。 /page 鬼不會讓我們擋道。
當然，他們會嘗試擺脫它。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 2-3</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Protect the Fairies!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 2-3</> /div<span color="#ffffff">戰勝邪惡，保護仙女！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Dark Corruption</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">暗干涉</>

Text_English:
Lilith was once a powerful angel. She was able to resist the corruption,
but her imprisonment must have been a challenge. /page We must hurry.
Protect us from Ghost.
Text_Korean:
莉莉絲在過去是一個強大的天使。你一定是在用那種力量來反抗腐敗，但你一定是在封閉狀態下打了一場艱苦的戰鬥。 /page 所以，最重要的是，我們需要盡快到達莉莉絲。
請保護我們免受鬼魂的傷害。

Text_English:
There must be something important that Lilith wants us to know,
but Ghost is standing in between… /page The fairy's gateway is a portal leading to Lilith.
It closes when Lilith becomes weak. I am worried about her.
Text_Korean:
莉莉絲急忙出現，宣布了一個重要的事實。
但是一個幽靈出現了...... . /page仙女之門是通往莉莉絲的傳送門。關上門意味著
莉莉絲的力量減弱了。我很擔心莉莉絲。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 2-4</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Push Through the Darkness!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 2-4</> /div<span color="#ffffff">突破黑暗的阻礙！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Plan of Attack</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">中心突破</>

Text_English:
The gateway can only be opened by Nice, Rio, and Pan.
Finding all three of them will help us save Lilith. /page Be careful, we don't know what Ghost is up to.
Only you can protect the fairies. /page Only if we could defeat Ghost... Let's go find Rio and Pan.
Text_Korean:
關閉的仙門現在只有尼斯、里奧和方才能打開。
拯救莉莉絲的希望是找到所有三個。 /page 你不知道鬼會怎麼出來，所以要做好準備。
因為您是唯一可以保護仙女免受任何攻擊的人。 /page 我寧願擺脫鬼... .我們去找里奧和方。

Text_English:
You defeated Ghost.
This is great news. /page His last words were somewhat unnerving.
It sounded like a curse against our attempt to save Lilith. /page This will not end with the death of Ghost.
If Lilith is corrupted…
Text_Korean:
你在傳播腐敗的力量和擊敗威脅我們的幽靈方面做得很好。 /page 然而，Ghost 留下的那些可怕的話讓我很困擾。
這聽起來像是我們無法拯救莉莉絲的詛咒。 /page我有一種感覺，它不會以 Ghost 的死而告終。
如果莉莉絲大人真的陷入了腐敗之中…… .

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 2-5</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Break Through the Forest Core!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 2-5</> /div<span color="#ffffff">突破森林中心！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Searching for Rio</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">探索仙女里約</>

Text_English:
Remiel will be saddened to hear about Lilith,
which is more reason for us to protect Lilith. /page It seems that she is burdened by Lilith...
We will soon reach the woods mentioned by Nice. I hope we can find Rio. /page On the way, I'll tell you a good story.
Text_Korean:
拉米爾得知莉莉絲的危機後會非常難過。
我必須保護莉莉絲，即使是為了拉米爾大人。 /page 拉米爾似乎欠他的戰友莉莉絲一顆心。
這是尼斯所說的森林。我希望看到你和里約。 /page 在路上，讓我告訴你一個關於兩個人的故事。

Text_English:
I thought Ghost's death would make things better, but nothing really changed.
Why is the corruption becoming intense… Did the balance of power break? /page Perhaps darkness is spreading faster than we thought.
Text_Korean:
我曾一度夢想著幽靈的死有希望，但現實很殘酷。
腐敗的力量越來越強大...權力平衡是否失衡？ /page 腐敗侵蝕可能正在加速。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 2-6</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Find Rio and Move Forward!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 2-6</> /div<span color="#ffffff">找到里約並突破森林！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Rapid Change</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">森林突然變化</>

Text_English:
We must hurry and find Pan before it's too late.
Rio may be ostentatious, but he does not lie. /page This time, I want to believe him.
We have a long way to go, but I trust that you will do well. /page The fairies feel the same way.
Please help us find Pan.
Text_Korean:
在可怕的事情發生之前，趕快找到方並阻止它。
儘管 Rio 自命不凡且毫無歉意，但他並沒有撒謊。 /page 這次我想信任那個朋友。我還有很長的路要走。
但你不知道我有多依賴你。 /page 仙友也是一樣。
請保護我們，以便我們可以安全地見到龐。

Text_English:
The path was blocked because Lilith wanted us to be safe...
Safe from her corruption. /page Will Lilith fall?
Would she surrender to the darkness and attack us? /page I am scared.
It's a shame, but I even thought of going back when the path was blocked.
Text_Korean:
莉莉絲似乎擋住了保護我們的路。
來自將要墜落的自我。 /page 莉莉絲真的會這樣消失嗎？
我們會成為一個強大的敵人，在腐敗吞噬我們的同時攻擊我們嗎？ /page 我真的很害怕。
很尷尬，但我什至想過在路被阻塞的情況下回去。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 2-7</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Make Way toward Pan!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 2-7</> /div<span color="#ffffff">讓路去龐！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Overcome Your Fear</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">鼓起勇氣</>

Text_English:
Nice and Rio were different. They went ahead of me.
They were more worried than afraid about Lilith, /page but they are fairies, and they can be scared as well.
You inspired them to be courageous. /page Now, we can head to Lilith once we find Pan.
You must help us, Pathfinder.
Text_Korean:
尼斯和里約與我不同。我帶頭跑了。
他似乎更擔心莉莉絲而不是恐懼。 /page 其實那些朋友也是弱小仙女，應該是害怕了。
但是是你給了我勇氣。 /page 現在，如果你找到了芳，你就可以去莉莉絲。
讓我們勇敢，光明使者。

Text_English:
What a mystery. I never met a spirit, but it felt comfortable.
It's hard to tell, but it seemed like it wanted to help us. /page It's good to know there are others who want to help.
Yet, the words remain a riddle.
Text_Korean:
這很神秘。這是我第一次看到歡迎，但我感到很自在。
我不知道它是誰，但它似乎對我們有所幫助。 /page 有人幫助我們給了我們勇氣。
但幻覺的話是個謎。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 2-8</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Pass Through the Area!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 2-8</> /div<span color="#ffffff">通過該區域！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">The Rescue</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">仙女救援</>

Text_English:
I'm trying to be positive about what the spirit said.
It means that we will find what we seek. /page Now, we are near Pan's place.
Let's hope we can find him.
Text_Korean:
我認為歡迎是一件好事。
因為這意味著我們可以滿足我們正在尋找的東西。 /page 此外，我們到達了 Rio 確信 Pang 很快就會到的地方。
希望我們能見面。

Text_English:
Did the spirit mean we would be able to find Pan? I'm happy that we did.
But what Pan said worries me. /page It must be the voice of Lilith that Pan heard.
Such terrible words… /page I don't want to believe it, but Lilith may have indeed fallen to the darkness.
Text_Korean:
歡迎是指見到方嗎？我很高興找到方。
但我覺得方先生的話很可怕。 /page我認為莉莉絲是你聽到的聲音的主人。
你說了這麼可怕的話... . /page 我不敢相信，但莉莉絲可能最終屈服於腐敗。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 2-9</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Find Pan and Move Forward!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[主線] ACT 2-9</> /div<span color="#ffffff">找到龐仙子，安全突破！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Salvation</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">莉莉絲的救贖</>

Text_English:
I guess I have to tell Remiel about what happened here.
I promise, I will bring her here. /page Pathfinder, find Lilith with the fairies.
Help her. Help the forest.
Text_Korean:
我是唯一可以將這種情況通知拉米爾的人。
我會承擔責任，確保拉米爾大人能來這裡。 /page Lightbringer，帶你的仙女去莉莉絲。
請照顧莉莉絲大人和仙女森林。

Text_English:
Pathfinder, you did it.
You are indeed becoming stronger and stronger. /page Don't be sorry about Lilith's death.
Anyone would have made the same decision, /page myself included…
Perhaps I was avoiding what was inevitable.
Text_Korean:
光明使者，你做得很好。
你似乎越來越強壯了。 /page 版本的消亡……你不必感到抱歉。
任何人都別無選擇，只能做出這樣的選擇。 /page 也許是我…… .
我不知道我是否一直在拖延你。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 2-10</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Restore the Forest!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 2-10</> /div<span color="#ffffff">重溫童話森林！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Remiel's Rest</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">拉米爾需要休息</>

Text_English:
You gave eternal peace to Lilith,
and her light of hope restored the forest. /page But it saddens me to lose a good old friend.
It is indeed tragic.
Text_Korean:
你給了莉莉絲永恆的和平。
莉莉絲留下的希望之光使仙女森林復活。 /page 但是再次失去一個老朋友是痛苦的。
當這樣的事情一遍又一遍地發生時，我感到很痛苦。

Text_English:
It would be a disaster if Azrael hears about Lilith's death…
But that won't happen... Oh, don't worry, I was just talking to myself. /page Pathfinder, I'm sorry but I must rest for now.
If I don't, the darkness inside me may grow stronger. /page Go talk to Gratia.
He will tell you more about the darkness that threatens us.
Text_Korean:
如果阿茲莉爾知道莉莉絲的死訊，那將是一件大事……
這不會發生... .我在自言自語。沒關係。 /page Lightbringer，對不起，我需要休息一下。
如果我不下定決心，我內心的黑暗就會蠕動。 /page 和 Grazia 見面。
他發現了一個威脅我們的黑暗運動。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] Elysium</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Conversation with Remiel</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] Elysium</> /div<span color="#ffffff">與拉米爾的對話</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">The Death Priest</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">死亡牧師的陰謀</>

Text_English:
Pathfinder! The great wizard has sensed danger.
Ah, the great wizard refers to me of course. /page Anyway, I tracked down the death priest that has been threatening Remiel.
It is currently at the ancient tombs. /page You must head there, Pathfinder.
Don't worry, my magic will be helping you.
Text_Korean:
光導！這位偉大的巫師發現了一些危險的東西。
哦，當然，這具神奇力量的身體是一個偉大的巫師。 /page 嗯嗯，總之，我發現了一個對拉米爾有威脅的死亡牧師。
在古代英雄的墳墓中。 /page 你不應該作為光導移動嗎？
別擔心，我會用一種能感知黑暗力量的魔法來幫助你。

Text_English:
A great darkness has taken control of the ancient tombs.
It's too strong for me. My magic can't overcome it. /page This has to be related to the death priest.
We must hurry before something terrible happens.
Text_Korean:
一股強大的黑暗力量統治著古代英雄的墳墓。
它是如此強大，以至於我的魔法幾乎無法使用。 /page 一定是死亡祭司闖入了墳墓。
我確定他正在策劃一些不尋常的事情，所以我們需要盡快找到它。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 3-1</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Search the Area!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 3-1</> /div<span color="#ffffff">探索該地區！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Tracking in the Tombs</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">在墳墓裡追逐</>

Text_English:
The Catacomb is basically a giant maze.
It was built as such as a protection against the demons. /page It will be difficult to track anything.
Ironically, this puts us at a disadvantage, but I believe that you will prevail. /page You can trust the words of the great wizard Gratia.
After all, you are a pathfinder, no? /page Sorry! That was a joke. Just please be safe.
Text_Korean:
古代英雄的墳墓很複雜，很難找到死亡牧師。
因為它就像迷宮一樣，是為了保護一百年前封印的高級惡魔。 /page 但你會成功的。你可以相信這個格拉齊亞所說的。
如果您是光明的嚮導，您將能夠找到隱藏在黑暗中的人。

Text_English:
A zombie that is not taken by the darkness?
This is truly a mystery. It even knows the way! /page I guess what I sensed was this zombie warrior.
It was weird, but not evil. /page If it really saw the death priest, it may help us indeed.
Text_Korean:
有一個人，跟死屍一樣，不死也知道通往墳墓的路！
我感覺到能量的第一個擁有者是殭屍戰士。 /page 是的，這很奇怪，但它並不邪惡。
他看到了死亡祭司...我認為這會有所幫助。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 3-2</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Find the Path!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 3-2</> /div<span color="#ffffff">找到通往墳墓的路！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Darkness Behind</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">墳墓的力量</>

Text_English:
What was I thinking?
The zombies in the tombs are under some kind of spell. /page I mean, something created them...
A very powerful and dark being. /page I think the death priest and that being are related.
We must hurry. I will investigate further about the zombie warrior.
Text_Korean:
哇，出現在古代英雄墳墓裡的喪屍，好像是有人造出來的。
這就是黑暗力量的強大。 /page死亡牧師的目的似乎與它的主人有關。
我必須快點。我也會了解殭屍戰士的。

Text_English:
Beelzebub! So I see. For such a powerful demon,
creating a zombie army is no big deal at all. /page It was Beelzebub all along.
Pathfinder, the darkness is rising. /page It is becoming clear through Beelzebub.
If it breaks the seal, we will be in grave danger.
Text_Korean:
貝爾澤布布拉尼！覆蓋墳墓的黑暗實體一定是Belzebub。
一個被封印的惡魔正在製造殭屍並移動，這是一件大事。 /page 越來越大的黑暗意味著Belz​​ebub變得越來越強大。
此外，如果他真的想打破封印，那就是緊急情況。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 3-3</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Investigate the Darkness!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 3-3</> /div<span color="#ffffff">尋找黑暗現實的線索！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Beelzebub and the Death Priest</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">貝爾西卜和死亡牧師</>

Text_English:
Beelzebub is a powerful demon that once fought against Remiel.
Do not be fooled by its cunning words. /page If the death priest sets it loose, we are going to be in trouble.
Even I cannot handle that. We must stop that from happening. /page And that zombie warrior... We shouldn't trust it too much.
We don't know what it is or what it wants.
Text_Korean:
Belzebub是一個強大的惡魔，他反對像Ramiel-sama這樣的天使。
如果你被他的話所欺騙並看不起它，那是永遠不會好的。 /page 如果死亡牧師可以釋放他，那將是一件大事。
我什至無法處理這個偉大的巫師。必須停止請。 /page 和殭屍戰士。我寧願不要太相信。
他是一個身份和意圖未知的人。

Text_English:
You stood up against Beelzebub.
Not many can do that, especially after listening to its cunning words. /page Poisoneye is one of Beelzebub's creations.
It ignored you to chase the zombie warrior... /page Did it steal something from Beelzebub?
Hmm... I am curious.
Text_Korean:
永科別西卜的話，你並沒有動搖。
任何聽他的人都會保持警惕。 /pageThe Venom Watcher 是由 Belzebub 創造的頑強而強大的怪物。
但是無視你並追逐殭屍戰士...... /page殭屍戰士偷走了Belzebub的寶藏嗎？
嗯...我真的很好奇你為什麼要擺脫他。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 3-4</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Demons!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 3-4</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗Belzebub的惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Protect the Zombie Warrior</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">保護殭屍戰士</>

Text_English:
This is puzzling, even for the great wizard.
Is it because that zombie is not under Beelzebub's control? /page And we must not forget that the death priest is still hiding.
What does it want? Why isn't it in touch with Beelzebub? /page It doesn't feel right, but we should protect the zombie warrior from Beelzebub.
It will prove useful as we still need to find the death priest.
Text_Korean:
另一個令人不安的因素是死亡牧師沉默不語。
如果您還沒有聯繫 Belzebub，您的目標是什麼？ . /page 我討厭它，但我想保護殭屍戰士免受 Belzebub 的傷害。
我還沒有找到死亡牧師，所以他值得使用。

Text_English:
Hmm… We are late.
I should have kept my suspicion. /page We wasted time when no one knows what the death priest is up to!
Even now, it must be doing something evil… /page At least we defeated Poisoneye. Kudos to you.
Thanks to your heroic actions, Beelzebub lost an eye today.
Text_Korean:
欺騙我們！我應該一直懷疑他，但這是身體的錯。
無法找到死亡祭司，而Belzebub正在變得越來越強大，但這很重要。 /page如果你有收入，你已經擊敗了毒液觀察者。你做的非常出色。
這是因為你丟掉了Belzebub最累贅的眼睛。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 3-5</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat Poisoneye!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 3-5</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗毒液觀察者！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Against Beelzebub</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">別西卜出版社</>

Text_English:
The zombie warrior said that Beelzebub, the high demon lord,
is trying to break the seal and free itself from imprisonment. /page That would be a catastrophe. We must prevent it from happening.
Without Poisoneye, Beelzebub will feel some pressure. /page Now is our chance. We must defeat the demons and stop their plan.
Keep going, Pathfinder.
Text_Korean:
如果毒液觀察者消失了，貝爾西卜也將成為負擔。
它可能已經放慢了打破密封的速度。讓我們暫時把殭屍戰士放在一邊。 /page 現在是你的機會。我們必須打敗惡魔並停止他們的活動。
更前進，光導。

Text_English:
We lost the death priest.
It seemed like it was waiting for us. That doesn't feel right.
Text_Korean:
可惜沒能抓到剛剛發現失踪的死亡神官。
但它看起來像是在等我們。這很尷尬。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 3-6</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat Beelzebub's Minions!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 3-6</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗貝爾西布的爪牙！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">The Seal</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">密封保護</>

Text_English:
It seems like the death priest and Beelzebub
did not meet yet. Perhaps they cannot break the seal. /page This is good for us. We can still protect the seal that holds Beelzebub.
Oh, and make sure to teach that zombie warrior a lesson. /page It duped us and let the great wizard down.
I am still curious who it is, but it needs a good punch first!
Text_Korean:
隨著封印的維持，死亡祭司和貝爾西卜似乎還沒有接觸。難道他們別無選擇，只能封印？ /page 我們還有時間，所以我們可以保留保存貝爾西卜的印章。
如果你正在尋找一個殭屍戰士，你必須付出你的靈魂。 /page 欺騙我們並使這位大法師失望的人。
我對他非常非常好奇...把你的靈魂給我！

Text_English:
Can we trust the zombie warrior? What about that spirit?
Saint Lady Miracle… I've never heard of her… /page It's hard to believe, even if it was helping you all along.
Trusting them with Remiel... This is risky. /page But you already made up your mind.
Fine. I will let this one pass.
Text_Korean:
你能相信殭屍戰士嗎？這個願景值得相信嗎？
即使我幫助了你，如果涉及到拉米爾大人，你也必須小心。 /page 但是你的眼睛已經做出了決定。
好的，我會輸給你一次。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 3-7</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Demons!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 3-7</> /div<span color="#ffffff">打敗惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Path to Avila</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">通往靈魂城堡的道路</>

Text_English:
All roads to Avila have been blocked or destroyed.
Passing through the ancient tombs is the only way. /page The zombie warrior would know a safe passage.
It seems like destiny led you here. /page Or did the death priest lure us?
In any case, let's follow the zombie warrior.
Text_Korean:
事實上，通往靈魂城堡的所有道路現在都被封鎖或消失了。
古代英雄的墳墓是通往靈魂城堡的唯一途徑。 /page 也許殭屍戰士知道穿過墓地的路。
我不敢相信，你來到這裡就像命運一樣。 /page 突然毛骨悚然。我希望死亡牧師能把我引到墳墓裡…… ?
我最好跟著殭屍戰士穿過墳墓，別想別的。

Text_English:
It may be difficult to pass this area.
Something is hidden here. /page If the zombie warrior regains its strength and memory,
it is doubtful that it could do what it claims. /page But you are going to help, anyway.
Then I, Gratia, will also follow you, Pathfinder.
Text_Korean:
從貝爾西卜的態度來看，他不能輕易通過墳墓似乎是有原因的。
我想知道一個殭屍戰士是否能夠通過墳墓，即使他找到了力量和記憶。 /page 但是你相信一個聖人的願景，所以你想幫助他。
那麼，即使是這個 Grazia 也會相信你的決定。光導

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 3-8</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Clear the Area!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 3-8</> /div<span color="#ffffff">通過該區域！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Memories of the Fallen</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">奪回殭屍戰士的記憶</>

Text_English:
I trust your faith. Thus, I will follow your decisions.
I will help the zombie warrior retrieve its strength and memory. /page But be careful.
The death priest is lurking around the ancient tombs.
Text_Korean:
你的信念不會動搖，所以這位大法師會跟隨你。
幫助您找到殭屍戰士的力量和記憶。 /page 只需要注意一件事。
隱形，但死亡祭司在古代英雄的墳墓中。

Text_English:
The zombie warrior was Gregor, the great hero!
It makes sense why Beelzebub was after him… /page Your faith did not betray you. I am impressed.
We can trust Gregor. I must let Remiel know as well.
Text_Korean:
殭屍戰士是偉大的英雄格雷戈爾！你犯了一個大錯誤。
那麼可以理解，Belzebub 的目標是殭屍戰士…… . /page 你的信念也是有根據的。也佩服這位大法師。
您可以信任格雷戈爾。我必須把這個事實告訴拉米爾。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 3-9</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Retrieve the Memories of the Fallen!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 3-9</> /div<span color="#ffffff">尋找殭屍戰士的記憶！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gratia's Remorse</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">格拉齊亞的倒影</>

Text_English:
I guess I was focusing too much on theory.
Indeed, I unearthed much knowledge about the high demon lords. /page I thought the knowledge could enable me to actually counter the darkness,
but I missed something important.
Text_Korean:
仔細想想，我好像一直在為理論做研究。
我從研究高等惡魔的詛咒和折磨中學到了很多東西。 /page 我試圖用它找到詛咒的防禦和治療，我很自信。
但我沒有看到任何重要的東西。

Text_English:
Not being able to understand the zombie warrior,
that it was actually Lord Gregor, weakened by Beelzebub, is my burden. /page My theories were just theories.
From now on, I will concentrate on practice as well.
I must talk to Remiel and ask for her forgiveness.
Text_Korean:
原因是他沒有註意到格里高爾，格里高爾失去了力量和記憶，在貝爾西卜的詛咒下成為了
殭屍戰士。 /page 我研究的理論和他是一致的，但我從來沒有想過應用它。
我計劃在未來面對所有的研究。
我得帶拉米爾大人道歉。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] Elysium</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Conversation with Gratia</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] 極樂世界</> /div<span color="#ffffff">與格拉齊亞交談</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">To the Soul Fortress…</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">走向靈魂的城堡…… </>

Text_English:
Gregor was alive! It was told that he died
to defeat Beelzebub and imprison him under the seal. /page He became an undead because of Beelzebub's curse,
yet he was faithful to his mission. /page I will meet him and pass through the tombs.
Then, I shall head to Avila, the Soul Fortress.
Text_Korean:
格雷戈爾還活著！眾所周知，他顯然死了，他盡其所能封印了別西卜。 /pageBeelzebub的詛咒，失去一切，成為不朽的存在……
儘管如此，他還是試圖用自己的本能來尋找自己的記憶，以保持封印。 /page 我還將見到格雷戈爾並穿過古代英雄的墳墓
前往靈魂城堡。

Text_English:
Remiel is stable. Dammit! The death priest tricked us.
It was waiting for us to unlock the seal to absorb Beelzebub! /page It must be gathering the power of darkness to this blood diamond!
Gregor must be alive. There's no sign of his body. /page But Remiel is getting worse.
We must hurry and head to the Soul Fortress.
Text_Korean:
拉米爾大人幾乎沒有冷靜下來。該死！我被死亡牧師欺騙了。
等待我們解封然後吸收Belzebub！ /pageBlood 鑽石一定是在聚集黑暗的力量！
格雷戈爾的屍體還沒有找到，所以他一定還活著。 /page 但是，拉米爾大人的情況越來越糟了。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 3-10</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat Beelzebub!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 3-10</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗Belzebub！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Remiel's Concern</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">拉米爾的焦慮</>

Text_English:
Every time I face him, I fear that I am losing a bit of myself.
Beelzebub called that gem the Blood Diamond. /pageThat power has made the Absolute Darkness inside me move again.
It moved so violently, as if trying to break through the barrier of my being around it.
Text_Korean:
恐怕每次和他打交道，我都覺得自己越來越失去自我。
Beelzebub 稱他的珠寶為血鑽。 /page 這一次，我內心的絕對黑暗隨著那種力量而移動。
就像我要打破柵欄一樣強烈地打電話給我。

Text_English:
The Death Cleric absorbed Beelzebub with the Blood Diamond.
That is when the power of darkness I could sense from the Blood Diamond grew even stronger. /pageThey must be conspiring something as they augment their power of darkness, going as far as absorbing a demon.
We must be wary of that conspiracy. /pageEver since all paths to the Soul Fortress has been cut off, we have been unable to reach it.
I fear that the Death Cleric has already gotten his way with them.
Text_Korean:
死亡大祭司用血鑽吸收了Belzebub。
那個時候，血鑽所感受到的黑暗之力越來越大。 /page這絕對是一個陰謀，讓黑暗的力量成長，直到它吸收惡魔。
我們必須留意情節是什麼。 /page由於通往靈魂城堡的所有道路都被切斷了，我一直無法交流。
與此同時，我擔心大祭司的手可能已經被觸動了。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] Elysium</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Conversation with Remiel</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] 極樂世界</> /div<span color="#ffffff">與拉米爾交談</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">The Fall of Avila</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">被佔領的靈魂城堡</>

Text_English:
I am not certain of what power Miracle holds, she is a source of great hope in this situation.
I will meet her. The Saint of Soul Fortress would not have lied. /pageThe power of the Death Cleric, the deaths of my friends whom I depended on,
and the Absolute Darkness inside me that grows less controllable each time... None of these things bode well. /pageAs I gather the power of light, Saint Lady Arin will work with you.
Hurry. Darkness approaches like the unseen tide.
Text_Korean:
我不知道Miracle有什麼樣的力量，但在目前的情況下，它給了我很大的希望。
我想見見她。靈魂聖者不會說謊。 /page死亡大祭司的力量，我深信不疑的朋友的死亡，
我內心的絕對黑暗越來越難以製服......事情進展不順利。 /page 當我收集光的力量時，女神阿琳會與你同在。
快點。黑暗如潮水般從看不見的地方湧來。

Text_English:
The fall of Avila is a tragedy.
I always looked up to that place… I should have known sooner. /page Losing its old form saddens me.
We must investigate what happened.
Text_Korean:
靈魂的城堡被惡魔踐踏，真是太可悲了。
這是我嚮往的地方...我很抱歉我沒有早點找到它。 /page 最重要的是，令人心碎的是，聖地失去了昔日的面貌。

即使是為了聖地的恢復，也必須檢查靈魂的尖叫聲。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 4-1</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Search the Area!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 4-1</> /div<span color="#ffffff">探索該地區！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Screaming Souls</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">靈魂的吶喊</>

Text_English:
Avila is where the souls of the world gather.
It protects them and helps them move on to the afterlife. /page But that is no longer the case since the invasion.
Perhaps the souls are screaming precisely because of the demons. /page If we help them, they may help us find Miracle.
Text_Korean:
靈魂城堡是世界上所有靈魂聚集的地方。
這是為了保護和淨化聚集的靈魂，使他們能夠升天。 /page 但是這個角色一定是被入侵城堡的黑暗勢力癱瘓了。
靈魂的尖叫聲可能是入侵者造成的。 /page如果我們幫助靈魂，我們將幫助他們找到奇蹟。

Text_English:
Miracle was captured by the demons, but there is still hope.
We have Bertha, and they still need Miracle alive. /page They won't harm her until the ritual.
If we can stop the ritual, we may be able to save her. /page I am worried.
What are they trying to achieve?
Text_Korean:
奇蹟大人被黑暗勢力俘虜了…… .但有希望。
會見伯塔大人，他們需要奇蹟大人。 /page 他們可能不會在儀式之前傷害 Miracle。
所以我們必須停止儀式以爭取時間找到奇蹟大人。 /page 然而，黑暗勢力正在準備的儀式讓我感到不安。
你打算做什麼可怕的事情？

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 4-2</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Find the Clue and Push Through!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 4-2</> /div<span color="#ffffff">尋找尖叫的線索並前進！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Soul Harvest</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">靈魂狩獵停止</>

Text_English:
If the soul harvest by the goblin is for the ritual, then this is not good.
Any ritual or magic using souls are forbidden. /page We must first find the goblin magician.
We need to stop its harvest and free the spirits.
Text_Korean:
如果是為了儀式目的，地精薩滿的靈魂狩獵是非常危險的。
因為使用靈魂的儀式和魔法是禁止的力量。 /page 首先，我們需要找到一個地精薩滿。
我必須停止那個惡魔的靈魂狩獵並釋放被捕獲的靈魂。

Text_English:
We saved the souls from the goblin.
This was possible because of you. Bertha was also courageous. /page I wouldn't dare hunt the hunter if I was being hunted.
We are one step closer to finding Miracle.
Text_Korean:
我很高興我從地精薩滿手中拯救了靈魂。
這一切都歸功於你。貝爾塔大人也很勇敢。 /page 一個靈魂追逐一個靈魂獵手，我做不到。
如果你像這樣阻止儀式，我想你就能找到奇蹟大人。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 4-3</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Stop the Soul Harvest!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 4-3</> /div<span color="#ffffff">停止並突破靈魂狩獵！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">The Goblin Spell</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">地精薩滿的法術</>

Text_English:
It seems that the goblin needs a lot of souls.
It is continuing its hunt. /page I don't know what the ritual is about, but it sure is going to be destructive.
We must stop it. Defeat the goblin magician and save the souls.
Text_Korean:
我認為地精魔術師有很多靈魂要捕捉。
看到他們繼續獵殺靈魂。 /page 我不知道這是什麼儀式，但如果成功了，就會發生可怕的事情。
它必須被阻止。跟隨地精魔術師並拯救靈魂。

Text_English:
We almost lost Bertha.
That was close. We did it, thanks to you… /page You must be the hero foretold by the prophecy indeed.
Without you, we cannot save the souls, Pathfinder.
Text_Korean:
畢竟，我差點把貝爾塔大人輸給了哥布林魔法師。
你不知道我有多驚訝。我多麼幸運有你... /page 的確，你是預言中的英雄。
沒有你，我將無法拯救靈魂。光導

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 4-4</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Goblin Magician!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 4-4</> /div<span color="#ffffff">阻止妖精魔法師並通過！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">The Butcher</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">擊敗屠夫</>

Text_English:
They are close to the ritual.
We must save the souls held by the butcher. /page It will be a difficult battle,
but I believe in you, hero. /page Defeat the butcher and free the souls.
That's the only way to stop the ritual, Pathfinder.
Text_Korean:
他距離意識不遠，想必已經集齊了幾乎所有需要的靈魂。
那麼你必須從屠夫的房間裡救出靈魂。 /page我必須對付屠夫，一個名字就很可怕的惡魔，但我覺得我可以和你一起贏。 /page 請打敗屠夫，拯救被囚禁的靈魂。
這樣你就可以停止儀式，光明使者。

Text_English:
The goblin magician knew about these souls.
It took them as soon as we defeated the butcher. /page What if the goblin got all the souls it needs?
It may start the forbidden ritual…
Text_Korean:
地精薩滿知道靈魂被關在哪裡。
當我們拿下屠夫時偷走靈魂是完全毀滅性的。 /page如果地精薩滿收集了他需要的所有靈魂怎麼辦？
那樣的話，說不定可以進行禁忌的黑暗儀式…… .

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 4-5</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Butcher!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 4-5</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗屠夫！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">The Dark Ritual</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">黑暗儀式</>

Text_English:
We must quickly find Miracle.
The ritual is about to start. /page It cannot take place…
I hope nothing goes wrong with her…
Text_Korean:
我們需要盡快找到奇蹟。
在最壞的情況下，您可能會舉行儀式。 /page 如果儀式不能完成或失敗，那不是很好嗎？
黑暗勢力不應該傷害奇蹟...... .

Text_English:
Such power… Are they trying to invade Elysium?
Remiel is still recovering. Can we defeat them? /page Something is wrong with Vulcanus.
It possesses the power of light and endless hatred at the same time.
Text_Korean:
你是想通過召喚如此強大的惡魔來入侵極樂世界嗎？
Ramiel 的實力並不完美，我們能贏嗎？ /page 但是我從 Vulcanus 那裡得到了一種奇怪的感覺。
光明的力量和無盡的仇恨與黑暗的力量混合在一起。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 4-6</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Search for Miracle!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 4-6</> /div<span color="#ffffff">找到關於奇蹟的線索並繼續前進！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">The Memory Shard</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">記憶碎片</>

Text_English:
Did Vulcanus harm Miracle? No, she must be OK.
There must be a reason why it showed her to us. /page We must find it the memory shard left by Miracle. That's our only hope.
Thank goodness, Bertha is with us. /page Of course, you, too, Pathfinder.
Together, we shall find the memory shard.
Text_Korean:
難怪Vulcanus會傷害Miracle……不，你會沒事的。
您向我們展示人質安全一定是有原因的。 /page Miracle留下的記憶碎片是我們的希望，所以我們需要找到它。
我真的很高興 Berta 和我們在一起。 /page不，你當然是我們的希望，光明使者。
與您一起，您將能夠找到回憶的碎片。

Text_English:
Leaving behind the memory shard in case of an invasion
was a good move by Miracle. /page This will be helpful for us and for Remiel.
But I'm wondering who killed Vulcanus.
Text_Korean:
奇蹟大人真的很厲害，在惡魔入侵的情況下隱藏著記憶碎片這樣驚人的力量。 /page 這樣的人有能力幫助拉米爾大人。
但是，擁有恐懼火神惡魔的靈魂的身份值得懷疑。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 4-7</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Find the Shard, Defeat the Demons!</><span color="#ff6407">
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 4-7</> /div<span color="#ffffff">尋找記憶碎片，打敗惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">The Top Floor</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">頂層路徑</>

Text_English:
Bertha was able to decipher the memory shard.
We know where Miracle is. /page It's the top floor. We must head there first.
She's the only one that can help Remiel. /page Save Miracle, save Remiel.
Bring us victory, Pathfinder.
Text_Korean:
我真的很高興伯塔能夠閱讀記憶碎片。
我找到了 Miracle 在哪裡。 /page 現在，去奇蹟所在的頂層比解決問題更重要。
奇蹟是唯一可以幫助拉米爾的人。 /page 所以奇蹟大人的救援和拉米爾大人的救援是一樣的。
請像現在一樣努力獲勝。

Text_English:
We are near the top floor. Keep it up, just a little bit more.
At this rate, we will soon be able to reach Miracle. /page Hmm… But this is too easy... No?
Text_Korean:
頂樓所剩無幾。請給我更多的力量。
如果這樣順利的話，我想我們很快就能見到奇蹟了。 /page 不過進展的這麼順利有點奇怪。是不是太擔心了？

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 4-8</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Head Toward the Top Floor!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 4-8</> /div<span color="#ffffff">突破通往頂層的路徑！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Miracle's Whereabouts</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">奇蹟的下落</>

Text_English:
Pathfinder, you shall prevail over the darkness.
I can sense your victory. Remiel will join us as well. /page But I'm still concerned with whatever comes next.
Only if we had another shard…
Text_Korean:
光明使者，沒有黑暗的力量可以阻止你。
這是我作為一個新女孩的感覺，呵呵。我想拉米爾很快就會和你在一起。 /page 越接近目標，就越謹慎。
如果再有一段記憶，讓我們更了解當時的情況，豈不是很好？

Text_English:
I feel bad for Bertha. She wanted to save Miracle so much…
It's shocking to learn that Vulcanus is actually Azrael. /page They were sworn enemies. But now,
the forbidden ritual has brought them together, and bound the soul of Azrael and the body of Vulcanus. /page Miracle's warning was right.
Remiel will not like this, but she must know.
Text_Korean:
我為伯塔感到難過。所以我試圖拯救奇蹟大人…… .
聽到 Vulcanus 將自己稱為 Azrael 大人的消息令人震驚。 /pageVulcan 和 Azrael 是敵人。但現在我想我知道了。
我認為禁忌儀式融合了 Azrael 的靈魂和 Vulcan 的身體。 /page Miracle 關於危險靈魂的警告是正確的。
Ramiel 記得你想忘記的記憶，但你必須告訴他們。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 4-9</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat All Enemies!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 4-9</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗所有敵人！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">The Final Battle</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">與阿茲瑞爾的對決</>

Text_English:
Azrael has come back! This was what the forbidden ritual was for.
This kind of power, it cannot be wielded by a mere goblin magician. Maybe a death cleric... /page Azrael was one of my four guardian angels
that was condemned for its sins. Before the fall, Azrael murdered his brothers and sisters... A true tragedy. /page Azrael's hatred against me is strong. Lilith is also part of the story...
I will explain on the way. He is waiting for me.
Text_Korean:
阿茲瑞爾回來了！禁忌的黑暗儀式有著可怕的力量。
我沒有能力使用地精魔法師。也許是死亡的大祭司…… . /page 你是怎麼知道那個案子的？ Azrael 是協助我的四位天使之一，
他犯下屠殺其他天使的罪行，並遭遇了悲慘存在的終結。 /pageAzrael 討厭我。它從莉莉絲開始。
我會在我們去的時候告訴你細節。因為他在等我

Text_English:
Such a tragedy. Azrael was also being used by the death cleric.
Remiel must be in great pain… /page This is not good.
We should listen to Remiel once she recovers from her wound.
Text_Korean:
對不起。阿茲莉爾大人也被死亡大祭司佔了便宜。
他是一個可怕而殘忍的人。讓拉米爾這麼痛苦…… . /page 情況不好。拉米爾大人的崛起與天城的出現…… .
當拉米爾康復時，我很想收到您的來信。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 4-10</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat Azrael!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 4-10</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗阿茲瑞爾！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Remiel's Sorrow</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">拉米爾的悲傷</>

Text_English:
Although Azrael made the wrong choice, it hurts me to hear that
he has met his end yet again. Is this what they call “sadness?” /pageThe Death Cleric used Azrael's hatred to play out this tragedy.
I cannot forgive him for this. I have lost two of my four angel brethren. /pageThose whom I've relied on deeply from my heart are losing their lives, one by one.
But I cannot give up now. The Absolute Darkness inside me grows stronger.
Text_Korean:
儘管 Azrael 做出了錯誤的選擇，但說他必須再次面對結局讓我心碎，
。這是悲傷的感覺嗎？ /page 死亡祭司用阿茲瑞爾的仇恨重現了悲劇。
我不能原諒他。我失去了我的同伴的四個天使中的兩個。 /page 而我深深依賴的生命正在失去生命。
但我不能坐下。因為我內心的絕對黑暗越來越強烈。

Text_English:
Is Miracle the light mentioned in the prophecy?
She is the one that could save me from the darkness.
Text_Korean:
想想看，預言中提到的照亮世界的光不是奇蹟嗎？
因為我是能拯救我的人，他包含強大的光明和黑暗。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] Elysium</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Conversation with Remiel</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] 極樂世界</> /div<span color="#ffffff">與拉米爾交談</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">The Hunt for Nidhogg</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">追踪Needhog</>

Text_English:
Miracle is being held at Sky Castle Niflheim, a place feared by everyone.
Nidhogg is the keeper of the castle. /page The one that keeps the castle afloat with so much power.
Nidhogg has been neutral in this war. I don't know why it started to take sides. /page Whatever the reason, we must be ready.
Our enemies will be stronger than ever.
Text_Korean:
尼佩爾海姆，奇蹟被捕獲的天堂城堡，是每個人的恐懼。
原因是黑暗使徒尼德霍格是城堡的主人。 /page Nidhogg 是如此強大，以至於他可以將他的穿刺保持在空中。
但我不知道他為什麼會幫助邪惡，一種既不光明也不黑暗的力量。 /page 現在重要的是，我們為奪回奇蹟所面臨的敵人是那些比我們現在需要更大的勇氣和決心的人。

Text_English:
I am so glad that we saved Daniel. He is one of the four guardian angels that helped Remiel.
Lilith, Azrael, and Tarbrith were the other three. /page Daniel was the one protecting us during the battle of Niflheim a hundred years ago.
He did not return, so we thought he fell...
Text_Korean:
我很高興你救了丹尼爾。他是與莉莉絲、阿茲瑞爾和塔布里斯一起幫助我的四位天使之一。 /page他在一百年前的空中城堡尼佩爾海姆戰役中為我們保衛了後方。
但後來他沒有回來，所以我只知道他已經死了。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 5-1</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Push Through the Entrance!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 5-1</> /div<span color="#ffffff">衝破天空入口！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Daniel the Helper</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">新幫手丹尼爾</>

Text_English:
Daniel is our last hope.
He will help us find Miracle in the Sky Castle. /page I will investigate the blood diamond and its powers.
Go with him and find Miracle.
Text_Korean:
在我身邊的人失敗的情況下，丹尼爾是一個希望。
他將對在天空城堡中找到奇蹟有很大幫助。 /page我想了解血鑽之力的秘密。
請和他一起找到奇蹟。

Text_English:
The spirits of Vivian and the others…
They must be the heroes that attacked the castle. /page Daniel was lucky to be alive.
It's sad to learn about their deaths today…
Text_Korean:
巫師薇薇安的靈魂和其他三個靈魂…… .
我認為他們是離開攻擊天城的英雄。 /page 我曾希望看到丹尼爾活著，但很遺憾。
我剛剛發現他們被殺了。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 5-2</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Bring Peace to Vivian!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 5-2</> /div<span color="#ffffff">讓薇薇安休息！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Corrupted Spirits</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">陣亡英雄之魂</>

Text_English:
Corruption is flowing through the souls.
If we want to save them, we need to defeat the source. /page Whatever it is, it will be a powerful demon.
Be careful. Without Daniel, you are our only hope.
Text_Korean:
英雄的靈魂因為他們的身份而沾染了腐敗。
我認為我們必須打敗那個邪惡的人才能拯救我們的靈魂免於腐敗。 /page 但是，要小心，因為擁有這種力量的惡魔並不強大。
丹尼爾也失去了力量，所以你是唯一可以與之抗衡的人。

Text_English:
During the battle of Niflheim, Nidhogg forced us to retreat.
At that time, it was Daniel who protected all of us... /page Four heroes went missing during the battle.
Vivian, the wizard; Avelin, the assassin; Jin, the fighter; and Zic, the gladiator. /page Together, we fought countless battles.
Great as the mighty Gregor himself... Pathfinder, don't leave me like they did.
Text_Korean:
在要塞之戰中，我們被尼德霍格的反擊擊退了。
當時，丹尼爾留下來保護每個人。我太強了... . /page 前進要塞時失踪的四位英雄是
法師薇薇安、刺客艾弗林、前鋒金和角斗士澤克。 /page 他們都是與我經歷過許多戰鬥的偉大英雄。
他們是格雷戈爾的繼任者...你不要離開我的身邊

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 5-3</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Make Way!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 5-3</> /div<span color="#ffffff">開路，尋找線索！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">The Manipulator</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">殘酷的機械手</>

Text_English:
The last battle by the four heroes took place right before entering central Niflheim.
Perhaps the corruption originated from there. /page We must find out and see if there is indeed a demon that corrupted our heroes.
If the souls continue to protect the castle, it will be difficult to find Miracle.
Text_Korean:
據說四位英雄的最後一戰是進入要塞中心的行動。
要塞的中心不是有腐蝕靈魂的惡魔嗎？ /page 我們必須盡快找到腐蝕和控制那些靈魂的惡魔。
如果有靈魂守衛天空城堡，將很難找到奇蹟。

Text_English:
It's sad to see Avelin's soul being manipulated by the demons.
I can't even save the ones I hold dear… /page But there is no time for sorrow. That voice, the owner of that spear is Perez.
We must defeat him before it is too late.
Text_Korean:
可惜連艾弗林的靈魂都無法擺脫惡魔的控制。
我什至無法拯救我所愛之人的靈魂... . /page 但是現在不是悲傷的時候。那個聲音和長矛的主人是佩雷斯。
我們必須在他帶來血風之前摧毀那個野蠻的殺手。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 5-4</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Find the Soul Corrupter!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 5-4</> /div<span color="#ffffff">揭開腐蝕靈魂的惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Remiel's Wrath</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">拉米爾之怒</>

Text_English:
Perez… He murdered the ones I loved and played with their souls...
I cannot forgive him. /page Now, that I know he's been hiding at Niflheim,
I shall make sure he pays for his sins.
Text_Korean:
此外，殺死我愛的人，玩弄我的靈魂……
我永遠無法原諒貝雷斯。 /page我將親手償還我所有的罪孽，那個喜歡戰爭並為自己而死的殺手躲在
Nipelheim。

Text_English:
Remiel absorbed Perez…
The darkness inside her has become stronger. /page It's as if Remiel was no longer herself.
No, it was something else. Time is running out for Remiel.
Text_Korean:
拉米爾大人吐出殘酷的話語，吸收了貝雷斯…… .
那一刻，拉米爾大人被囚禁的絕對黑暗變得更加強烈。 /page好像我在看拉米爾以外的人。
不，這是別的東西。我認為拉米爾的時間不多了。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 5-5</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat Perez!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 5-5</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗貝雷斯！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Soul of the Fallen Hero</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">解放靈魂的幫助</>

Text_English:
Remiel won't be able to hold the darkness longer.
There is little time. We must find Miracle and bring her to Remiel. /page Perez is gone. We can do this.
Let's go find Miracle.
Text_Korean:
拉米爾大人似乎很難控制絕對的黑暗。
我沒有時間。我們必須找到奇蹟並見到拉米爾大人。 /page 大障礙已經過去，所以我們可以做到。
讓我們去尋找奇蹟。

Text_English:
Jin… He cannot be reasoned by words.
Fighter Jin was a hero that always sought to fight stronger opponents. /page He was particularly good at fighting demons.
He believed in his fists. /page He knows that you are strong, and he will want to fight you.
If you can beat him, he might tell us where Miracle is.
Text_Korean:
估計是瑾保護他了……他無法被言語說服。
Jin，一個戰士，是一個英雄，他的人生目標是與強者抗爭。 /page 在對抗強大的惡魔方面特別活躍。
他相信他可以用拳頭傳達真相。 /page 我想我注意到你很強壯。我會努力與你競爭。
如果你用武力說服他，他可能會告訴你奇蹟在哪裡。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 5-6</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Demons!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 5-6</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗擋路的惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">The Challenge</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">拳頭對話</>

Text_English:
You need to defeat Jin by overpowering him.
He does not know your true strength. /page You will be able to convince him through his way of reasoning.
Trust me. I know what I am talking about. /page You don't believe me? Hey, I was one of Remiel's guardians.
Just like Lilith and Azrael! Ask Remiel!
Text_Korean:
你被靳挑戰了，你必須用武力說服他。
但據我所知，Jin 並不知道你的真正實力。 /page 也許你可以用他想要的第一次談話來說服 Jean。
您可以相信我的眼睛，我與拉米爾大人經歷了無數次戰鬥。 /page 是不是一臉的懷疑？雖然失去了力量，但他原本是拉米爾大人的同伴。
莉莉絲，和死神一樣嗎？喜悅！問拉米爾。

Text_English:
Was Jin talking about Miracle? Such power...
I can't believe it wasn't Perez that summoned the souls. /page If it was Miracle and the demons used her,
she must be in much greater danger.
Text_Korean:
難道說的金聖不是奇蹟？擁有如此強大的力量... .
我不想相信召喚英雄精神的不是貝雷斯。 /page 如果奇蹟真的召喚靈魂並被惡魔使用，那麼她的危險可能比想像的要大。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 5-7</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat Jin's Soul!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 5-7</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗金的靈魂！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Zic the Gladiator</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">角斗士澤克之魂</>

Text_English:
The corruption is gone. That means the spirits must leave.
Too bad, we can no longer arm wrestle against Jin. /page What he told us is going to be very important.
We must now look for Zic's spirit. It knows where Miracle is.
Text_Korean:
腐敗已經解除，但靈魂必須回到它應該在的地方。
很遺憾，我將無法再次與 Jin 進行手臂摔跤。 /page 提供的信息很重要。
Sieg 的靈魂知道奇蹟的位置，所以我們必須找到它。

Text_English:
The gargoyle prevented us from meeting him, but I know where Zic is now.
Aren't you relieved that I am here? /page Zic was a proud and responsible gladiator. He will help us.
Text_Korean:
雖然因為石像鬼我們沒能見到澤克，但我們還是找到了它。
你認為我很幸運嗎？ /pageSieg 是一個自豪和負責任的人，所以他會幫助我們。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 5-8</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Look for Zic's Soul!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 5-8</> /div<span color="#ffffff">打開通往澤克靈魂之路！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Miracle's Whereabouts</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">奇蹟的下落</>

Text_English:
We must find Zic's soul to learn where Miracle is.
It will not be easy, but I know you will succeed. /page You still don't believe me.
Ask Remiel!
Text_Korean:
結識角斗士 Zeek 的精神，找出 Miracle 的下落。
通往澤克的道路將是艱鉅的，但您將能夠克服它。 /page長期以來經歷了無數的戰鬥……你還是不相信我。
請詢問拉米爾！

Text_English:
Zic will forever be remembered.
Don't forget his noble cause. /page I am worried that Nidhogg is guarding Miracle.
I heard that Remiel regained her strength. Go see her.
Text_Korean:
角斗士Zeeg的高貴結局將留在我心中。
請記住他的心，成為你力量的基礎。 /page 最大的問題是尼德霍格被她看守著。
Ramiel 及時恢復了精力。認識拉米爾。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 5-9</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Find Out Where Miracle Is!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 5-9</> /div<span color="#ffffff">找出奇蹟的下落！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Miracle's Rescue</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">拯救奇蹟</>

Text_English:
Jin and Zic… They fought well.
It saddens me to realize that their souls are gone. /page This sense of emptiness... Solitude…
We need to save Miracle for Jin and Zic. /page Nidhogg is indeed powerful,
but I believe that you can defeat whatever darkness would stand in front of you, Pathfinder.
Text_Korean:
Jin和Zeke遇到了自己的結局。
很遺憾，我什至無法再次看到自己的靈魂。 /page 親近的生命消失所留下的空虛…… .孤獨是一種未知的感覺... .
但即使對他們來說，我們也必須找回奇蹟。 /page雖然尼德霍格非常強大，但
我相信你，光明使者，也會戰勝強大的黑暗力量。

Text_English:
Pathfinder! Can you hear me? What happened?
Where is Remiel and Daniel? /page Oh, I am asking too many questions.
Tell me what happened after you recover.
Text_Korean:
光明使者，睜開你的眼睛。拉米爾處於危險之中。
你必須搬家。

Text_English: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 5-10</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat Nidhogg!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 5-10</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗Needhog！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">黑暗之源</>

光明使者，睜開你的眼睛。拉米爾處於危險之中。
你必須搬家。 /page 這裡是黑暗紮根的世界，黑暗的源頭就在這裡。
我們必須在力量轉移之前拯救拉米爾大人。

這是過去絕對黑暗統治的黑暗堡壘。
因此，如果您不盡快找到它，雷米爾大人就會處於危險之中。 /page 順便說一下，為了其他目的尋找拉米爾大人……不是嗎？
<span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 6-1</> /div<span color="#ffffff">尋找線索找到拉米爾！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">丹尼爾的指導</>

我會相信拼命尋找拉米爾並打敗惡魔的你。
實際上，我一個人，但我很高興你出現了。 /page 我一直在跟踪微弱的燈光直到現在。
因為它就像 Ramiel 的能量。請按照我的指示。

可惜我在過去的戰爭中把珍妮和阿克給逼死了。
那時我應該刪除它... . /page他們帶走了彼此信任的人的記憶，造成了悲劇。
那些被奪走記憶的人在不記得對方的情況下死去並互相殘殺。
<span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 6-2</> /div<span color="#ffffff">開啟光能之路！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">珍妮與黑暗的情節</>

珍妮和阿克很強大，但他們沒有能力接受它。

也許你正在追隨已經佔領這裡絕對黑暗據點的惡魔。 /page你可能不得不與一位新統治者打交道才能找到拉米爾。
在此之前，我們不能保持警惕，因為他們肯定會打擾我們。

我一定失去了所有的記憶。如果是這樣的話，那些惡魔可能已經奴役了你，
什麼都不記得了。 /page我們必須在敵人的據點中與一位不知名的統治者作戰，但
看來找回我們的記憶是我們的首要任務。
<span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 6-3</> /div<span color="#ffffff">前進，小心黑暗的襲擊！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">要解決的問題</>

有很多問題需要解決。您還需要找到 Miracle 和 Ramiel，
為此，您需要擊敗 Jeanne 和 Dark 並恢復他們的記憶。 /page 並擊敗至高死亡牧師及其統治者。
但是，在這種情況下，您應該冷靜而緩慢地進行。 /page 如果你解開一個複雜的結，它最終會變成一根繩子。

珍妮和艾克長期追隨的惡魔，可能就是這個絕對黑暗基地的新統治者。 /page 現在，如果 Jeanne 和 Arc 正在為他工作。
但很難預測，因為我們不能保證他還活著。
<span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 6-4</> /div<span color="#ffffff">關注珍妮與黑暗！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">黑暗女神的力量</>

我擔心珍妮和艾克還沒有說話。
我敢肯定他們很想折磨我們。 /page 至少，由於他的個性，看起來黑暗很快就會出現。
如果我們能從他們那裡找出新統治者的身份，那就太好了。

達克簡短的話語中蘊含著驚人的重要信息。
他們崇拜的是啟示錄。 /page如果迄今為止倖存下來並獲得力量的天啟找到了拉米爾，
將很快尋求報復。這是一件大事。
<span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 6-5</> /div<span color="#ffffff">打敗黑暗的力量，發現信息！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">天啟的目的</>

看著那光能，雷米爾大人似乎還好。
我想知道為什麼天啟沒有觸及拉米爾。 /page 似乎是有目的的，但你永遠不知道你的想法什麼時候會改變。
光的能量似乎越來越弱，所以你必須快點。

天啟到底在準備什麼？
我不知道通過移動 Jeanne 和 Arc 來爭取時間的意圖是什麼。 /page 令人不安的是，拉米爾的黑暗已經變得異常強大。
我被囚禁在天空之城時發生了什麼事？ .
<span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 6-6</> /div<span color="#ffffff">沖向天啟要塞！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">兩種危險</>

這是一個冒險的想法，但如果大祭司俘虜奇蹟的目的是引誘拉米爾大人，那麼奇蹟大人也將處於危險之中。 /page 我們需要快點找到拉米爾並拯救奇蹟。
為此，我需要從珍妮那裡找回我的記憶......我也會專注。

珍妮將準備比惡魔武器和黑暗更強大的攻擊。
看起來他冒著生命危險，所以我也必須在這件事上下定決心。
<span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 6-7</> /div<span color="#ffffff">繼續小心珍妮！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">天使的背後</>

如果你仔細想想，與絕對黑暗的戰爭仍在繼續。
由繼承它的人。 /pageWar 揭示了事物的隱藏面。天使與魔鬼... .
所以這很糟糕，但這也是展示現實的機會。 /page 我會告訴你你可能不知道的天使的另一面。

不知怎的，我說​​了一些沒用的話。
獻給在激烈戰鬥之前為正義而戰的你。 /page 別擔心，因為我無意中沉浸在自己的感情中。
您只需要遵循您相信的道路即可。
<span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 6-8</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗擋路的惡魔！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">暗光光環</>

我有重要的事情要告訴你。光的能量越來越弱。
如果這股力量是雷米爾大人的能量的話，好像有什麼事情發生了。 /page 絕對黑暗的基地就在不遠處，我們快點。
並且要小心，因為已經消失的珍妮不能靜止不動。

我感覺到的力量的身份是格雷戈爾大人。
簡準備了比預期更殘酷的報復。 /page 但是，Gregor 只是你記憶中的一個圖像，
不是真實的，所以最好不要記住它。
<span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 6-9</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殺死珍妮並恢復她的記憶！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">與天啟的對決</>

還有很多謎題，但解開的方法很清楚。
擊敗死亡大祭司並與天啟作鬥爭。 /page 你的勝利將拯救光之世界，每個人。
光明使者，您的偉大命運掌握在您手中，所以請贏。

你打敗了新的絕對黑暗，天啟。
這是只有你能做的事情。 /page 你真的是把光帶回世界的光的嚮導。
但另一個危險出現了。 /pageDaniel 一定有不同的含義…… .
我們再次失去了光芒，但我們可以一起找回它。
<span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 6-10</> /div<span color="#ffffff">打敗天啟！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">極樂世界的危機</>

極樂世界很危險。絕對黑暗的力量將摧毀光明的堡壘。
快點，我會和你在一起。

我很高興你救了布魯圖斯。它一定會給你力量。
而且他沒有感覺到任何謊言，所以不要太警惕。
<span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 7-1</> /div<span color="#ffffff">跟隨丹尼爾前往極樂世界！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">洗腦天使來襲</>

布魯圖斯告訴我，被洗腦的天使會發動攻擊。
他們被絕對的黑暗所利用。 /pageBrutus 告訴你不要猶豫。
如果你的劍毫不猶豫，天使將無法阻止你。 /page 這是一個悲傷的情況，需要為更大的事業做出犧牲，但我希望它不會傷害你的心。

布魯圖斯很生氣丹尼爾的錯誤選擇導致了他的同事們的死亡。 /page 所以丹尼爾覺得有責任選擇黑暗的道路。
這是他自己無法擺脫丹尼爾大人的傷口。
<span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 7-2</> /div<span color="#ffffff">通過天使的攻擊前進！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">聖域上的死亡孢子</>

布魯圖斯，我會好好看看。你必須小心孢子。
籠罩極樂世界的邪惡力量似乎來自死亡孢子。 /page如果你不擺脫它，惡魔會變得更強大。
讓我們弄清楚如何擺脫它。

死亡孢子以絕對黑暗的力量顯現。
我擔心威脅我們的孢子太多。 /page 但是，正如布魯圖斯所說，如果你打敗了絕對的黑暗，你將能夠恢復極樂世界。
<span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 7-3</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗絕對黑暗留下的力量！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">丹尼爾的踪跡</>

當我看到暗能量越來越強時，我的感覺並不好。
也許丹尼爾... ，我想需要你下定決心的時刻很快就會到來。

丹尼爾和布魯圖斯的關係似乎比我想像的要深。
像我和伯塔一樣。會有那麼大的傷害。 /page 我擔心的是布魯圖斯大人的決心和責任感。
彷彿為死亡做好了準備…… .
<span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 7-4</> /div<span color="#ffffff">幫助布魯圖斯追踪丹尼爾！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">對抗轉身的人</>

布魯圖斯說丹尼爾會在中央會議室。
如果這是真的，我們這次將與丹尼爾打交道。 /page忘記老丹尼爾，留意那強大的黑暗力量。
最重要的是你不要摔倒。祝你一切順利。

丹尼爾的結局讓我心痛。
他的世界可能是理想的，但他選擇的方法是錯誤的。 /page你能在把自己變成怪物的同時創造你想要的世界嗎？
我認為這是一場給每個人都留下傷痕的戰鬥。 /page Brutus 會感謝你幫助我履行職責，但
我對他的死感到難過。兩個靈魂最後在一起了嗎？
<span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 7-5</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗丹尼爾！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">黑暗力量擴展</>

這讓我想起了試圖幫助我的丹尼爾。你也有很多回憶嗎？
如果丹尼爾沒有找到他的記憶會更好...... . /page 激烈的鬥爭已經結束，但一切的根源仍然存在。
讓我們繼續我們的使命。

如果你打敗了絕對的黑暗，你就可以拯救極樂世界和拉米爾。
我們必須在光之力量從極樂世界消失之前拯救拉米爾大人。
<span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 7-6</> /div<span color="#ffffff">前往黑暗之力的源頭！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">絕對黑暗的陰謀</>

事情正在完全朝著黑暗的方向發展。我們也快。
如果絕對的黑暗熄滅了光明，我們或許可以將我們的力量發揮到極致。

絕對的黑暗是強大的，但我們可以使勝利的機率很大。
我們可以拯救拉米爾。我相信你，光的嚮導。
<span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 7-7</> /div<span color="#ffffff">快進！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">光的弱化能力</>

經過這里後，您將到達頂樓的入口。再給我一點力量。
您很快就有機會拯救拉米爾大人。

你真的很掙扎。直到大戰結束，所剩無幾。
而我的時間…… .時間的流逝和結局都在你的手中。
<span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 7-8</> /div<span color="#ffffff">去頂層！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">強烈的黑暗</>

不要擔心我說的話。最終你會發現。
準備好與絕對的黑暗作鬥爭，你永遠不知道什麼時候會面對它。

你經歷了很多相遇，結交了很多同事。
他們不在這裡，但他們會支持你。振作起來。
<span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 7-9</> /div<span color="#ffffff">突破頂層入口！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">為命運而戰</>

現在我們面臨著最後的戰鬥。你必須開路。
這意味著你，光導，必須獲勝。 /page 你也和我們一樣有悲慘的命運。
命運繼續戰鬥。願我們以這場胜利擺脫這種命運…… .

你已經應驗了預言。全世界都會讚美你。
除了奇蹟的崇高犧牲...我們不能忘記/page 我很抱歉。我無法擺脫我對你施加的詛咒。
無法逃脫在時間的束縛中永远战鬥的命運…… . /page 但我們都會在你身邊。
我保證，我會永遠幫助你... .
<span color="#ff6407">[Main] ACT 7-10</> /div<span color="#ffffff">戰勝絕對的黑暗！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gladiator's Training (1)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">角斗士的訓練（一）</>

Text_English:
I take pride when I see someone grow stronger.
Gladiator, you have potential. /page I shall give you goals that you can accomplish.
In return, you will be rewarded with a gift that can be helpful for your journeys.
Text_Korean:
我發現看到有潛力的人變得更強大是值得的。

您有能力變得更強大。 /page 我會給你一個目標，所以如果你通過訓練實現它，我會給你一些對你的冒險有用的東西，即使它很小。

Text_English:
I was right.
Continue to become stronger.
Text_Korean:
另外，我的眼睛是對的。
告訴我如何變得更強大。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Training Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Train Your Gladiator</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 成長任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">升級你的角斗士</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Mysteries in Luemos (1)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">魯莫斯的可疑物</>

Text_English:
Luemos has fallen… I'm worried about my friend who lives there.
In fact, he once told me /page that he could feel the city was changing,
and yet the higher ups were not reporting it to Elysium.
Text_Korean:
魯莫斯崩潰了……一個朋友住在那裡，我很擔心。
想一想，那個朋友不久前告訴我這個故事。 /page你的朋友是一名騎兵，但他感受到了城市的變化。
奇怪的是，上層階級沒有通知極樂世界。

Text_English:
Once Caligula took his position, suspicious-looking priests arrived.
Soon, strange rumors started to spread. /page Around that time, residents started to disappear,
yet we could not find any clues so far.
Text_Korean:
卡利古拉王子上任後，可疑的祭司來來去去，奇怪的謠言開始流傳。 /page 大約在那個時候，發生了一起居民失踪的案件，我們加強了警惕和調查，

事件在沒有任何線索的情況下繼續。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Elysium</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Conversation with Hunt</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 極樂世界</> /div<span color="#ffffff">與亨特交談</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Assassin's Training (1)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">刺客訓練（一）</>

Text_English:
Assassin, I can see sorrow in your eyes,
but a hasty revenge can be dangerous.
You need to become stronger first.
Text_Korean:
刺客，我從你的眼中看到了悲傷。
但似乎變強是命令而不是草率的報復。

Text_English: Good. Your scar shall heal someday.
Text_Korean: 做得好。總有一天，你心中的傷口很快就會癒合。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Training Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Train Your Assassin</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]成長任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">讓我們升級刺客</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Wizard's Training (1)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">法師訓練（一）</>

Text_English:
Wizard, your natural talent will easily make you stronger,
but you need to practice. /page Let me give you some motivation.
Accomplish the goals that I will tell you.
Rewards and power will follow.
Text_Korean:
巫師，只要稍加打磨，你與生俱來的品質就會閃耀。
但是，在目前的情況下，需要一點動力。 /page 我將從一個簡單的目標開始，這樣你就可以實現它。
如果你回來更強大，我會付出代價。

Text_English:
This is just the beginning.
I am already curious how you would turn out later.
Text_Korean:
你的成長從現在開始。
我更加期待未來。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Training Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Train Your Wizard</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]成長任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">讓我們升級巫師</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">The Prophecy</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">英雄的預言</>

Text_English:
You may be that person in Remiel's prophecy.
I did not want to believe it, but it seems like it's becoming true now. /page Recently, Remiel felt something, too.
If you never heard of the prophecy, I will tell you…
Text_Korean:
也許你就是拉米爾所說的預言中的人物。
我不想相信這個預言，但一切都預示著開始。 /page 最近，苧麻大人感覺到了一些東西，所以他再次檢查了內容。
如果你還沒有聽說過這個預言，我會告訴你的。

Text_English:
With the city of light, loved ones shall perish.
Soon, a hero of the light will appear and reclaim the light. /page The darkness shall spread,
and the hero's journey shall continue again. /page This prophecy is about Luemos.
I wish you are that hero of the light. Please help us.
Text_Korean:
當光之城中出現一道閃光時，珍貴的東西就會開始消失。
然後光導會出現並恢復丟失的光。 /page 但是被囚禁的黑暗會獲得追隨者併吞噬它周圍的光。
光明使者的旅程仍在繼續。 /page 這個預言似乎是指光之城 Ruemos 的事件。
我真的希望你是一個光導。希望沒有危險... .

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Elysium</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Conversation with Gaius</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 極樂世界</> /div<span color="#ffffff">與蓋烏斯交談</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Fighter's Training (1)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">前鋒訓練（一）</>

Text_English:
If you want to fight someone stronger, you need to be ready.
I know you are a fast learner. /page You will become more powerful as you proceed through battle.
Grow stronger and come back. I shall give you a fitting reward.
Text_Korean:
如果你想和一個更強大的人競爭，你必須有合適的資格。
您有能力比其他人更快地獲得戰鬥經驗。 /page 戰鬥越多，它就會變得越強大。
提高這種力量並來找我。我想表達我支持你的誠意。

Text_English:
There are still many you need to fight.
As you defeat them, they will all soon bow down before you.
Text_Korean:
世界上還有很多強者，你要面對。
如果您一一克服它們，您很快就會將它們全部踩在腳下。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Training Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Train Your Fighter</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 成長任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升你的戰士等級</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gladiator's Attack Power (1)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">角斗士的戰鬥之力 (1)</>

Text_English:
Hmm… You seem like someone with a fighting spirit,
but you need more power. /page Weakness cannot defeat evil. Try to increase your attack power.
You can do this by upgrading your equipment.
Text_Korean:
好吧…看來你很有野心。
但我認為我沒有足夠的力量來支持它。 /page 失敗者的威脅可能會奏效嗎？讓我們努力提高我們的戰鬥力。
您可以通過強化或合成裝備來提高戰鬥力。

Text_English:
I was right. You have potential.
Hey, why don't you work for me? Haha!
Text_Korean:
我的視力沒有錯。這足以迅速變強。
好吧，你為什麼不嘗試成為我的弟子？哈哈。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Gladiator's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">增強角斗士的戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Assassin's Attack Power (1)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">刺客大作戰 (1)</>

Text_English:
Defense is also an important aspect of your overall attack power.
You can only achieve so much through offensive abilities. /page To bring out your true potential, I suggest balance.
Also, don't forget to upgrade your equipment.
Text_Korean:
增加戰鬥力的因素有很多。防禦就是其中之一。
如果你專注於攻擊力，那麼戰鬥力的提升就會受到限制。通過關注/page能力來增加戰鬥力怎麼樣？
換上好的裝備也能提升戰鬥力。

Text_English:
Someday, I will need your help.
Don't forget that I helped you, my friend!
Text_Korean:
也許有一天我將不得不依賴你。
在那種情況下，請照顧我。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Assassin's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[子]強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">增強刺客的戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Pathfinder's Valor (1)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">品牌價值 (1)</>

Text_English:
My grandfather was a great soldier who fought against the demons.
Like him, I am protecting Elysium. /page Since he passed, however, my morale has been down.
Would you remind me what true might is?
Text_Korean:
我的祖父是一位與惡魔作戰的偉大戰士。
我也跟隨祖父保護我的家人和極樂世界。 /page 但是現在我的祖父不在了，我精神崩潰了。
你為什麼不表現出你的勇氣，讓我的意志活起來？

Text_English:
I was looking for someone, a hero, like my grandfather.
I can feel it, thanks to you.
Text_Korean:
我想我是在尋找一個有心的英雄來代替我的祖父。
有你，我的精神似乎在燃燒。謝謝。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Skirmish Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Demons!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[子]戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">打敗惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gladiator's Training (2)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">角斗士的訓練（二）</>

Text_English:
You have great potential,
but you are not even using half of it. /page It takes time and practice,
but keep it up to become more powerful.
Text_Korean:
事實上，你有很大的潛力，
但你還沒有汲取到一半的力量。 /page 你不能立即汲取這種力量，而是準備通過持續的戰鬥釋放你隱藏的力量。

Text_English:
Very well.
Someday, the demons will fear you.
Text_Korean:
你做得很好
您醒來的那一天將是所有惡魔恐懼的一天。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Training Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Train Your Gladiator</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 成長任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">升級你的角斗士</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Assassin's Training (2)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">刺客訓練（二）</>

Text_English:
I do not think vengeance is a bad thing,
but it can be dangerous when you set it as your goal. /page You need to become stronger
so that you are not consumed by your own vengeance.
Text_Korean:
我不認為複仇是一件壞事。
但是，如果它成為自己生活的目的，那將是非常危險的。 /page如果你不想被自己的複仇吞噬
我需要足夠強大來控制這些情緒。

Text_English: Overcome temptations keep training and become stronger.
Text_Korean: 誘惑有很多，但我希望你不斷磨練自己，變得更強大。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Training Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Train Your Assassin</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]成長任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">讓我們升級刺客</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Wizard's Training (2)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">法師訓練（二）</>

Text_English:
Gaining the knowledge of the world
also means that you are becoming stronger against the world. /page It's not an easy path.
You cannot continue treading that path with your current strength.
Keep practicing and prepare for the path.
Text_Korean:
要獲得遍布世界各地的智慧，可能是一場鬥爭。 /page 這條路並不容易。你不能像現在這樣走那條路。
將其視為為此做的準備，並希望您變得更強大。

Text_English:
I look forward to the knowledge you shall gain.
Let me know about it as well.
Text_Korean:
我期待看到你將獲得什麼樣的智慧。
請把它也傳給我。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Training Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Train Your Wizard</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]成長任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">讓我們升級巫師</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Wizard's Attack Power (1)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">法師強大的戰鬥力（一）</>

Text_English:
Can you sense the limits of your power?
The enemies are becoming stronger than you. /page It's time to increase your attack power.
Collecting set items for their special attributes can help.
Text_Korean:
在目前的狀態下不覺得限制嗎？
如果你的對手無法承受你全力以赴的攻擊。 /page 表示你需要增加你的戰鬥力。讓我們在這裡解決這個問題。
搭配裝備套裝以創造額外效果也是一個好主意。

Text_English:
It's always important to increase your attack power,
especially when you are fighting besides Remiel.
Text_Korean:
強大的戰鬥力對於與苧麻大人的冒險非常重要。
這是必須帶頭戰鬥的人必須具備的能力。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Wizard's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">讓我們增加法師的戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Fighter's Training (2)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">前鋒訓練（二）</>

Text_English:
You need to overcome fear
to fight against the strong. /page You have the spirit, but now you need to train further.
Text_Korean:
面對強者，你必須有不被恐懼打敗的勇氣。
你很擅長，但如果你站著不動也沒用。 ./page 如果你不想成為你心目中的領導者，那就試著一點一點地增強你的實力。

Text_English:
I look forward to the day when your strength surpasses your spirit.
Keep up the good work.
Text_Korean:
我期待著你變得和你的鬥志一樣強大的那一天。
讓我們更加努力地訓練。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Training Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Train Your Fighter</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]成長任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">讓我們提升戰士等級</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Fighter's Attack Power (1)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">前鋒的強大戰鬥力（一）</>

Text_English:
If you feel that your opponent is too strong, you need to increase your own strength.
Why not increase your attack power? /page Investing in your wings upgrade or passive stats can help.
Text_Korean:
如果對方的攻擊重，說明現在的戰鬥力太過分了。
那麼，當然不應該增加戰力吧？投資 /page 機翼強化或統計提升效果也是一個好主意。

Text_English:
Ambushing an enemy also requires sufficient attack power.
There's now a way to tell what's going to happen. /page You will know, especially when you are surrounded by enemies.
Text_Korean:
即使在突襲對手時也需要足夠的戰鬥力。
因為我不知道事情會如何變化。 /page 當你被多個敵人包圍時，你會感到更加絕望。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Fighter's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">讓我們提升戰士的戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">History of the Forest</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">童話森林的過去</>

Text_English:
The forest of fairies is a sacred place that creates the energy of life.
Because of that, the demons want to take the forest. /page There was an invasion a hundred years ago.
Humans, angels, and fairies all came together to protect the forest.
Text_Korean:
仙林，是創造生命之力的聖地。
但這就是惡魔瞄準這個地方的原因。 /page 數百年前，不時有入侵污染森林。
人類、天使和仙女都為保護森林而戰。

Text_English:
Remiel and Lilith defeated countless demons,
but they corrupted the place, doing whatever they can. /page Back then, the forest came back to life after Lilith was imprisoned.
It remains unclear exactly how it happened, and Remiel has never spoke of it either.
Text_Korean:
拉米爾和莉莉絲打敗了許多惡魔。
但是，惡魔也用屍體污染了森林。 /page 那時，莉莉絲因一次事件被封印並複活了森林。
不管拉米爾大人發生了什麼。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Elysium</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Conversation with Bella</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Elysium</> /div<span color="#ffffff">與貝拉交談</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Pathfinder's Valor (2)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">品牌的勇氣 (2)</>

Text_English:
I know a lot of soldiers.
In one gathering, I mentioned your valor to others, /page but then nobody trusted me. I was angry.
Show me your valor once more, Pathfinder. My friends shall bear witness.
Text_Korean:
我和士兵有很多聯繫。也有我領導的會議。
您在最近的一次會議上自豪地談到了自己的勇敢。 /page 但沒人相信。我胃部不適。
再一次，展示你的勇氣，向你的朋友展示你生命中的英雄。

Text_English:
Indeed, you're a great hero.
My friends will surely praise your valor.
Text_Korean:
看來你的勇氣比不上我這樣的士兵。
這一次，您的朋友會相信並稱讚您的勇敢。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Skirmish Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Demons!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[子]戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">打敗惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Lilith's Imprisonment</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">釋放印章</>

Text_English:
The seal that imprisons Lilith runs through the entire forest.
The forest is an important source of life. /page It creates the energy of life for the world.
It also needs someone who can bear its power.
Text_Korean:
莉莉絲的封印連接著整個仙林。
由於森林本身是生機勃勃的，它忠實於它對世界的作用。 /page神仙森林在為世界創造生命之力方面發揮著重要作用。
所以我想要一個可以創造巨大生命力的目標。

Text_English:
To restore the devastation of war, the forest needed a great source of power.
It was Lilith who took upon the task of creating the power of life. /page She is like the heart of the forest now.
Her conditions directly affect the entire forest.
Text_Korean:
恢復被戰爭污染的森林需要強大的生命力。
所以莉莉絲承擔了創造生命力的角色。 /page 現在莉莉絲就像森林的心臟，可以這麼說。
莉莉絲的狀況會影響到整個仙境森林。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Elysium</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Conversation with Bella</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Elysium</> /div<span color="#ffffff">與貝拉交談</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gladiator's War (1)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">角斗士的戰爭（一）</>

Text_English:
Gladiator, we found the demon that attacked your home.
It was a blood seeker, and it's now corrupting the forest of fairies. /page It must have brought chaos to your castle.
Shouldn't you defeat the demon?
Text_Korean:
角斗士，我發現了一個似乎襲擊了你的王國的惡魔。

在仙林中散播腐敗之力的嗜血狂魔。 /page我確定你在混淆你的姓氏方面起了作用。
你不應該打敗那個惡魔嗎？

Text_English:
We don't know who is behind this invasion,
but we will find out, even if it means bringing them down one by one.
Text_Korean: 侵略的首領還沒有找到，但如果你一一找到並消滅他們，總有一天會找到他們的。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-1</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Gladiator! Defeat the Blood Seeker!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-1</> /div<span color="#ffffff">用角斗士打敗噬血者黑蝙蝠！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Assassin's Revenge(1)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">刺客復仇(1)</>

Text_English:
Assassin, the demon that attacked your village is found in the forest.
It's the sword captain. /page After the pillage,
it is now invading Plitvice. Time for revenge.
Text_Korean:
刺客，入侵你城鎮的惡魔就在仙女森林裡。
我是黑暗骷髏騎士的隊長。 /page你似乎參與了對仙女森林的入侵，踐踏了農村城鎮和刺客村莊。開始復仇。

Text_English:
You did well, despite the harsh memory. Revenge is best served cold.
But do not let it take over you.
Text_Korean:
你很好地忍受了痛苦的回憶並成功了。報復必須慢慢來。
但要小心不要被復仇吃掉。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-2</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Assassin! Defeat the Sword Captain!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-2</> /div<span color="#ffffff">作為刺客擊敗黑暗骷髏騎士隊長！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Strange Things in the Forest</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">童話森林的奇兆</>

Text_English:
I remember the day when the forest faded away.
I could no longer sense the fairies nor any life in the forest. /page The forest can sense danger better than humans.
That's why there was no one left.
Text_Korean:
我突然想起了那一天。森林失去生命能量的那一天。
我感覺不到森林成員和仙女的能量。 /page 森林之友對危機的感知比人類更敏感。
那天他們感受到了森林危機並逃脫了。

Text_English:
I looked for the friends of the forest as soon as I felt something was wrong.
I was scared because it reminded me of the invasion a hundred years ago. /page Yes, I couldn't do anything because of fear,
but now I am different. I will do whatever it takes.
Text_Korean:
我覺得奇怪，就去森林裡找朋友。
這讓我想起了一百年前邪惡的入侵，我好害怕。 /page 是的，我知道危機，但出於恐懼，我什麼也做不了。
但現在不同了。我會履行我的職責，直到最後。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Elysium</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Conversation with Bella</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Elysium</> /div<span color="#ffffff">與貝拉交談</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Fighter's Challenge (1)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">前鋒的挑戰（一）</>

Text_English:
Fighter, the demon that attacked your comrades
turned out to be a venom blast. /page It is now found in the forest.
To prevent further casualties, I urge you to bring justice to this monster.
Text_Korean: 我發現襲擊戰士和你訓練的人的爆炸來自黑暗轟炸機馬。 /page 怪物在仙境森林裡，為什麼不干掉它，以免像老朋友一樣的受害者出來呢？

Text_English:
I know that this does not bring you peace, but it would bring you a step closer.
Don't be anxious, your time will come.
Text_Korean:
這並不難，但你可以先做小事來成就大事。
我會幫助你的，所以不要著急。
