Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-3</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Fighter! Defeat the Venom Blast!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-3</> /div<span color="#ffffff">作為戰士擊退黑暗炸彈馬自毀蜘蛛！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Wizard's Journey (1)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">巫師之旅（一）</>

Text_English:
Wizard, the demon that accused you of treachery is roaming the forest.
It's the corrupter. /page It seems like it will dupe others again.
We need to put a stop to its trickery.
Text_Korean:
巫師，陷害你的惡魔躲在仙林裡。
這是腐蝕者幽靈。 /page 當你不斷出現時，很明顯你不想阻止利用人類折磨你的邪惡。我們必須戰勝命運的障礙。

Text_English:
I know you have no appetite for revenge,
But this was something necessary. Your help is always valuable.
Text_Korean: 我知道你無意報復，但保護它是有幫助的。以後我會幫你的。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-5</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Wizard! Defeat the Corrupter!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-5</> /div<span color="#ffffff">用巫師打敗腐化鬼！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gladiator's Attack Power (2)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">角斗士的戰鬥之力 (2)</>

Text_English:
If you want to protect others, you must be able to protect yourself first.
Try increasing your attack power.
Text_Korean:
如果你想保護每個人，你必須首先保護自己。
您為什麼不嘗試增強自己的戰鬥力？

Text_English: With strength, you shall be able to be the protector indeed.
Text_Korean: 如果你像這樣長大，你也將能夠保護你的周圍環境。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Gladiator's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升角斗士的戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Assassin's Attack Power (2)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">刺客大作戰 (2)</>

Text_English:
You cannot avoid an attack by simply moving fast.
There will be plenty of demons that can move like you. /page If you increase your attack power, you might actually overcome them.
Text_Korean:
僅僅通過快速移動，您將無法避免所有攻擊。
也許有些惡魔可以像你一樣移動。 /page我覺得如果我提高戰鬥力，我可以更自信地移動。怎麼樣？

Text_English:
Keep going.
At this rate, you will not fall easily.
Text_Korean: 你很擅長移動，所以如果你像這樣不斷提高你的戰鬥力，你不會被擊倒。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Assassin's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升刺客的戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Wizard's Attack Power (2)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">法師強大的戰鬥力（2）</>

Text_English:
You need to defeat the demons before they come close,
but there will be times that you cannot. /page The only way to avoid that situation is to become stronger.
There's nothing to lose by increasing your attack power.
Text_Korean:
如果在敵人靠近之前將其擊敗，您將獲得優勢。
但就像現在一樣，你會遇到接近的敵人。 /page 那不是更好嗎？
增加戰鬥力不會有任何損失。

Text_English:
If no one can dare to come close,
you will be feared by your enemies.
Text_Korean: 如果你讓強大的力量無法接近，它會嚴重損害敵人的士氣。這是一個很好的優勢。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Wizard's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升法師戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Fighter's Attack Power (2)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">前鋒的強大戰鬥力 (2)</>

Text_English:
You can have greater attack power
by strengthening your items. /page A stronger defense will be useful for someone like you.
Would you like to give it a try?
Text_Korean: 如果您擁有可以偏轉所有攻擊的強壯肌肉並且您的盔甲堅固，那麼您可以擁有更強的戰鬥力。 /page我認為像你這樣毫不猶豫地前進的戰鬥需要更強的防禦。

Text_English:
Someday, no one will be able to stop you.
I promise…
Text_Korean:
總有一天，沒有人能阻止你的充電。
我的承諾...夏至。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Fighter's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升戰士的戰鬥力</>
<span color="#ffffff">統治者碎片（一）</>

如您所知，您需要統治者的碎片來加強古代遺物。 /page 這樣你就可以把統治者的權力變成你的了。
為什麼不讓莉莉絲的力量成為你自己的力量呢？ /page 他可能也希望如此。

做你的根基，比讓他的權勢落入黑暗要好。
未來，我會收集更多的碎片，將遠古遺物的力量提升到極限。
<span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-10</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殺死莉莉絲得到碎片！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">推廣的必要性（一）</>

如果提高戰鬥力很難，為什麼不投資推廣呢？
它不僅提高了等級，而且提高了能力。 /pageChallenge 一對一的比賽以獲得晉升。
我希望你能得到很多晉升石。

我很難升職，所以我羨慕你。
但是，我想對您的升職感到滿意，所以請努力升職。
<span color="#ffde00">[子]戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">挑戰一對一戰鬥，贏取晉級石！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">Broke 的請求（一）</>

看到像你這樣的年輕英雄真是太有趣了。
我很享受幫助的樂趣。 /page 但是，現在供應少，很難找回，所以很難經營鐵匠。
所以，作為一個請求，你不會賣掉你得到的設備嗎？

太感謝了。你賣的設備讓我大吃一驚。
通過運行鍛造廠努力製造更好的設備。
<span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">獲取和出售裝備！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Trial and Error (1)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">實驗與觀察（一）</>

Text_English:
Repeated trial and error is what
made me the great wizard. /page Would you like to hear about
my recent research?
Text_Korean:
這個身體能夠成為一個偉大的巫師的秘密
是由於不斷的研究和實驗。 /page 我這幾天研究的話題很有趣。
你想听一個故事嗎？

Text_English:
A powerful high demon lord has special powers. The power of the curse...
It can bring about different types of curses, and they require different remedies. /page These curses are what I am studying these days.
I hope to find as many countermeasures as possible.
Text_Korean:
強大的上位惡魔擁有特殊的力量。這就是詛咒的力量。
他們可以施放不同的詛咒，並有不同的方法來打破它們。 /page 這幾天我在研究的是高級惡魔的詛咒。
我要研究這個，這樣我就可以為許多詛咒做好準備。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Elysium</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Conversation with Gratia</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 極樂世界</> /div<span color="#ffffff">與格拉齊亞交談</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gladiator's War (2)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">角斗士的戰爭（二）</>

Text_English:
Gladiator, we found the demon that desecrated your castle.
It is the spiteful marauder, and it is roaming the ancient tombs. /page It will still be hunting humans, blinded by vengeance.
Time to bring an end to its treachery.
Text_Korean:
角斗士，我找到了在你的城堡廢墟上留下印記的惡魔。
古代英雄墳墓中的怨恨襲擊者。 /page 你仍然會帶著盲目的怨恨對人類磨刀霍霍。
我必須打破那個危險的事件。

Text_English:
Good job. Your war is now a step closer to victory.
But be careful not to be consumed by vengeance, like the spiteful marauder.
Text_Korean:
你做得好。你們的重建戰爭進展順利。
但不要被怨恨附身，變得像一個怨恨襲擊者。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-3</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Gladiator! Defeat the Spiteful Marauder!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-3</> /div<span color="#ffffff">用角斗士打敗復仇突擊殭屍！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Assassin's Revenge (2)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">刺客復仇 (2)</>

Text_English:
Assassin, the demon that destroyed your homeland is here.
It is the gorger. Bring justice to its greed.
Text_Korean:
刺客，摧毀你家園的惡魔在古代英雄的墳墓裡。
貪婪的捕食者。結束貪婪。

Text_English:
Revenge is painful. It takes a piece of your soul.
But you will not stop. I hope your soul stands strong.
Text_Korean:
報復是痛苦的。因為它咬著你的心
但你不會停止。我希望你的心不會滅亡。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-5</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Assassin! Defeat the Gorger!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-5</> /div<span color="#ffffff">用刺客消滅貪婪的食肉殭屍！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Fighter's Challenge (2)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">前鋒的挑戰（二）</>

Text_English:
Fighter, a worthy opponent is found in the tombs.
It is the fallen knight. It is corrupted but is still strong. /page You would enjoy this. Defeat it to satisfy your thirst for victory.
Text_Korean:
前鋒，在古代英雄的墳墓裡，有一個對手可以滿足你的鬥志。
古代墮落騎士的石像。雖然墮落，但他是一個強大的戰士。 /page 通過擊敗不會缺少的對手來滿足你的慾望。

Text_English:
You surpass my expectations. I feel sorry for you.
What remains your thirst, I shall provide soon.
Text_Korean:
你的力量似乎超出了我的預期。我有點抱歉
我將幫助您滿足您這次無法滿足的願望。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-7</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Fighter! Defeat the Fallen Knight!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-7</> /div<span color="#ffffff">作為戰士擊退腐化的古代騎士雕像！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Wizard's Journey (2)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">巫師之旅（二）</>

Text_English:
Wizard, there is a demon born by the powers of greed and curse.
It is the Mimic. /page Your hatred against its creator is obvious.
Bring an end to this blasphemy.
Text_Korean:
巫師，有一個由妄想和詛咒的力量誕生的惡魔。
古代英雄墓中被詛咒的巨型寶箱。 /page 創造惡魔的力量是你最討厭的力量吧？
請摧毀那個力量的產物。

Text_English:
I cannot fully understand the reasons behind your hatred.
It must be related to your past. /page I can only hope you overcome it someday.
Text_Korean:
我不知道你為什麼討厭妄想和詛咒的力量。
我只認為它與你的過去有關。 /page我希望你能從痛苦的過去中解脫出來。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-9</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Wizard! Defeat the Mimic!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-9</> /div<span color="#ffffff">用巫師擊敗被詛咒的巨型寶箱！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Trial and Error (2)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">實驗與觀察（二）</>

Text_English:
The battle at the ancient tombs was dangerous.
Beelzebub was too strong already. /page Geography was also a problem. We could not bring in all of our forces.
Only an elite force could cut through.
Text_Korean:
古代英雄墳墓中的戰鬥是危險而激烈的。
因為一個名為貝爾澤布布拉的強大惡魔已經在控制之中。 /page 由於該地區的性質，無法部署大量人員也是一個問題。
因此，我們派出了一支規模雖小但實力強大的精銳部隊。

Text_English:
By the time they faced Beelzebub, the casualties were already high.
But the hero leading the elite group was finally able to defeat Beelzebub, imprisoning him under the seal. /page But that hero could not return...
Even since, I have been guarding the tombs.
Text_Korean: 當他到達貝爾西卜時，他已經失去了許多軍隊，但帶領軍隊的英雄獨自戰鬥並封印了貝爾西卜。 /page 然而，英雄甚至沒有回來，因為他已經盡力了......為了不讓祭祀白費，這具身體探測到了墓穴中的黑暗力量。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Elysium</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Conversation with Gratia</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 極樂世界</> /div<span color="#ffffff">與格拉齊亞交談</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Pathfinder's Valor (3)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">品牌的勇氣 (3)</>

Text_English:
I feel my limits against the demons.
I wanted to protect this place like my grandfather, but I am just an ordinary soldier. /page These demons, they do not discriminate.
I ask you to defeat them for I alone cannot do so.
Text_Korean:
我最近一直在聽到這個，但我似乎沒有足夠的精力來對抗惡魔。
我想像祖父一樣保護這片土地，但我認為這只是作為一名士兵的船隻。 /page 但是惡魔不分強弱都瞄准我們。
我很生氣，但我很虛弱，所以我請你打敗惡魔。

Text_English:
Your strength is truly impressive.
It is also a source of inspiration for me. /page My body may be weak, but I will keep my soul strong.
Thank you for giving me hope.
Text_Korean:
看你的實力，不敢相信你是我這樣的人。
但既然你是人，我也有希望變得更強大。 /page 即使我的身體很虛弱，我也會振作起來，這樣我的心就不會失去。
感謝您的希望。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Skirmish Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Demons!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[子]戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">打敗惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">World Restoration (1)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">淨化世界（一）</>

Text_English:
The areas outside of Elysium have fallen because of the demons.
Unless the darkness is dealt with, they will continue their invasion. /page At this rate, we cannot restore the world.
If you can bring light to the darkness, we may have a chance.
Text_Korean:
除了極樂世界，所有區域都被惡魔摧毀了。
只要黑暗沒有解除，惡魔就會繼續從陰影中出現。 /page 像現在這樣淨化世界是不可能的。
如果您消除黑暗，我們可以繼續進行淨化。

Text_English:
Thank you, hero.
Let us continue our work until the light shines again.
Text_Korean:
你真的很努力。
讓我們一起努力，直到光明降臨整個世界的那一天。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Skirmish Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Liberate the Area!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">解放每個地區！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">統治者碎片 (2)</>

你知道強化Belzebub's Eye會讓你在佔領之前獲得優勢嗎？
如果您想成為佔領戰爭中的傑出人物，那麼收集Belzebub碎片如何？
升級古代遺物也有助於統計數據，因此請確保獲得大量碎片。你做得好
<span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-10</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗Belzebub獲得碎片！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">推廣的必要性（二）</>

我感到欣喜若狂。
也許這不僅對我而且對你來說都會很愉快。 /page 我不知道我什麼時候會升職，但你不一樣嗎？
在一對一的比賽中獲得晉級席位。

你有很多機會，所以要充分利用它們。
並且不要忘記，您必須緩慢而穩定地晉升。
<span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">挑戰一對一戰鬥，贏取晉級石！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">布羅克的請求（二）</>

嘿，你去的越多，你的補給就越用完。這次我又求你了。
別擔心，我不會忘記努力的代價。
謝謝謝謝。我不會只擦外面就這樣使用它，所以不要懷疑地看著我。下次請
<span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">獲取和出售裝備！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gladiator's Training (3)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">角斗士的訓練（三）</>

Text_English:
We don't know how strong the demons are in different places.
But if you prepare, there will be no regrets.
Text_Korean:
你不會知道其他地區的惡魔有多強大。
如果您提前做好準備，您將不會有任何遺憾。

Text_English:
I know you are doing well on your own,
but I hope you understand that this is all for your success.
Text_Korean: 看起來你正在干預你正在為自己做好準備的情況，但我想讓你知道這一切都是為了你。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Training Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Train Your Gladiator</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 成長任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">升級你的角斗士</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Assassin's Training (3)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">刺客訓練（三）</>

Text_English:
Someday, you shall meet the demon that killed your family.
You need to be stronger if you want revenge.
Text_Korean:
當你擊敗惡魔時，有一天你會遇到傷害你家人的惡魔。
為了復仇，你需要比現在更強大的力量。

Text_English:
Your powers are increasingly impressive but also unnerving.
What will happen after you get your revenge.
Text_Korean:
你的成長令人震驚，但同時也令人擔憂。
復仇的結局是什麼... .

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Training Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Train Your Assassin</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]成長任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">讓我們升級刺客</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Wizard's Training (3)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">法師訓練（三）</>

Text_English:
There is still powerful magic inside you.
You need more training if you want to use it.
Text_Korean:
你有強大的魔法力量，還在沉睡。
它不需要更多的培訓才能把它帶出來嗎？

Text_English:
Your talent with magic was envied by many.
I thank you for fighting for us.
Text_Korean:
有很多人嫉妒你的魔法天賦。
儘管如此，我只是感謝與您戰鬥。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Training Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Train Your Wizard</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]成長任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">讓我們升級巫師</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Fighter's Training (3)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">前鋒訓練（三）</>

Text_English:
You are becoming stronger, but not strong enough to
face the high demon lords. /page Don't you want to fight them?
Then, make sure that you train more.
Text_Korean:
你越來越強了，但我還是覺得你還不夠好對付高階惡魔。 /page 那些惡魔不是你真正想要與之搏鬥的嗎？
填補這個空白會很好。

Text_English:
At this rate, you will soon find the one
that betrayed your teacher. Prepare for battle!
Text_Korean: 如果你以這樣的速度成長，你很快就會找到你主人的敵人。準備好與那個惡魔戰鬥。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Training Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Train Your Fighter</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 成長任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升你的戰士等級</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Miracle's Past</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">奇蹟的過去</>

Text_English:
Bertha told me that Miracle had a very tough past.
Miracle was talented with her power to use the souls. /page But she was an orphan, and her talents
were just seen as a gimmick on the streets. Some were scared of her, too.
Text_Korean:
我從 Berta 那裡聽說 Miracle 度過了一段非常艱難的時期。
據說Miracle從小就有很強的操縱靈魂的能力。 /page 但他是一個孤兒，沒有人保護他，他的自然力量使他成為一個奇觀或嚇壞了他。

Text_English:
The old master of Avila recognized her powers and brought her to the fortress,
but the people, even Bertha, feared her abilities. /page The master had to keep her in his castle,
and so Miracle was alone all along.
Text_Korean:
承認它的力量的靈魂之城的前任掌門人拿走了奇蹟大人，但
城堡的人，甚至是貝爾塔大人，都害怕它的力量。 /page為了保護有一定緣分的奇蹟大人，城主禁止
從城外進入，奇蹟大人在城裡度過了孤獨的時光。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Elysium</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Conversation with Arin</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Elysium</> /div<span color="#ffffff">與阿琳對話</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gladiator's Attack Power (3)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">角斗士的戰鬥之力 (3)</>

Text_English:
Each member of a team must be able to take care of oneself.
You can charge, I'll give you that, but you need more attack power.
Text_Korean:
要想打贏團戰，必須要提供成員的實力吧？
如果你使用強大的衝鋒，你應該有這個級別的攻擊力。

Text_English:
Good. My worries may be unnecessary,
but it's always better to be stronger, no?
Text_Korean: 那太棒了。如果條件已經具備的話，就有點多管閒事了，不過對你來說也不錯吧？

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Gladiator's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升角斗士的戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gladiator's War (3)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">角斗士的戰爭（三）</>

Text_English:
The arrow of the goblin archer
is the same arrow that lured your army into a trap. /page Without an army, your kingdom was destroyed.
There can be no mercy to the culprit.
Text_Korean:
你看到入侵精靈城堡的古怪哥布林弓箭手隊長的箭了嗎？
這與引誘您的部隊進入的照明彈相同。 /page 被引誘的惡魔和沒有軍隊的空蕩蕩的王國不是在踐踏嗎？
我認為沒有必要對潛伏者表示憐憫。

Text_English:
The invading demons all have a purpose.
Do not let them succeed, hero.
Text_Korean:
入侵王國的惡魔留下了他們的強項和弱點，並一一履行了自己的職責。
不要憐憫惡魔。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-3</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Gladiator! Defeat the Goblin Archer!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-3</> /div<span color="#ffffff">作為角斗士擊敗古怪的地精弓箭手隊長！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Miracle's Fate</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">奇蹟的命運</>

Text_English:
Miracle kept growing stronger and stronger,
but it was only the master and Bertha who were sincere to her. /page Miracle became the next master of the Soul Fortress,
but things did not get better.
Text_Korean:
奇蹟大人說，隨著他的成長，他的力量越來越強，新的能力也開始顯現。
但據說只有校長和貝爾塔大人才會獻出自己的心。 /pageMiracle，失去了前任的指揮官，擁有巨大的權力，已經晉升為
靈魂城堡的新負責人，但情況並沒有改變。

Text_English:
Despite the fear for and hatred against her, Bertha was relieved
to see that Miracle maintained her calm. /page Miracle's benevolence and generosity showed that
she accepted her fate to help Remiel.
Text_Korean:
然而，看到Miracle對那些不把他當人的人沒有怨恨和憤怒，Berta說他感到有成就感和感動。 /page這是因為Miracle似乎已經成長為一個具有偉大人格的人類，並接受了成為幫助
Ramiel的光的命運。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Elysium</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Conversation with Arin</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Elysium</> /div<span color="#ffffff">與阿琳對話</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Assassin's Attack Power (3)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">刺客大作戰 (3)</>

Text_English:
You may become even more fearsome by upgrading your attack power.
Having both speed and power, doesn't that sound sweet?
Text_Korean:
以連擊速度快而著稱的你，如果增加攻擊力，那就更可怕了。
您不期待以強大的速度擊中它嗎？

Text_English:
Don't you want to test your new strength?
I'm already excited. The demons will fall in front of you.
Text_Korean:
現在不想測試一下自己更強的戰鬥力嗎？
我很高興想到會像爛木頭一樣倒下的惡魔。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Assassin's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升刺客的戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Assassin's Revenge (3)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">刺客復仇 (3)</>

Text_English:
Assassin, there is a demon you must defeat.
It is a shadow wolverine. /page To become the best assassin, it has been killing off one assassin after another.
It must have attacked your parents, too. Hurry.
Text_Korean:
刺客，你必須消滅一個惡魔。
入侵靈魂城堡的殘酷地精刺客。 /page他迄今為止殺死了其他刺客，成為有史以來最好的刺客。
你的養父母也會攻擊你。快速擺脫它。

Text_English:
This demon would not have defeated your parents.
But you, you are even stronger. /page We know that this was one of the demons that attacked your village.
Your revenge is one step closer to its completion.
Text_Korean:
也許一個殘忍的地精刺客不會打敗你的養父母。
但除此之外，你已經超越了你的養父母。 /page 很明顯，惡魔襲擊了刺客村。
你的複仇進展緩慢。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-5</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Assassin! Defeat the Shadow Wolverine!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-5</> /div<span color="#ffffff">用刺客殺死一個殘忍的地精刺客！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Wizard's Attack Power (3)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">法師強大的戰鬥力（3）</>

Text_English:
If you have potential, shouldn't you try to realize it?
It begins with 나는 그 시작은 공격에 있어. 숨겨진 힘을 확실히 보여주거든.
Text_Korean:
如果你有很大的潛力，你不應該把它拿出來嗎？
我從攻擊開始。它絕對顯示了隱藏的力量。

Text_English:
The demons will fear you one day.
I can't wait to see.
Text_Korean:
有一天惡魔會警告你你的潛力和成長。
我真的很期待。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Wizard's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升法師戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Wizard's Journey (3)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">巫師之旅（三）</>

Text_English:
Wizard, there is a demon that hunts souls using forbidden magic.
I am talking about the goblin wizard. /page Bring an end to its evil treachery.
Text_Korean:
巫師，你沒見過為了禁忌的力量而獵殺靈魂的惡魔嗎？
靈魂城堡中狡猾的地精巫醫。 /page 我們不應該作為魔法守護者受到懲罰嗎？

Text_English:
We are seeing more and more forbidden magic.
You did good today, but you need to prepare for tomorrow.
Text_Korean:
隨著禁忌力量的出現越來越多，你的角色變得越來越重要。
到目前為止，我們取得了巨大的成功，但我們需要為未來做好準備。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-7</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Wizard! Defeat the Goblin Wizard!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-7</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗用法師欺騙你的妖精巫醫！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Fighter's Attack Power (3)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">前鋒的強大戰鬥力 (3)</>

Text_English:
There are times when your powers don't seem to be enough.
Time for an upgrade, no?
Text_Korean:
它看起來很強大，但有時力量還不夠。
你為什麼不增加一點戰鬥力？

Text_English:
With this much power, you will be able to ignore
an all-out attack by your opponent.
Text_Korean: 以這種速度，你對某人的全力攻擊可能對你來說是一個輕而易舉的打擊。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Fighter's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升戰士的戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Fighter's Challenge (3)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">前鋒的挑戰（三）</>

Text_English:
Fighter, there is a demon with the toughest skin and speed.
It is the gargoyle raider. /page Perhaps this was the demon that ambushed your friend.
Defeat the monster and see if it is indeed the one.
Text_Korean:
鬥士，你有沒有遇到過身體和速度都很強的惡魔？
石像鬼，襲擊靈魂城堡的猛攻的襲擊者，就是這樣的惡魔。 /page 也許是惡魔襲擊了你的校友然後消失了。
檢查魔鬼是否適合您的技能。

Text_English:
This gargoyle raider was most likely one of the demons that attacked your friend.
You became strong enough to defeat it. /page But there are still more demons to hunt down.
Keep up the good work!
Text_Korean:
猛攻掠奪者石像鬼一定是襲擊你校友的惡魔之一。
您輕鬆獲勝，因為您變得更強大。 /page 但是攻擊你的師父和校友的惡魔仍然存在。
要對付的人很多，所以不要提前燒掉。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-9</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Fighter! Defeat the Gargoyle Raider!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-9</> /div<span color="#ffffff">作為戰士擊敗猛攻突襲石像鬼！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Pathfinder's Valor (4)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">品牌的勇氣 (4)</>

Text_English:
Remiel seemed to be weakened.
Perhaps that's why Lord Commander Gaius was feeling uneasy. /page I don't know much, but the demons must be part of his concerns.
Could you defeat the demons for us?
Text_Korean:
我很幸運能看到我無法輕易看到的拉米爾，但他看起來很病態。
出於這個原因，蓋烏斯指揮官可能有一張黑臉。 /page 我不確定其他任何事情，但我很確定惡魔是原因之一。
你為什麼不打敗對他們產生不良影響的惡魔？

Text_English:
Your valor is always a marvel.
One day, you will bring us happiness.
Text_Korean:
光明使者的勇敢總是令人驚嘆。
也許如果有人能找到我們的幸福，那就是你。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Skirmish Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Demons!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[子]戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">打敗惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">World Restoration (2)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">淨化世界（二）</>

Text_English:
The death priest was always at the places invaded by the demons.
They may be the ones leading the demons. /page We must strengthen the power of the light.
Defeat the darkness, Pathfinder.
Text_Korean:
死亡祭司出現在惡魔佔領的任何地方。
也許他們正在領導惡魔。 /page 為了對抗他們，我們必須在世界上增加光的力量。
請戰勝黑暗。

Text_English:
There will be a day when the darkness shall fade under the shining light.
We will make sure for that day to come.
Text_Korean:
黑暗過去，光明降臨的那一天終將到來。
我們所有人的力量將能夠實現這一目標。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Skirmish Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Liberate the Area!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">解放每個地區！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">統治者的碎片（3）</>

Azrael的遺物有助於突襲，對抗黑暗的偉大戰鬥。
如果您想積極參與突襲，那麼收集 Azrael 的碎片怎麼樣？

碎片用於文物的推廣，所以不要猶豫，收集它們。
當你晉升時，這將對你的統計數據有很大幫助。
<span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-10</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殺死阿茲瑞爾獲得碎片！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">推廣的必要性（三）</>

在一對一的比賽中，你可以比我贏更多。
因此，可以更快地進行促銷。我對此非常羨慕。與單詞 /page 出現一對一匹配怎麼樣？

這次是不是也得到了很多晉升石？
我再一次感覺到普通的我和英雄是不同的。
<span color="#ffde00">[子]戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">挑戰一對一戰鬥，贏取晉級石！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">Broke 的請求 (3)</>

是時候了。設備的時代又回來了。
這次再次感謝您。質量不重要，所以我希望他們賣得很多。

這次也收穫頗豐。太感謝了。
又到了努力工作的時候了。
<span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">獲取和出售裝備！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gladiator's Training (4)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">角斗士的訓練（四）</>

Text_English:
You are always thinking about victory,
but you know that there is no shortcut. /page Victory shall come one step at a time.
Text_Korean:
你腦子裡只有勝利的念頭。
但你知道沒有快速的方法，對吧？ /page 如果你足夠強大，勝利將屬於你。

Text_English:
You look confident than ever.
Do not compromise with what you are today. You need to become stronger than ever.
Text_Korean:
你的頭看起來有點清醒了。如果你不與自己妥協，
未來的你會比現在強大得多。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Training Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Train Your Gladiator</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 成長任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">升級你的角斗士</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Assassin's Training (4)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">刺客訓練（四）</>

Text_English:
Power comes from the ability to read your opponent's intent.
Try not to miss even the slightest movement.
Text_Korean:
強者是能讀懂對手攻擊的人。
如果你連一個小動作都不錯過，你就不能達到那個地步嗎？

Text_English:
At this rate, you may be able to counter
any of your opponent's attack.
Text_Korean: 是的，如果您像現在這樣練習，您將達到可以對對手的任何動作做出反應的地步。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Training Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Train Your Assassin</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]成長任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">讓我們升級刺客</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Wizard's Training (4)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">法師訓練（四）</>

Text_English:
Power itself is not enough.
You also need to be able to control such power. /page Train yourself until you can control your powers.
Text_Korean:
你不能只專注於發展你的魔法力量。
如果你不能控制強大的魔法力量，那就沒用了。 /page 訓練自己完全掌控。

Text_English:
You are quite strong already.
With the ability to control what you have, you will be invincible one day.
Text_Korean:
你的魔力足夠強大。
如果你訓練能夠完美地使用它，你將變得無敵。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Training Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Train Your Wizard</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]成長任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">讓我們升級巫師</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Fighter's Training (4)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">前鋒訓練（四）</>

Text_English:
You have an unending thirst...
A thirst for power. /page What you need is more practice.
There's nothing better than practice.
Text_Korean:
你總是口渴。
對力量的渴望。 /page 但是在這種情況下，最好重複你一直在做的事情。
沒有什麼比不斷的訓練更好的了。

Text_English:
Anxiety can destroy everything.
Trust yourself. You are strong.
Text_Korean:
不耐煩會破壞已經取得的成就。
相信自己足夠強大。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Training Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Train Your Fighter</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 成長任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升你的戰士等級</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gladiator's War (4)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">角斗士的戰爭（四）</>

Text_English:
Gladiator, do you remember the demon
that destroyed your castle and pillaged your people? /page It is the goblin captain. It needs to be stopped.
Text_Korean: 角斗士，你知道當你的城堡被惡魔入侵時，帶頭的惡魔是誰嗎？ /page 這是地精傭兵團長。你不會譴責那個貪婪的惡魔嗎？

Text_English:
You war will be difficult, but keep treading the path in front of you.
I shall help along the way.
Text_Korean:
你自己的戰爭將是激烈的。但請繼續保持現在的狀態。
如果你偶然發現我的信息，我會幫助你，即使它很弱。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-1</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Gladiator! Defeat the Goblin Captain!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-1</> /div<span color="#ffffff">作為角斗士擊敗地精僱傭兵領袖！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Assassin's Revenge (4)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">刺客復仇 (4)</>

Text_English:
Assassin, it is the goblin archer that led the invasion to your village.
It is time for revenge.
Text_Korean:
刺客，是哥布林弓箭手率領入侵你的村莊。
難道你不應該報復那個與你的敵人沒有什麼不同的惡魔嗎？

Text_English:
These demons, they must all be dealt with.
Be strong. Your revenge will soon be complete.
Text_Korean:
即使你看起來軟弱或微不足道，魔鬼就是魔鬼。
要有一顆堅強的心。你的報復將逐漸結束。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-3</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Assassin! Defeat the Goblin Archer!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-3</> /div<span color="#ffffff">作為刺客擊敗地精弓箭手！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Fighter's Challenge (4)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">前鋒的挑戰（四）</>

Text_English:
Fighter, it is a goblin dagger, the demon that poisoned your teacher.
Bring justice to its treachery.
Text_Korean:
鬥士，暗中毒害你師父的惡魔，是哥布林刺客。
向惡魔展示憤怒的拳頭。

Text_English:
Do not let your guards down. You should always be prepared.
But you don't have to guard against me.
Text_Korean: 不要讓任何惡魔保持警惕。對自己的實力特別自豪的你，要小心了。嘿，別看我那麼可怕。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-6</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Fighter! Defeat the Goblin Dagger!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-6</> /div<span color="#ffffff">用戰士打敗哥布林暗殺領袖！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Wizard's Journey (4)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">巫師之旅（四）</>

Text_English:
Wizard, I know not only that you seek knowledge
but also that you hate dark magic. /page This goblin wizard is using forbidden powers.
Shouldn't you put an end to it?
Text_Korean:
巫師，我知道你喜歡知識的果實，但討厭
魔法，它是黑暗和邪惡的。 /page 你討厭的力量正在被一個地精魔法師使用。
我們不應該停止使用腐化魔法嗎？

Text_English:
More demons are using forbidden magic.
You need to continue your work to protect magic.
Text_Korean:
似乎沒有惡魔會猶豫使用他的邪惡力量。
似乎需要不斷努力來保護知識和魔法。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-8</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Wizard! Defeat the Goblin Wizard!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-8</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗用法師欺騙你的妖精巫醫！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gladiator's Attack Power (4)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">角斗士的戰鬥之力 (4)</>

Text_English:
A leader needs a strong spirit and body.
Increasing your attack power will do just that.
Text_Korean:
領導者必須有堅強的頭腦和強壯的身體。
因此，如果您提高戰鬥力，您將能夠解決這兩個問題。

Text_English:
You have the traits of a leader. Develop those traits.
A great leader supports others in battle. /page Hold everyone together at times of peril.
Your hard work today will help.
Text_Korean:
你具備領導者的素質。讓我們發展這些品質。
一個好的領導者必須能夠支持他的同事。 /page 這是為了抓住你同事的心，這樣他們就不會動搖。
目前的努力將有所幫助。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Gladiator's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升角斗士的戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Assassin's Attack Power (4)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">刺客大作戰 (4)</>

Text_English:
These battles must feel different from assassinations.
There are simply too many enemies. /page What you need more is attack power.
Wouldn't you agree?
Text_Korean:
你現在所經歷的戰鬥將不同於過去的暗殺。
我與很多敵人進行了很多戰鬥。 /page 那樣的話，你應該有適合現在這種戰鬥的戰鬥力。
如果你聽從我的建議，不會有什麼壞處，那你為什麼不試試呢？

Text_English:
You will soon be able to assassinate anyone in battle.
Please make sure that I am not one of your targets.
Text_Korean:
之後，我將達到可以克服目標並自豪地走出去的地步。
這真的很可怕。我希望我可以將其從主題中刪除... .

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Assassin's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升刺客的戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Fighter's Attack Power (4)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">前鋒的強大戰鬥力 (4)</>

Text_English:
Attack power is not just about body strength.
You know that, right? /page You must be able to ignore pain.
I know you can do this.
Text_Korean:
戰鬥力不能簡單地用身體的力量來解釋。
至少你知道，對吧？ /page 感覺不到疼痛的狀態。
你可以做到，所以請一步一步做。

Text_English:
At this rate, you will be able to withstand any attack.
Keep training, and you shall soon be able to ignore pain.
Text_Korean:
如果你是今天的你，你將能夠以赤裸的身體承受打擊。
如果我繼續變得更強壯，我將達到可以忘記痛苦的地步。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Fighter's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升戰士的戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Wizard's Attack Power (4)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">法師強戰（4）</>

Text_English:
You will face stronger enemies soon.
The demons will be able to withstand your attacks. /page You can reverse the tide of the battle using counterattacks.
Can you do it?
Text_Korean:
你將面對越來越強大的惡魔。
那些能夠承受你的魔法並向你走來的人。 /page 那樣的話，就必須接受一定的攻擊，給予強力的反擊。
如果有忍耐的力量就好了。

Text_English:
The power of magic is not just about what one can see.
It needs to be agile and unpredictable as well.
Text_Korean: 其實從外表上看可能並不強大，但神奇的力量並不是你所看到的一切。還有反轉的魅力。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Wizard's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升法師戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Wizard's Journey (5)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">巫師之旅（五）</>

Text_English:
Wizard Vivian was not some weak sorceress.
It pains me to see how she was used by the demons. /page Can you cleanse the corruption left by Vivian?
Purge the evil for us.
Text_Korean:
巫師薇薇安不是被魔鬼愚弄的英雄。
一想到那個靈魂被使用，我就心碎。 /page 你能抹去薇薇安留下的腐敗痕跡嗎？
請從她的地區趕走邪惡。

Text_English:
Thank you for helping me.
I could not simply overcome the pain... All those memories with Vivian... /page I needed your help. Please be safe.
Text_Korean:
一定很難感同身受，但感謝您同意本機構的請求。
這是因為我和她的點點滴滴一直在震撼我的心。 /page 這就是我提出這個要求的原因。我希望你不要死。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-2</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Wizard! Cleanse the Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-2</> /div<span color="#ffffff">用巫師掃蕩該地區的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Assassin's Revenge (5)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">刺客復仇 (5)</>

Text_English:
Assassin Avelin hated the demons so much.
It would not want to remember being used by them. /page Assassin, can you make sure that there is nothing left?
Help Avelin. It will also help with your revenge.
Text_Korean:
刺客艾弗林害怕惡魔，所以我們想抹去靈魂的屈辱和劍對我們的傷害。 /page 刺客，你不會清理它留下的區域嗎？
這是 Avelin 和你的報復。

Text_English:
You surpassed Avelin. In her place,
bring down fear to the demons.
Text_Korean:
你已經超越了艾芙琳。我代表她悲傷地走了，
我希望你能成為給惡魔帶來恐懼的人。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-4</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Assassin! Cleanse the Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-4</> /div<span color="#ffffff">用刺客掃蕩該地區的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Fighter's Challenge (5)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">前鋒的挑戰（5）</>

Text_English:
Your strength and passion reminds me of Jin,
as if you are brothers. /page Just like him, you wouldn't allow a demon lurking around, right?
What do you say? Time to purge the evil.
Text_Korean:
你對力量的渴望和對競爭的強烈渴望似乎很像金。
也許這是所有戰士的習慣。 /page如果惡魔潛伏在那些夢想成為最強者的靈魂所在的地方，
你不會也被打擾嗎？消滅那個地區的邪惡。

Text_English:
If Jin was alive, he would have loved to have a duel with you.
You have raw power, and it needs to be tested all the time. /page You will soon make a name for yourself.
I am delighted to see that day coming near.
Text_Korean:
如果金還活著，他會每天和你一起戰鬥。
您的力量具有狂野和競爭的魅力。 /page Jin 的命運是不幸的，但你是新力量的象徵。
如果你保持堅強，我想我的心會放心。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-7</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Fighter! Cleanse the Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-7</> /div<span color="#ffffff">用戰士掃蕩該地區的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gladiator's War (5)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">角斗士的戰爭（五）</>

Text_English:
Gladiator Zic was a trustworthy leader. He evaded corruption
but had to use the dark power to help you. /page Now that it is all over, it is time
to erase the remnants of evil.
Text_Korean: 角斗士齊克是一個負責任的領導者。所以你從腐敗中解脫出來，但似乎你已經使用了黑暗的力量來幫助你。 /page 既然崇高的角色已經結束，為什麼不抹去殘留在那裡的邪惡痕跡呢？讓它盡可能乾淨。

Text_English:
Gladiator Zic will be proud of your accomplishments,
especially of your hatred against evil. /page Zic was like that, too.
He will be glad to know that you are here, in his place.
Text_Korean:
角斗士，我問你的原因是因為你在很多方面都像 Zeek。
正義的頑固，不容忍邪惡的揮之不去。 /page Zeke 也這樣做了。


您已經擺脫了邪惡的時代，Sieg 將不勝感激。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-9</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Gladiator! Cleanse the Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-9</> /div<span color="#ffffff">作為角斗士掃蕩該地區的邪惡！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">統治者碎片 (4)</>

在團戰中，您可以查看英雄的總和並獲得金幣。
我可以說，這對需要越來越多物資的你會有幫助。 /pageNidhog的遺物有助於團戰。打敗他並收集碎片怎麼樣？

你打得很好。
現在的辛勤工作將在以後得到很大的幫助。
<span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-10</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殺死尼德霍格以獲得碎片！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">推廣的必要性（四）</>
晉升石也可作為其他任務的獎勵，但當您贏得一對一比賽時，您將獲得最多。 /page 在戰力不足的情況下，晉升也是一大助力，那麼來一場一對一的戰鬥怎麼樣？

像鸚鵡一樣大喊你已經知道的東西很尷尬，但很難始終如一地練習最基本的東西。 /page 當我快要忘記的時候，你不告訴我嗎？
用可怕的表情看著你，看起來不像。
<span color="#ffde00">[子]戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">挑戰一對一戰鬥，贏取晉級石！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">布羅克的請求（四）</>

隨著戰鬥的加劇，我們需要的物資也在增加。
所以...對不起，如果我增加您要求的數量可以嗎？

即使在激烈的戰鬥中也非常感謝您這樣做。
別擔心，我不會忘記恩典。
<span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">獲取和出售裝備！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gladiator's Training (5)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">角斗士的訓練（五）</>

Text_English:
There is still a long way to go if you want to rebuild your kingdom.
The darkness must recede. /page For that, you need power.
Don't stop now. Keep training.
Text_Korean:
要實現重建王國的夢想，您還有很長的路要走。
只有在黑暗消退的那一天才能實現。 /page 那天我需要你的力量。
不要停在這裡，更加努力地工作。

Text_English:
You are gradually getting there.
I look forward to the day when the restoration is complete.
Text_Korean:
我逐漸獲得了實現夢想的力量。
我也想看看你重建的王國。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Training Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Train Your Gladiator</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 成長任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">升級你的角斗士</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Assassin's Training (5)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">刺客訓練（五）</>

Text_English: Can you defeat the monsters? But these demons will be difficult to deal with. /page Work harder and make sure that you can.
Text_Korean: 魔物現在能打敗他們嗎？但是狡猾的惡魔會很棘手。 /page 我們不應該也能和他們戰鬥嗎？

Text_English:
Good. There will be more challenges ahead,
but you will eventually surpass them.
Text_Korean:
是的，你做得很好。阻擋你前進的牆將繼續出現。
但你將能夠克服它。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Training Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Train Your Assassin</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]成長任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">讓我們升級刺客</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Wizard's Training (5)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">法師訓練（五）</>

Text_English:
A strong mind is crucial for sharpening your magic.
Your mind needs to be trained as such. /page You can start by solving difficult puzzles.
Text_Korean:
精神力量對於使魔力更強大很重要。
精神力量是通過紀律和紀律通過解決難題來完善的。 /page 你為什麼不先嘗試解決一個難題呢？

Text_English:
Once your mind is on par with your body,
you will be able to use stronger magic.
Text_Korean: 是的，如果你通過紀律來完善你的精神力量，你將能夠使用更強大的魔法力量。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Training Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Train Your Wizard</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]成長任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">讓我們升級巫師</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Fighter's Training (5)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">前鋒訓練（五）</>

Text_English:
Your physical training is near completion,
but you still need to train your inner powers. /page Time to concentrate on balance and refinement.
Text_Korean: 身體的力量似乎已經完成了一定程度，但我認為技術的複雜性和內在的力量需要進一步發展。 /page 修剪一下怎麼樣？

Text_English:
I understand that you want to become stronger quickly,
but there is always an order to things. /page There is still a lot of work to do. Keep working.
Text_Korean: 想要快速變強可能會有些不耐煩，但凡事都有秩序。 /page 你還有很大的變強空間，所以一步一步來。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Training Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Train Your Fighter</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 成長任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升你的戰士等級</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Pathfinder's Valor (5)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">品牌價值 (5)</>

Text_English:
I was moved to see Arin
fighting against the darkness and the demons. /page We must help her make sure that the world is no longer controlled by evil.
Would you help me?
Text_Korean:
看到像阿林這樣的人努力驅散黑暗，我印象非常深刻。他似乎淨化了黑暗。 /page惡魔必須消失，阿林才能淨化世界。
你能幫我嗎？

Text_English:
Thank you. I hope Arin succeeds.
I am sure that the world will be restored soon.
Text_Korean:
謝謝。也祝阿琳大人成功。
有了你，世界的淨化似乎做得很好。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Skirmish Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Demons!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[子]戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">打敗惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">World Restoration (3)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">淨化世界（三）</>

Text_English:
The death priests are definitely up to something.
I'm just scared we don't know what it is. /page Please chase away the fear lingering in the area.
Your valor will inspire others including us.
Text_Korean:
死亡祭司必須有一個目的。
但我更害怕不知道。 /page移除被黑暗浪潮掃蕩的恐懼痕跡。
看到您的勇氣，我們將能夠創造更大的力量。

Text_English:
You have the ability to inspire others.
Thank you for letting us find our courage.
Text_Korean:
你似乎有能力給別人很大的勇氣。
非常感謝你給了我不被動搖的勇氣。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Skirmish Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Liberate the Area!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">解放每個地區！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gladiator's Attack Power (5)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">角斗士的戰鬥之力 (5)</>

Text_English:
With great power comes great responsibility."
It is a quote from a hero from a faraway land... /page Anyway, I think you have great responsibility but not enough power in comparison.
You need to become more powerful.
Text_Korean:
我聽說過，權力越大，責任越大。
這是偉大英雄的叔叔講述了這個故事。 /page 哎呀，我錯過了這個故事。相反，與偉大的責任相比，你是軟弱的。
你為什麼不試著增加你的力量，就像你強烈的責任感一樣？

Text_English:
It is great to see you making use of your stronger aspects.
I am sure that you will be a great hero someday.
Text_Korean:
用自己的優勢開拓其他領域是一種很好的態度。
我相信你會成為一個更好的英雄。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Gladiator's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升角斗士的戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Assassin's Attack Power (5)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">刺客大作戰 (5)</>

Text_English:
Assassins need to be quick and determined.
It is no longer an assassination if it takes time. /page Increase your attack power to ensure your speedy battles.
Text_Korean:
對於刺客來說，快速可靠地擺脫他們的目標很重要。
因為需要的時間越長，它就不再是暗殺。 /page 如果戰鬥時間很長，那麼增加你的戰鬥力怎麼樣？

Text_English:
You are becoming a great assassin.
Remember, the ultimate assassins do not even realize the kill.
Text_Korean:
憑藉出色的品質，您將成為一名更有成就的刺客。
重要的是要記住，您必須不知道您暗殺了自己的事實。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Assassin's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升刺客的戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Wizard's Attack Power (5)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">法師強大的戰鬥力（5）</>

Text_English:
Your battle style is to defeat the enemies before they come near.
Without sufficient attack power, you may not be able to keep up.
Text_Korean:
你的戰鬥風格是在敵人靠近之前將其擊敗，對吧？
如果戰鬥力低，戰鬥中心可能會動搖，那麼為什麼不嘗試提高它呢？

Text_English:
Attack powers reflect the power of your magic.
You will be able to become a powerful wizard.
Text_Korean:
提升你的戰鬥力，與讓你的魔力更強大有關。
您可以成為更強大的巫師。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Wizard's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升法師戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Fighter's Attack Power (5)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">前鋒的強大戰鬥力 (5)</>

Text_English:
Your vengeance will grow stronger
until you finally defeat the demons that murdered your teacher and friends… /page But without power, it may all be in vain.
Train harder and master your vengeance.
Text_Korean:
因為你的報復，你的勝利慾望一定會增強。
除非你打敗了傷害你的主人和同事的惡魔，否則你不會輸... . /page 但是，缺乏競爭的力量只是來了。
您為什麼不嘗試發展適合您的心而不會失去的力量？

Text_English:
You know well that conceit and power do not go side by side.
Don't let vengeance take over as you continue your adventure.
Text_Korean:
知道驕傲和力量成反比是你的力量。
但隨著我變得更強大，我不想被復仇所吞噬。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Fighter's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升戰士的戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Pathfinder's Valor (6)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">品牌的勇氣 (6)</>

Text_English:
Arin will soon start the cleansing ritual.
Help her by defeating the demons.
Text_Korean:
看來艾琳很快就要開始淨化儀式了。
我希望你這次能幫助阿林再次擊敗惡魔。

Text_English:
Good job. I mean, well done.
I really do mean it!
Text_Korean:
你真的做得很好。啊!而我沒有自私。
好吧，我只是因為害怕誤解才說出來的。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Skirmish Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Demons!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[子]戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">打敗惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">World Restoration (4)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">淨化世界（四）</>

Text_English:
Thanks to you, we are able to restore more areas.
Keep purging the darkness.
Text_Korean:
感謝您的努力，淨化的領域正在擴大。
請去除黑暗和死亡的痕跡，讓我們更加勇敢。

Text_English: Thank you for giving us the courage to restore the world again.
Text_Korean: 非常感謝你們繼續淨化世界的勇氣。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Skirmish Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Liberate the Area!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">解放每個地區！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">統治者碎片 (5)</>

你現在比你第一次見到我時強多了。
你想看看嗎？ /page 擊敗卡里古拉並獲得碎片。
您會發現自己立即取得了勝利。

你不高興看到增加的力量嗎？你會變得越來越強大。
收集碎片，因為卡利古拉的遺物有助於英雄塔。
<span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-10</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗卡利古拉獲得碎片！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">推廣的必要性（五）</>

這些天一對一比賽的勝率是多少？不是越來越難嗎？
然後，這是您迫切需要統計數據的時候，因此請嘗試獲得晉升石。

收集哪怕是一點點晉升石，都比現在的失敗更重要。
最終，失敗將變成勝利。
<span color="#ffde00">[子]戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">挑戰一對一戰鬥，贏取晉級石！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">Broke 的請求 (5)</>

想想看，我不是要你這樣烤。
您賺錢並獲得獎勵。 /page 好吧，不要那樣轉身。穆，當然，對不起……
所以我求你了，拜託... .

所以這是你的獎勵，咳咳！哦不，不要冷冷的轉身。
下次我會照顧你的。無論如何，你是戰鬥的那個人...... .
<span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">獲取和出售裝備！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gladiator's Training (6)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">角斗士的訓練（6）</>

Text_English:
The darkness has descended upon us,
but thankfully, you are here. /page These demons are going to be much stronger than before.
You need to be stronger as well.
Text_Korean:
終有一天，黑暗將降臨世界……
我什至不想考慮，但我很高興你回來了。 /page 但是今天的惡魔比以前強大得多。
您必須變得更強大才能克服它。

Text_English:
You must become stronger to defeat the darkness.
One day, your kingdom will rise once more.
Text_Korean:
你必須不斷變得更強大才能消除這種黑暗。
當那一天到來時，您也將能夠重建您的王國。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Training Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Train Your Gladiator</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 成長任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">升級你的角斗士</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Assassin's Training (6)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">刺客訓練（6）</>

Text_English:
You are late. I was waiting for you…
The demons have taken control of the world. /page It will be difficult to defeat them at this stage.
You need to become stronger.
Text_Korean:
你怎麼這麼晚才回來？我一直在等你...
現在更強大的惡魔正在佔領世界。 /page 看起來你現在很難把它們弄出來。你必須比
強。

Text_English:
If you sought strength for personal victory,
now you must do so to survive. /page I am sorry to keep you on this path.
But you must understand. You are the hope for all of us.
Text_Korean:
如果你以前為了不輸而努力變強，
從現在開始，你必須變強才能戰勝更強大的東西。 /page 很抱歉讓你走在艱難的道路上。
請理解，我們別無選擇，只能依靠你們，所有人的希望。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Training Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Train Your Assassin</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]成長任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">讓我們升級刺客</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Wizard's Training (6)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">法師訓練（六）</>

Text_English:
Did you find the secrets to the power of magic?
You have potential to become stronger. /page The darkness is getting thicker.
Show us the magic that will shatter such thickness.
Text_Korean:
你找到神奇力量的秘密了嗎？
看來你現在有發展你的魔力的空間。 /page 與此同時，黑暗變得更加黑暗。
向我展示可以驅散濃重黑暗的魔力。

Text_English:
I was mistaken. You have potential and talent.
Be stronger. The darkness is growing fast.
Text_Korean:
我急於想到你的極限。我可以更強大
變得更強大。黑暗的力量比你想像的還要強大。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Training Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Train Your Wizard</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]成長任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">讓我們升級巫師</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Fighter's Training (6)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">前鋒訓練（6）</>

Text_English:
Did you find balance between mind, body, and soul?
Perhaps you are not quite there yet. /page You wouldn't be here if you did.
But keep trying. The darkness is behind us.
Text_Korean:
你所說的身心，你是否與萬物和諧相處？
我有一種我無法理解的力量，但我想我還沒有實現它。 /page 你會從你所說的中獲得很多力量。
目前的黑暗只能通過獲得那種力量來打敗，所以繼續努力。

Text_English:
In the past, I was careful not to be hasty about training.
But things are different now. Do whatever it takes.
Text_Korean:
以前擔心你不耐煩，所以勸你慢慢變強。
但現在情況不同了。動員一切手段。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Training Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Train Your Fighter</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 成長任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升你的戰士等級</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Pathfinder's Valor (7)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">品牌的勇氣 (7)</>

Text_English:
I feel much confident these days
killing those low demons with my friends. /page The powerful ones, well, we cannot face them yet.
Can you help us?
Text_Korean:
這些天我似乎也有很大的勇氣。
因此，與盟友一起，弱小的惡魔被擊敗了。 /page 但是即使我們齊心協力，強大的惡魔也很難對付。
馬上就是淨化儀式了，你為什麼不介入呢？

Text_English:
Like you, I shall train and become much stronger
to be of greater use.
Text_Korean:
如果我們跟隨你，成長更多的力量，那將更有幫助。
有助於淨化儀式...哦！不。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Skirmish Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Demons!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[子]戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">打敗惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">World Restoration (5)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">淨化世界（五）</>

Text_English:
I'm trying to keep Remiel's protection light stable.
Defeat the demons that are trying to weaken it.
Text_Korean:
我正在努力維持雷米爾大人創造的保護之光。
擊敗削弱光明力量的黑暗勢力。

Text_English:
The light shall be intact, thanks to you.
Pathfinder, continue your journey of the light.
Text_Korean:
多虧了你，我不認為光的力量會消失。
光之使者，請繼續打造光之道。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Skirmish Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Liberate the Area!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">解放每個地區！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">推廣的必要性（六）</>

似乎一場更大的戰斗在等待著。
那麼，在那之前獲得晉升怎麼樣？ /page 在一對一比賽中獲得晉級石。

提前準備好面對強大的敵人是很重要的。
我希望您不要忘記促銷就是其中之一。
<span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">挑戰一對一戰鬥，贏取晉級石！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">Broke 的請求 (6)</>

不知何故，我認為你很快就會開始一場更艱難的戰鬥。
請給我力量，我們也會幫助... . /page 那麼，在那之前，你能幫我一個忙嗎？
我認為很難看到，所以請聽我的要求。
謝謝。出於某種原因，我有一種感覺，我們會比以前更頻繁地看到它。哎呀。
<span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">獲取和出售裝備！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gladiator's Attack Power (7)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">角斗士的戰鬥之力 (7)</>

Text_English:
You keep your weapons sharp.
That helps in terms of attack power. Let's see what you got.
Text_Korean:
你經常磨刀以增加它的力量和壽命。
我認為這與增加戰鬥力有關。想要查看結果？

Text_English: I knew it. Keep training your body and mind, and be prepared for battle!
Text_Korean: 我認為這是可能的，因為你的身心時刻準備著戰鬥。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Gladiator's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升角斗士的戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Assassin's Attack Power (7)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">刺客威武 (7)</>

Text_English:
Don't worry about falling behind. You are doing fine.
If you want, you can always increase your attack power.
Text_Korean:
不要再擔心會打擾你的同事。你做得足夠好。
如果你感到不安，增加你的戰鬥力，增加你的自信心。

Text_English:
You deserve more confidence.
Your comrades will not suffer what you had to go through.
Text_Korean:
足夠自信也沒關係。
別擔心，你的同事不會像你的家人一樣經歷分手。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Assassin's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升刺客攻擊</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Wizard's Attack Power (7)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">法師強大的戰鬥力（7）</>

Text_English:
You are good at using your magic weapons but not power itself.
Keep training to increase your potential.
Text_Korean:
你很好地使用了魔法武器，但你似乎還沒有使用你的全部力量。
如果你能把那個力量抽出來，你的戰鬥力會更高，怎麼樣？

Text_English:
Your powers will grow as you listen to your weapons howl.
Your magic and wisdom will grow as much.
Text_Korean:
如果您聆聽並回應武器或盔甲的聲音，您將能夠產生更多的力量。
我認為它會幫助你發展你的魔法和智慧。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Wizard's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升法師戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Fighter's Attack Power (7)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">前鋒的強大戰鬥力 (7)</>

Text_English:
The powers you seek is different from magic.
It is something beyond human. /page I am surprised how you do it. Can you show me more?
Text_Korean:
我認為你使用的力量不像魔法或類似的東西。
我不太了解，但它似乎在使用借用比人類更高的力量的魔法。 /page 你能增強這種力量真是太神奇了。你不給我看嗎我的意思是更多的權力。

Text_English: With more training, you will surpass the demons for sure.
Text_Korean: 如果你進一步訓練這種力量，你甚至可以超越魔鬼。這是驚人的。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Fighter's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升戰士的戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Pathfinder's Valor (8)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">品牌的勇氣 (8)</>

Text_English:
For me, this may be the last time that I ask for help.
They say that I might be reassigned. /page So please defeat the demons one last time.
Text_Korean:
也許這將是我最後一次親自借用你的勇氣。
有人說我的職位發生了變化。 /page 所以請幫我一個忙，打敗惡魔。

Text_English:
I don't know when I will see you again,
but I will not forget what we've done so far. /page I will work harder wherever I go.
Thank you for everything.
Text_Korean:
很遺憾，我可能無法見到您或幫助阿琳大人，但我永遠不會忘記我們一起做過的事情。 /page 我會以更大的力量更努力地戰鬥。
非常感謝您幫助我。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Skirmish Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Demons!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[子]戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">打敗惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">World Restoration (6)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">淨化世界（六）</>

Text_English:
Can you feel the darkness growing stronger?
It is weird, despite all your efforts. /page The demons are probably up to something.
I need to concentrate more on the restoration. Purge the demons.
Text_Korean:
有沒有感覺到黑暗的力量越來越強大？
奇怪的是，儘管你的表演令人眼花繚亂，黑暗的力量卻沒有減弱。 /page 他們似乎在做一些我們不知道的事情。
我需要加快淨化儀式。請剷除邪惡。

Text_English:
I can see that you know what you are doing.
Yes. We must persevere and continue treading our paths. /page Defeat the darkness. I shall pray for the light.
Text_Korean:
的確，你顯然正在走你應該走的道路，而不會動搖。
沒錯。我們必須走自己的路，不要被未知的不確定性所克服。 /page 我希望光明，因為你不會停止驅散黑暗。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Skirmish Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Liberate the Area!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">解放每個地區！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Darkness Reborn</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">強化黑暗復活</>

Text_English:
You're alive! I'm glad that you're back.
Do you know what happened? /page The demons retook all of the areas outside Elysium.
They are stronger, and now, they are attacking Elysium. /page Now that you're here, it is time for a counterattack.
Help us retake Luemos first.
Text_Korean:
你還活著！我很高興你回來了。
你知道發生了什麼嗎？首先，讓我告訴你情況。 /page惡魔們強勢復活，佔領了除了極樂世界之外的所有地區。
現在惡魔正在攻擊極樂世界。 /page 我們只是為自己辯護，但現在你回來了，輪到我們反擊了。
請從最近的 Ruemos 取回它。

Text_English:
Thank you. You are indeed a great help.
The demons become stronger, so we must tread carefully. /page You need to train harder and become even more powerful.
I will report to Gaius.
Text_Korean:
你受苦了。的確，你的力量變成了偉大的意志。
但是，隨著惡魔變得更強大和復活，預計會遇到困難。 /page你的實力很強，但你應該努力變強。
我會向蓋烏斯報告情況。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-1 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-1 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">The Counterattack</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">使者的反擊</>

Text_English:
This time, everyone is fighting against the darkness.
Even without Remiel, we know what to do now. /page Thanks to you, we have the courage to fight.
We almost lost everything again, but it is time to take them back.
Text_Korean:
如果和之前有什麼不同的話，即使拉​​米爾大人不在，
大家也齊心協力，擋住了黑暗的攻擊。 /page 感謝您對我的鼓勵。然而，在極樂世界以外的地區……
到目前為止，我們一直在拼命阻止，但現在你已經到達，輪到你收回它了。

Text_English:
Survivors have taken refuge in Elysium.
Everyone is trying to protect this place. /page Our focus on defense blinded us from detecting the source of the darkness,.
but we will now be able to find it.
Text_Korean:
其他地區的倖存者逃往極樂世界。
但是，他們正在保護極樂世界免受一起變得更加強大的黑暗。 /page由於我所有的防禦努力，我找不到惡魔復活和力量的來源
但是現在你在那裡，我可以認出它。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-2 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-2 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gladiator's War (6)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">角斗士的戰爭（6）</>

Text_English:
Gladiator, I'm so glad you returned. Things are not looking good.
Without Gratia, we don't know much about the new demons, /page but I will do my best to help.
Right now, the sword captain has returned. /page It is now attacking Elysium. You must defeat him.
Text_Korean:
角斗士，我很高興你回來了。事情並不順利。
現在格拉齊亞消失了，與過去有關的惡魔的信息也被切斷了。 /page 所以現在我要把它給你。請讓其他英雄知道。
踐踏你王國的黑暗骷髏騎士隊長也復活了。 /page 他們試圖踐踏極樂世界。請消滅那個惡魔。

Text_English:
They just keep coming back...
Such twisted fate. /page But you will not stop, right?
If so, I shall assist.
Text_Korean:
給予審判的魔鬼必須復活並再次審判......
我認為這是一個卑鄙而悲傷的命運。 /page 但是你不會停下來嗎？
如果你不能停下來，我會幫你快速完成。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-1 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Gladiator! Defeat the Sword Captain!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-1 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">作為角斗士擊敗黑暗骷髏騎士隊長！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Taking Back</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">收回被盜區域</>

Text_English:
Commander Gaius was glad to hear about your return.
I should've told him faster… Well, he's been quite busy. /page He is with the magic council investigating the return of the darkness.
He asks to take care of the demons in Luemos for now.
Text_Korean:
啊!想想看，蓋烏斯對你的重生很滿意。
我應該早點告訴你...其實，總司令現在很忙。 /pageElysium 我們正在尋找由魔法委員會加強的黑暗復活的原因。
您已要求 Ruemos 擊敗復活的惡魔。

Text_English:
Great job. I think we will soon see the lord commander.
He may tell us about his investigation.
Text_Korean:
感謝你的付出。總司令可能很快就會見到你。
如果你發現了什麼，你說你會把它傳給我。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-3 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-3 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">The Investigation</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">研究復活的原因</>

Text_English:
Gaius said that
it will take time to figure out the exact cause. /page For some reason, the natural order has been tampered...
Did that sound like him? He also said that retaking more areas will help.
Text_Korean:
蓋烏斯傳達了信息。嗯……
要找出確切的原因需要很多時間。 /page 我猜出於某種原因，大自然的天意被強行扭曲了。
相似嗎？你開墾的區域越多，它就越有幫助。

Text_English:
There's a reason why retaking areas help.
Unknown ripples of power grow stronger at the inner areas. /page We think that it is these powers that are causing the disruption.
The ripples are strongest at the boss areas.
Text_Korean:
收回該地區是有幫助的。
據說未知力的波長越深，它就越強。 /page 我猜這股力量正在扭曲大自然的天意。
因此這意味著該區域的頭部所在的波長最強。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-4 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-4 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Assassin's Revenge (6)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">刺客復仇 (6)</>

Text_English:
Assassin, I'm so glad to see you again.
Did the Gladiator tell you? I'm here in place of Gratia. /page The demon, Rattus, has returned.
Defeat it. Avenge the deaths of your village.
Text_Korean:
刺客，很高興再次見到你。
你聽到了嗎，角斗士？我代表格拉齊亞大人通知你…… /page 通知你 Darkstalker Ratus 的複活。
一個殘酷地襲擊你家鄉人民的惡魔。請懲罰他。

Text_English:
Going through the painful past…
What cruelty is this... /page But I am sure that our travails will be rewarded.
Text_Korean:
必須以惡魔的複活再次報仇......
我認為命運是殘酷的。 /page 但是振作起來。在磨難結束時，會有獎勵。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-3 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Assassin! Defeat Rattus!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-3 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">作為刺客消滅暗獵者拉圖斯！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gote's Peace</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">哥特人的真正休息... </>

Text_English:
It's tragic to see Gote held again by the darkness.
I hope he can rest peacefully once and for all.
Text_Korean:
最可悲的是哥特從黑暗中復活。
我希望他不再受苦並找到真正的休息。

Text_English:
Going through this again is painful… May your soul rest in peace…
Gote's resurrection is truly tragic.
Text_Korean:
我不知道為什麼悲劇會重演。
我不喜歡哥特的複活，即使這是揭示權力原因的重要現象。 /page 順便說一句...為什麼復活的哥特人不認識你？
這有點奇怪。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-5 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-5 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">A Hero's Return</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">英雄歸來</>

Text_English:
Remember that time I got reassigned?
I am now actually under the lord commander's personal unit. /page I'm just happy that I can help you and Arin…
I've been waiting for a long time.
Text_Korean:
你還記得過去當我後悔要改變自己的立場的時候嗎？
事實上，職位已經改成了直屬總司令的士兵。 /page我很高興認為我可以繼續幫助你和Arin......
我等著你宣布消息，但我很傷心你沒有回來。

Text_English:
I'm just glad you returned. And thank you.
You stand right next to my grandfather as a true hero. /page Everyone, including myself, believed in your return.
We knew that the pathfinder will rise again.
Text_Korean:
但我很高興你以這種方式回來。謝謝你。
有一天你會成為取代我祖父的英雄。 /page 現在被黑暗籠罩，光明使者回來了，每個人，包括我自己，都相信光明很快就會回來。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Elysium</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Conversation with Hunt</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 極樂世界</> /div<span color="#ffffff">與亨特交談</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Why We Fight</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">前進的目的</>

Text_English:
It seems that Caligula came back as well.
He is at the place where the unknown ripple of power is the strongest. /page Taking him out will help our investigation.
Hurry, let's head to central Luemos.
Text_Korean:
你知道嗎卡利古拉似乎也復活了。
卡里古拉是未知力量波最強的地方。擺脫 /page 字符將使您更接近確定原因。
您必須快點前往 Ruemos 的深處。

Text_English:
We might arrive faster if you are stronger.
I mean, the demons are stronger now. /page I am worried as we move inward.
There must be something really terrifying.
Text_Korean:
如果你的力量變得更強，那麼到達那裡會更容易和更快。
不是你弱，而是邪惡越來越強。 /page 但是另一方面，我們越接近原因，我們就越可怕。
因為感覺就像在等待可怕的事情。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-6 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-6 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Fighter's Challenge (6)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">前鋒的挑戰（6）</>

Text_English:
Fighter, I knew that you would return.
So, here's the latest. /page Silvermane has returned, and he's become stronger than before.
Interested?
Text_Korean:
我不認識其他人，但我認為戰鬥機會回來。
我相信你已經聽說過，所以我會給你一些關於魔鬼的信息。 /page 擁有強大力量和身體的銀色鬃毛以更大的力量復活。
這還不足以吸引您嗎？

Text_English:
Stronger but, well, not as strong as you.
But don't get too comfortable. There are plenty more ahead.
Text_Korean:
就算你變強了，銀鬃毛也不是你的對手。
但不要保持警惕。因為有很多強大的對手。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-6 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Fighter! Defeat Silvermane!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-6 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">作為戰士擊退獨眼攻擊者銀鬃！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Toward the Tip of Luemos…</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">Ruemos 的盡頭... </>

Text_English:
I remember looking for Lord Alfrid after losing Gote.
You fought well. /page It was an inspiring battle.
We are getting closer to Caligula. Get ready.
Text_Korean:
我記得我失去了哥特並去尋找領主的時候。
您勇敢地戰鬥而沒有氣餒。 /page 不管結果如何。它給我們留下了深刻的印象。
我越來越接近卡里古拉了。我希望你堅強。

Text_English:
Your victory shines even brighter against the empowered darkness.
We will follow you, Pathfinder.
Text_Korean:
你從更強大的黑暗中取得勝利真是太好了。
我們將默默地跟隨你，光導。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-7 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-7 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Rachel's Death</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">小人的死亡折磨！ </>

Text_English:
This is where Rachel used to be.
It seems like she came back as well. /page We must bring her down once more.
Text_Korean:
這就是雷切爾所在的地方，她給我們帶來了很多痛苦。
但是，小人似乎也復活了。 /pageFor Rachel，讓復活成為重燃死亡痛苦的詛咒。

Text_English:
The demons that stand in front of you again will be very unlucky.
I hope they suffer... /page I was relieved to see that Lord Alfrid did not have to come back
like Gote…
Text_Korean:
站在你面前的惡魔會覺得複活是一種詛咒。
我希望惡魔受苦更多，因為他們不知道復活的原因。 /page 另一方面，我認為領主沒有像哥特那樣經歷痛苦的​​復活是幸運的。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-8 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-8 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Wizard's Journey (6)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">巫師之旅（六）</>

Text_English:
Wizard, thank you for coming back. I need to tell you something.
It's about Rachel. /page Didn't the Gladiator tell you? Not really good friends?
Anyway, Rachel's revival is never a good sign. Defeat her.
Text_Korean:
巫師，我很高興你回來了。我有件事要告訴你。
這是關於雷切爾，與你有關的惡魔。 /page 你沒聽到角斗士的消息嗎？你們關係不好？
無論如何，瑞秋的複活只會刺激你的心，所以打敗它。

Text_English:
I wish the dark magic would be gone forever.
You can do it.
Text_Korean:
我祈禱你討厭的黑暗魔法會消失。
嚮導可以做到。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-8 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Wizard! Defeat Dark Rachel!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-8 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">用巫師擊敗黑暗邪惡的瑞秋！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Pass the Gate</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">網關中斷</>

Text_English:
The demons from Luemos were invading Elysium,
but they stopped as soon as you returned. /page You made a difference.
The gate is near. Take back what is ours.
Text_Korean:
擁有 Ruemos 的惡魔繼續入侵極樂世界，但在你回來後他們的入侵停止了，反擊開始了。 /pageOther 惡魔繼續攻擊，但你做出了改變。
很快，它就是門戶，所以勇敢地突破並找到榮耀。

Text_English:
You did well. Resistance must have been strong.
I can feel that your strength is growing. /page I hope it continues so you can liberate other areas.
Text_Korean:
門口的阻力一定很大，但你克服得很好。
我覺得你越來越強壯了。 /page我希望你所做的改變也能吞噬其他當地惡魔的攻擊。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-9 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-9 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Caligula and the Ripple</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">卡利古拉和能量波</>

Text_English:
Thanks to your help, the magic council has found something.
Lord Gaius asks for a little more of your help. /page I ask you, too. Defeat Caligula.
Lead the light and correct the reality.
Text_Korean:
看來你通過自己的努力，在魔法議會中發現了一些關於波的東西。
高級指揮官要求你給它更多的力量。 /page 我也想問一下。擊敗卡里古拉。
並引導光來糾正扭曲的現實。

Text_English:
You taught Caligula the pain of death once more.
The ripple was sensed by the magic council. /page Soon, the lord commander will tell us something.
Well done indeed.
Text_Korean:
你讓卡利古拉再次嚐到了死亡的痛苦。
而且，魔法議會似乎也感應到了當時產生的力量波動。 /page 總司令很快就會告訴你一些事情。
非常感謝。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-10 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat Caligula, Contain the Ripple!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-10 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗卡利古拉獲得一波力量！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Pathfinder's Struggle (1)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">使者之爭（一）</>

Text_English:
You are the only one who can rekindle the fading light.
I sense greater danger against the empowered darkness, /page but we will not give in.
I'm sorry to burden you, but you must defeat our enemies.
Text_Korean:
你是唯一能把在黑暗之風中搖曳的小光帶回來的人。
我們預計在處理更強烈的黑暗時會比以前遇到更大的困難。 /page 但是，我們不會輸，並嘗試重振希望之光。
很抱歉給你帶來沉重的負擔，但請贏。

Text_English:
Your struggles against stronger enemies will continue,
but your battles will help the light shine again.
Text_Korean:
既然敵人變強了，你的鬥爭預計還會繼續。
但是，您的奮鬥將極大地幫助重振希望之光。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Skirmish Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Demons!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[子]戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">打敗惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Reviving the Light (1)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">重振希望之光（一）</>

Text_English:
Without Remiel, the light is barely surviving
against the empowered darkness. /page I intend to revive the light, but we must weaken the darkness first.
Defeat the demons and quell their evil powers.
Text_Korean:
現在，拉米爾大人消失了，黑暗的面紗籠罩了世界，光幾乎沒有保持脈搏。 /page 我們希望讓光的力量重新煥發生機。這只有在邪惡的能量被削弱時才有可能。
擊敗惡魔並擺脫它們散發的邪惡能量。

Text_English:
With your help and our continuous effort,
the light will shine bright again.
Text_Korean:
如果您的活動和我們的努力不停止，
黑暗將會被解除，光明的世界將會到來。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Skirmish Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Liberate the Area!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">解放每個地區！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gladiator's Attack Power (8)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">角斗士的戰鬥之力 (8)</>

Text_English:
You are our only hope. The world is once again taken by the darkness.
You need to be stronger, however. /page The demons are much stronger now.
Text_Korean:
現在世界已經陷入黑暗，你是唯一的希望。
但以目前的水平，似乎很難擊敗更強大的惡魔。 /page 你必須提高你的戰鬥力來戰勝更強大的惡魔。

Text_English:
I am sorry to burden you, but you cannot stop now.
Keep training and change your fate.
Text_Korean: 對不起，我讓你的肩膀很重。但是，如果我們對目前的水平感到滿意，就很難改變我們的未來，所以希望你們繼續訓練。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Gladiator's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升角斗士的戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Assassin's Attack Power (8)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">刺客大作戰 (8)</>

Text_English:
You are a shining light piercing through the grip of darkness.
If you stop now, you will shine no more. Train harder.
Text_Korean:
你是從黑暗的掌控中滲出的光芒。
但如果你現在停下來，它可能會變成一道被吞沒的光。你必須更堅強

Text_English:
I see no limit in your efforts.
Perhaps you can outshine the darkness after all.
Text_Korean:
不斷變強的你，看不到極限。
如果我變得更強大，我寧願吞下黑暗。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Assassin's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升刺客的戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Wizard's Attack Power (8)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">法師強大的戰鬥力（8）</>

Text_English:
Only you can bring back the light against the darkness,
but you need to train harder to protect the light.
Text_Korean:
你是唯一能給黑暗籠罩的世界帶來光明的人。
如果你不變得比現在更強大，你將無法保護光明。

Text_English:
I can almost see you saving the day.
Prove me right. Be stronger than ever.
Text_Korean:
我可以看到你帶來了光明。
請繼續變得更強大，並證明我沒有白白看到任何東西。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Wizard's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升法師戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Fighter's Attack Power (8)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">前鋒的強大戰鬥力 (8)</>

Text_English:
Your strength can crush the demon horde,
but there are even stronger demons now. You need to train harder.
Text_Korean:
你強壯的身軀，就連如烏雲一般聚集的魔族，也會被碾碎。
但對於那些深陷黑暗的人來說，這一定很困難。你必須更堅強

Text_English:
Even hellfire would not be able to stop you. Don't stop your training...
I wish that you become stronger than ever.
Text_Korean:
你有足夠的力量抵擋地獄的火焰。請不要停止練習... .
我希望你，我們的希望，將繼續變得更強大。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Fighter's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升戰士的戰鬥力</>
<span color="#ffffff">統治者的黑暗（一）</>

更深的黑暗籠罩著今天的統治者。
黑暗將住在他們的碎片中。 /page 現在惡魔已經消退，在黑暗升起之前，
擊敗卡利古拉並帶來碎片。

看來我們的預測是正確的。
雕塑中感受到的黑暗似乎更強烈。 /page 這場戰鬥必須繼續。
我希望它可以幫助您變得更強大。
<span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-10 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗卡利古拉獲得碎片！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">推廣的重要性（一）</>

光明使者似乎上升了很多。
但仍有待提升的階段。 /page對抗更強大的黑暗，你為什麼不停下來進一步前進並建立你的統計數據？

留在晉升階段意味著您的統計數據可以進一步上升。
這意味著希望還有很多潛力，所以請繼續努力。
<span color="#ffde00">[子]戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">挑戰一對一戰鬥，贏取晉級石！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">失寵（一）</>

這裡的惡魔更加強大，根本沒有供應。
沒有你，沒有人可以提供物資。

還記得我說過我會經常見到你嗎？
我真的沒想到會是這樣。 /page 我的職位急需，以後請多多關照。
不，請。
<span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">獲取和出售裝備！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Retake the Forest</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">開墾仙林開始</>

Text_English:
I am so relieved to see you again.
Right, about what Gaius found out. /page The ripple of unknown power is affecting our reality.
He said that we need to check other areas and the ripples there to know more. /page We must now head to the Forest of Fairies.
Defeat the darkness and learn more about the ripple.
Text_Korean:
當我再次見到你時，我感到如釋重負，彷彿光又回來了。
好的，蓋烏斯將他發現的信息傳遞出去。 /page 你說未知力的波動似乎對時空有一些影響。
為了了解更多，據說有必要檢查其他地區的波長。 /page 現在是時候前往悲劇重演的仙女森林了。
您必須驅除在森林中復活的邪惡，並找出波浪的效果。

Text_English:
You are doing well.
We shall soon retake the forest.
Text_Korean:
對付更強的野性一定很難，但你克服得很好。
我想我們很快就能奪回仙女森林。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-1 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-1 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Strange Occurrences</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">森林裡的奇怪情況</>

Text_English:
The fairies disappeared since the darkness returned.
It's like they didn't exist at all. /page Not a single response...
Will we be able to find out what's going on?
Text_Korean:
黑暗復活後，我沒有看到仙女。
他不是不接電話，而是他甚至消失了。 /page 好像它不存在一樣。
如果你到達森林的邊緣，你能弄清楚這個奇怪的情況嗎？

Text_English:
Your valor is something that I trust the most.
We may quickly reach the deeper areas soon. /page I am just worried to see her again in the end…
Text_Korean:
光明使者所表現出的勇敢似乎吞噬了森林的荒野。
如果是這樣的話，我會毫不苛刻地進入森林深處。 /page 但我也害怕在森林邊緣遇到我們認識的那個人。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-2 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-2 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Assassin's Revenge (7)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">刺客復仇 (7)</>

Text_English:
The sanguine monster of the forest,
the blood seeker, has come back. /page Teach him why coming back is not a good idea.
Text_Korean: 仙林中，嗜血的黑暗蝙蝠，一個有血有肉都不會放過的怪物，也已經復活了。 /page告訴我在那個怪物身上沉迷於鮮血是什麼感覺。

Text_English:
We can't find the bodies of the villagers,
but their souls will be in peace now. /page It's time to let go of the past.
Text_Korean:
他們一定沒有忘記村民們可怕的屍體。
但他們的靈魂會向你微笑。 /page 所以，我希望你不記得可怕的過去。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-1 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Assassin! Defeat the Blood Seeker!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-1 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">使用刺客幹掉噬血者黑蝙蝠！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Stop the Corruption!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">阻止腐敗蔓延！ </>

Text_English:
If this phenomenon is what it looks like,
Ghost must be back, spreading corruption again. /page First, we must put a stop to the demons.
Text_Korean:
如果目前的現象顯示除了黑暗復活之外的情況重複，
Ghost也復活並傳播更強大的腐敗。 /page首先，請防止帶有腐敗能量的怪物擴散。

Text_English:
Thank you. I almost want you to as the keeper of the forest,
but you are needed elsewhere as well. /page I can be strong as you are,
but let me at least have a strong heart.
Text_Korean:
謝謝你。我想請你做森林的管理者。
但我不會告訴你，因為你不僅僅是留在森林裡的船隻。 /page 如果我能像你一樣堅強就好了，但這是不可能的。
我努力堅強，即使在我的內心。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-3 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-3 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Pain of Corruption</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">腐敗的悲傷</>

Text_English:
It was hard to watch the forest becoming corrupted.
It feels the same way... /page Please stop this from happening again.
Text_Korean:
以前看到一片森林被腐敗吞沒是很痛苦的。
我的心沒有變。 /page 請幫助我，這樣我的煩惱就不會回來。

Text_English:
You are the true protector of this world, hero.
Gaius told me that there will be more information about the darkness.
Text_Korean:
你似乎是世界的保護者，也是心靈的保護者。
哦，蓋烏斯說他很快就會把他找到的信息傳遞出去。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-4 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-4 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Wizard's Journey (7)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">巫師之旅 (7)</>

Text_English:
The venom blast has come back,
still lurking at the same place... /page Defeat this monster, along with its nest.
Text_Korean:
一下子奪走了很多人生命的黑暗炸彈馬已經復活。
它仍然存在於它曾經佔據的棲息地。 /page 摧毀那個怪物和它的棲息地。

Text_English:
It is nearly impossible for me to embrace these monsters,
and it's hard to keep our hatred as well.
Text_Korean: 我想知道我們是否甚至可以擁抱帶有死亡本能的怪物。不得不恨一個人的現實真的很難。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-3 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Wizard! Defeat the Venom Blast!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-3 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">使用巫師打敗黑暗炸彈蜘蛛！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">The Missing Fairies</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">妖精和異常的消失</>

Text_English:
The council cannot tell why the fairies went missing.
Just like Gote's return, as part of the darkness. /page They also say that the ripple is strong with Ghost.
Help us defeat him.
Text_Korean:
魔法委員會認為仙女的失踪很奇怪。
就像哥特的複活一樣，在黑暗中被俘虜。 /page 而且鬼的力量波很強。
幫助幽靈看到力量的浪潮。

Text_English:
Good job. We will soon learn more from Ghost's ripple.
Interestingly, Ghost wasn't revived. /page He did not perish last time.
It's scary to think that he could avoid death.
Text_Korean:
你做得很好。他們說他們很快就會分析鬼的波長。
然而，令人驚訝的是，幽靈並不是複活的存在。 /page 那樣的話，說明那個時候Ghost並沒有死在你的手上，
恐怕是可以免死的東西。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-5 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-5 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Bella's Theory</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">貝拉的假設</>

Text_English:
How did Ghost become stronger?
I thought empowerment was part of the resurrection process… /page What's going on? The fairies are missing, too…
Text_Korean:
一個活著的鬼怎麼可能有更多的力量？
我認為複活會給惡魔更多的力量...... /page 仙女失踪是怎麼回事？

Text_English:
Does revival work only for those coming from the darkness?
Perhaps those not from the darkness disappear from the repeated incidents. /page That would explain the disappearance of Alfrid and the fairies.
I must tell Gaius about my theory.
Text_Korean:
難道所有受黑暗之力影響的生靈都不能複活嗎？
而不存在的存在會從重複的事件中抹去。 /page 如果是這樣，它也解釋了為什麼你看不到領主或仙女。
我必須告訴蓋烏斯我的假設。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Elysium</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Conversation with Bella</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Elysium</> /div<span color="#ffffff">與貝拉交談</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">The March Continues</>
