Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">穩步前進</>

Text_English:
Gaius said that nothing's sure at the moment.
We must continue what we started. /page We are now at the central forest.
Let your might shine throughout our journey.
Text_Korean:
總司令說還沒有確定的。
我們現在必須走自己的路。 /page 有一天，你來到了森林的中心。
向森林的其他部分展示您不斷增長的力量。

Text_English:
The demons are stronger, but they must fear your continued advance.
They may be preparing against you as well. /page The attack by the demons controlling the forest stopped in Elysium.
They are wary of your counterattack.
Text_Korean:
不管惡魔有多強，你的前進都會受到威脅。
我現在可能正在為你的攻擊做準備。 /page 佔領仙女森林的惡魔已經停止攻擊極樂世界。
我想是因為我警惕你的反擊。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-6 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-6 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Fighter's Challenge (7)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">前鋒的挑戰（7）</>

Text_English:
I know that you hate the devil's nest.
It's the worst type of enemy. /page It prevents your attack by sending out bats and shooting poison.
Get rid of it.
Text_Korean:
我知道前鋒特別討厭魔巢。
因為這是您最討厭的戰鬥類型。 /page 身體安全地從遠處發射毒藥並釋放蝙蝠攻擊
擊敗那個膽小的惡魔。我可以用這個嗎？

Text_English:
Good work. It's gone now.
I like the way you engage in battle. I mean, your style.
Text_Korean:
你高興地把它砸碎了。我一直這樣和你說話。
不，我不是說你很兇猛。不不，我的意思是……

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-5 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Fighter! Defeat the Devil's Nest!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-5 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">作為戰士擊退帶來腐敗的邪惡巢穴！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Unlikely Hope</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">意想不到的希望</>

Text_English:
We'll soon reach where Lilith started to turn.
So far, we haven't seen her. /page Perhaps she did not have to surrender to the darkness again.
We will find out, but I hope she remains rested.
Text_Korean:
很快就會經過感受到莉莉絲大人變化的地方。
順便說一句，我什至無法見到莉莉絲的形象。 /page 也許他沒有復活，或者他沒有被黑暗污染？
我很快就會檢查出來，但我希望它像莉莉絲大人一樣。

Text_English:
My hopes are high now. There's no sign of her.
I want to know what's waiting for us ahead.
Text_Korean:
由于莉莉絲大人的形像沒有出現，我想我的希望也在增長。
過去，我越是走進森林越是焦慮，但現在我有點期待。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-7 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-7 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Thick Woods</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">深入森林的小路</>

Text_English:
The forest gets thicker from here onward.
You know this, but it will be dangerous than ever. /page I trust your strength, but be careful.
Text_Korean:
這是從現在開始森林深入深入的部分。
根據經驗，這將更加危險。 /page 我相信你的實力，但請小心。

Text_English: You are doing well so far. Good job.
Text_Korean: 克服強大的敵人和混亂的局面。你受苦了。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-8 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-8 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gladiator's War (7)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">角斗士的戰爭（7）</>

Text_English:
So many innocent souls have perished because of the poison spider.
Its poison is one of the demons' favorites. /page It also left a scar in your past.
Defeat this monster.
Text_Korean:
無數的致命轟炸機毒液蜘蛛毒液的受害者。
並且毒藥在惡魔的陰謀中被大量使用。 /page 此外，在你的過去留下傷痕的毒藥。
請擺脫仙女森林中的那個有毒怪物。

Text_English:
The spider's poison is dangerous for the soul as much as it is for the body.
I hope your wounded heart recovers soon.
Text_Korean:
他的毒藥似乎也在心臟和靈魂上留下了致命的傷痕。
我希望你的思想會迅速排毒的時候到來。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-7 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Gladiator! Defeat the Poison Spider!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-7 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">作為角斗士擊敗致命炸彈毒蜘蛛！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">The Source</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">波長和電源</>

Text_English:
The ripple grows stronger along the darkness and corruption.
If Lilith is back, she must be near the source. /page I really do hope she's not corrupted again.
Open the path, hero. Lead the way.
Text_Korean:
不僅是力量的浪潮，腐敗和黑暗的力量也在增長。
如果莉莉絲復活了，那麼你就是你力量的源泉。 /page我寧願不復活也不願與墮落的莉莉絲團聚。
請打開通往森林最深處的路。

Text_English:
The path to the deepest forest is open.
Be prepared. We don't know what lies ahead.
Text_Korean:
通往森林最深處的道路已經開通。
我不知道等待什麼樣的結果，但我必須做好準備。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-9 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-9 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Repeated Tragedy</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">悲劇重演</>

Text_English:
I hoped not to see Lilith again, but we are sensing her aura.
It's such a disappointment.. /page We would have to fight her again, right?
Help Lilith find her peace again.
Text_Korean:
我不想再見到莉莉絲，但我能感覺到他的能量。
我有一段時間的希望破滅了。 /page 我希望我們即使再見面也不要吵架，但這會很困難，不是嗎？
請減輕莉莉絲的痛苦。

Text_English:
Lilith had to go through the terrible curse again.
This just doesn't feel right. /page Why is this happening again and again?
We are still waiting for the council's findings, but I am scared.
Text_Korean:
最終，即使是莉莉絲大人，也有殘酷的結局。
在沒有仙女之門的情況下能夠去莉莉絲很奇怪。 /page 為什麼悲劇重演？
我害怕魔法委員會的研究結果。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-10 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat Lilith, Contain the Ripple!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-10 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗莉莉絲獲得一波力量！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Pathfinder's Struggle (2)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">使者的奮鬥（二）</>

Text_English:
Pathfinder's battles never stops!
I'm always impressed but also worried of the hardships. /page I hope you understand me, even if I continue to burden you.
You are the only hope for the light.
Text_Korean:
畢竟，光明使者的活動並沒有停止！
儘管我每次都很佩服你，但我擔心你正走在一條非常艱難的道路上。 /page 儘管如此，請理解我要求你的鬥爭。
因為你是光明世界復興的唯一希望。

Text_English: Well done. I hope the days of glory would come sooner.
Text_Korean: 你受苦了。我希望你只走在花徑上的那一天很快就會到來。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Skirmish Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Demons!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[子]戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">打敗惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Reviving the Light (2)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">重振希望之光（二）</>

Text_English:
Thanks to you, the light is more likely to be revived.
There is hope indeed. But what a harsh fate you have. /page I hope you understand me, even if I continue to ask you to fight.
Did you hear that before? Well, at least, I try…
Text_Korean:
由於你的活動，光復活的可能性正在增加。
儘管有希望，但我認為你的命運很殘酷。 /page 然後，請理解我要你打一場艱苦的戰鬥。
它與您聽到的相似嗎？氣氛很好...

Text_English:
There is another source of power that is critical for the revival.
It is the hope that others find through your existence. /page Either way, you are the source. Thank you.
Text_Korean:
光復活了，有一種力量與你的戰鬥一樣重要。
這是那些見過你存在的人的希望。 /page 不管怎樣，你都是力量的源泉。非常感謝。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Skirmish Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Liberate the Area!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">解放每個地區！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gladiator's Attack Power (9)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">角斗士的戰鬥之力 (9)</>

Text_English:
I know well that you've done a lot.
That's why I believe in you. /page But if you stop nurturing the power of the light,
you will not be able to defeat the darkness.
Text_Korean:
我很清楚你的表現。所以我相信你會把我們從一個更強大的
邪惡中拯救出來。 /page 但是隨著邪惡越來越強大，除非你增加光的力量，
將無法穿過黑暗。讓我們增加這種力量。

Text_English:
Your shining blade will get rid of the darkness for us.
As long as you keep training, it will certainly come true.
Text_Korean:
我相信你的劍，披著光輝，會斬斷我們周圍的黑暗。
如果你不斷完善自己，這將是可能的。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Gladiator's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升角斗士的戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Assassin's Attack Power (9)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">刺客大作戰 (9)</>

Text_English:
Your battle against the demons are almost beautiful,
but the empowered darkness may stop you if you let your guards down. /page Show us how strong you can be.
Text_Korean:
您在惡魔中繪製的紅色閃光美麗而強大。
但現在更強大的黑暗甚至可以抹去那個閃光。 /page 你應該可以表現出更強大的劍舞。

Text_English:
I can imagine demons falling under your dancing blades,
but if you stop training, there will be no such dance.
Text_Korean:
我可以想像惡魔墜落到你耀眼的劍舞中。
但是，請記住，放棄訓練會導致姿態虛弱。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Assassin's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升刺客的戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Wizard's Attack Power (9)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">法師強大的戰鬥力（9）</>

Text_English:
The flow of magic is stronger than before,
but the darkness has become stronger as well. /page If you stop now, the flow will shut down,
and we will be devoured by the darkness.
Text_Korean:
顯然，我能從你身上感受到的魔流比以前更強了。
但你要知道，黑暗的力量也變得更強了。 /page 如果你停下來，你強大的魔法流將被切斷，
我們將被黑暗勢力吞噬。

Text_English:
You must keep the flow inside you.
At this rate, you will be able to create a greater flow of magic.
Text_Korean:
流動必須是連續的和不可阻擋的。
如果你現在這樣做，你將能夠創造一個更大的魔法流。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Wizard's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升法師戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Fighter's Attack Power (9)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">前鋒的強大戰鬥力 (9)</>

Text_English:
You have a power that is different from magic, surpassing the body.
Don't stop nurturing it. /page The demons are getting stronger as we speak.
Text_Korean:
與魔法不同，你擁有超越身體的力量。
此外，你不能停止說你可以通過訓練來增加這種力量。 /page 惡魔還在變強。

Text_English:
You call that balanced power chi, right?
Continue training and don't lose it.
Text_Korean:
你把與萬物和諧的力量稱為氣嗎？
最好保持這種做法，以免失去其和諧和力量。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Fighter's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升戰士的戰鬥力</>
<span color="#ffffff">統治者的黑暗（二）</>

你必須盡你所能變得更強大。
古代文物就是其中一種手段。 /page我正要清理妖精森林中蔓延的更強大的黑暗，要不要來一塊？我認為現在是正確的時間。

我以為你會成功。它也很可靠。
艱苦的戰鬥將繼續，但不要動搖並相信自己。
<span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-10 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗莉莉絲獲得碎片！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">推廣的重要性（二）</>

這些天來，我也在一對一的比賽中挑戰自己。
結果很差，但我相信有一天我會變得更強大。 /page 如果你現在忘記了，來一場一對一的比賽怎麼樣？

畢竟，你一直在產生結果。我真的很羨慕。
我會盡我所能從背後幫助你。
<span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">挑戰一對一戰鬥，贏取晉級石！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">失寵（二）</>

這不是每天都來的Broke，但最近似乎每天都來。
這次請再次照顧好我。

來到你身邊真的很有趣，他總是讓事情成功。
我的身體不貴，如果我這樣做，我會每天都來看你。
<span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">獲取和出售裝備！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">A Stubborn Attack</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">無情的敵人攻擊</>

Text_English:
It's been a while. Thank you for coming back.
I will be helping you instead of Gratia. /page Don't expect Gregor to help you. Things are similar to the situation in the forest.
The enemies will be more stubborn. Be prepared.
Text_Korean:
好久不見，謝謝你還活著回來。我遇到了很多麻煩。
我將與古代英雄的墳墓一起代替消失的格拉齊亞。 /page不要指望格雷戈爾的幫助。它會像一個童話森林。
而且敵人會更加頑強。所以不要警惕。

Text_English:
Well done. If the Catacomb is in the same situation as the forest,
we may find Beelzebub without having to break the seal. /page Don't forget that danger is everywhere.
Text_Korean:
你打得很好。正如我之前所說，在仙女森林這樣的情況下，
即使你不打開封印，你也會面對Belzebub。 /page 這就是為什麼我要求你不要更加警惕，所以不要忘記。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-1 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-1 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">A Harsh Fate</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">英雄的悲慘命運</>

Text_English:
We will soon arrive at the place where we met Gregor.
I believe that he is alive somewhere. /page He must have fought against his own harsh fate, just like you.
For Gregor, we must defeat the demons in the Catacomb.
Text_Korean:
我會到達我第一次見到格雷果大人的地方。
如果我從一開始就知道，我不會後悔...我相信你會活下去。 /page 他也與殘酷的命運作鬥爭。像你一樣說話
為了格雷果大人，我們必須消滅墳墓中的惡魔。

Text_English:
Well done. Unfortunately, we haven't met Gregor yet.
Perhaps that's better than finding ourselves in a horrible situation.
Text_Korean:
你做得好其實，我有點期待，但奇蹟般的重逢並沒有發生。
但總比在錯誤的方向重逢要好。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-2 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-2 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Demons of the Tomb</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">盜墓惡魔的變化</>

Text_English:
The demons controlling the ancient tombs are acting differently now.
In the past, they wanted to unlock the seal to protect it against intruders. /page But now, they are being most aggressive.
At this rate, they may invade Elysium. We need to put a stop to it.
Text_Korean:
佔領古代英雄墳墓的惡魔有些不同。
過去，他們試圖隔離墳墓並解封。 /page 但現在他們正在積極進攻。
這樣下去，我們可能會入侵極樂世界，所以我們必須打破這種勢頭。

Text_English:
If the invasion comes now, we will find ourselves in a difficult situation.
Good work.
Text_Korean: 現在光之力量已經減弱，如果墳墓的惡魔入侵極樂世界，我們的戰局將處於不利地位。你做得好。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-3 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-3 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gladiator's War (8)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">角斗士的戰爭（8）</>

Text_English:
The drone boss is a demon that brought down castles.
Your kingdom was no exception. Stop the destruction.
Text_Korean:
Sanctuary Destroyer 是一個惡魔，其主要任務是拆除和摧毀王國中的城堡。
你的王國也是如此。我們必須制止他的行為。

Text_English:
That demon had to go.
I hate nasty things… Well, thank you, anyway.
Text_Korean:
必須阻止那個惡魔的毀滅。
特別是因為我對骯髒的東西很虛弱......熱的！無論如何，謝謝你。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-1 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Gladiator! Defeat the Drone Boss!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-1 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">用角斗士擊敗聖域破壞者殭屍！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Beelzebub's Gaze</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">別西卜消失的凝視</>

Text_English:
We can't find Beelzebub's gaze.
I suppose that the resurrection does not always guarantee the same order of events. /page We must hurry and find the ripple.
The central area is nearby.
Text_Korean:
貝爾西卜的眼睛沒有出現。
惡魔的複活帶來了對過去的重新創造，但過去已經改變了。 /page 我們需要抓緊時間查看力波和當前情況。
它是墳墓的中心，所以讓我們變得更強大。

Text_English:
An alternate past...
Perhaps this would help explain the effects of the ripple. /page We may come closer to explaining the phenomenon.
Text_Korean:
過去被重現，但內容卻是不一樣的過去……
我認為這部分可能有關於力波對時空的影響的線索。 /page 我想我們這次可以通過分析力波得到更詳細的結果。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-4 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-4 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Empowered Poisoneye</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">擊敗增強型毒液觀察者</>

Text_English:
I am curious now that we are about to face Poisoneye.
Without Gregor, would the light still be hidden inside that demon? /page We shall find out.
It will also prove to be an important clue.
Text_Korean:
我有一個問題要問你，是時候面對毒液觀察者了。
在沒有格雷戈爾的情況下，那個惡魔現在隱藏著光的力量嗎？ /page 如果你這次贏了，你就知道了。
實際上，那部分是確認當前情況的重要線索。

Text_English:
There was no light, as if it didn't exist from the beginning.
There's no sign of those who struggled against the darkness before. /page What does these all mean? I am worried.
Text_Korean:
再次，光的力量沒有被隱藏。好像一開始就不存在似的。
似乎與過去抵抗黑暗力量的人沒有任何關係。 /page 這究竟有什麼樣的影響...我也有點害怕。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-5 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-5 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Assassin's Revenge (8)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">刺客復仇 (8)</>

Text_English:
I found a demon that is full of hatred against humans.
It's the spiteful marauder. /page So, many of your villagers were murdered by this monster.
It's time to avenge their deaths.
Text_Korean:
我發現了一個對人類懷有無條件怨恨和突然襲擊的惡魔。
怨恨襲擊者殭屍已從古代英雄的墳墓中復活。 /page 你的許多村民也被犧牲了。
現在是時候讓你恢復仇恨了。

Text_English:
It is hard for me to hide my emotions against these demons.
I am impressed how you maintain your calm so well.
Text_Korean:
當我發現惡魔的時候，即使是作為女神的我也很難隱藏自己的感情。
我認為您很棒，無需冷靜而準確地流露自己的情緒。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-3 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Assassin! Defeat the Spiteful Marauder!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-3 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">用刺客幹掉怨恨襲擊殭屍！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Conversation with Gaius</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">與蓋烏斯交談</>

Text_English:
I was worried how much longer we could last without Remiel.
We had to hold the ground. /page Things look better now, but I am not sure if we can change what has become another invasion.
I don't know if I can be someone like Gregor.
Text_Korean:
我害怕沒有拉米爾大人我還能活多久。
記住表現出色的你，你堅持了下來。 /page 越來越好了，但也許我們可以改變現在亂七八糟的世界。
我能成為像格雷戈爾那樣我敬佩的英雄嗎？我想

Text_English:
After some thought, I realized that
I don't have to be a hero. /page I can protect the world by doing what I can.
I have you to fill in the role of the hero.
Text_Korean:
經過一番思考和恐懼，我得出了自己的結論。
我的意思是，我不必成為英雄。 /page 我盡我所能拯救世界。
而且已經有一位偉大的英雄叫你，他會幫助你。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Elysium</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Conversation with Gaius</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 極樂世界</> /div<span color="#ffffff">與蓋烏斯交談</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Beelzebub's Response</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">別西卜的反應</>

Text_English:
Let your fears fade away.
I am curious what Beelzebub will do, now that Poisoneye is gone. /page It may help explain the ripple.
Let's see how Beelzebub responds.
Text_Korean:
讓我們暫時放下我們的感受和恐懼。
我想知道毒液觀察者消失後，Belzebub 將如何移動。 /page 據此，關於改變世界的力量浪潮的假設可能會改變。
看看別西卜的反應並判斷它。

Text_English:
This is weird. Not even a glimpse into Beelzebub's wrath!
After what happened, it must be full of hatred against you. /page Does this mean that the demons were not the ones behind the revival?
Or do they simply forget what happened before after coming back?
Text_Korean:
有什麼奇怪的。甚至感覺不到伯西卜的憤怒！
他們永遠無法忘記你，他們怨恨的對象。 /page 復活的惡魔不是靠自己的意志復活的嗎？
如果沒有，你在復活時會失去所有的記憶嗎？

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-6 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-6 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Ripple of Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">關於力波長的假設</>

Text_English:
Given what we've seen so far,
I must change the theory behind the ripple. /page Perhaps the return of the darkness created the ripple.
We shall find out soon. Hurry.
Text_Korean:
看到復活的惡魔把你當成一個簡單的敵人，
我必須糾正一波扭曲時空的力量已經復活邪惡的假設。 /page 也許邪惡的複活創造了一股力量。
如果你走到墳墓的盡頭，你就會知道。快點。

Text_English:
Empowered demons, Gote's return,
the disappearance of the helpers, demons that cannot remember… /page There are many clues so far,
but we are still missing something critical. We must find it.
Text_Korean:
更強大的複活惡魔，難以理解的哥特復活，
消失的幫手，不記得你的惡魔。 /page 我們已經收集到可以告訴我們這個奇怪現象的線索，但我認為我們還沒有找到關鍵線索。你必須找到它

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-7 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-7 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Wizard's Journey (8)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">巫師之旅 (8)</>

Text_English:
The gorger has returned.
It is one of your sworn enemies. /page Defeat the demon.
Prove your worthiness.
Text_Korean:
殭屍，一團貪婪，也被復活了。
你討厭壟斷任何東西的敵人。 /page 通過在古代英雄的墳墓中擊敗貪婪的捕食者殭屍，堅定地證明你的想法。

Text_English:
Greed, murder, destruction… Evil is everywhere.
I hope I don't fall under its influence.
Text_Korean:
貪婪、謀殺、破壞……我認為錯誤的行為和聚集的心是邪惡的。
痴迷會產生邪惡嗎？我不會作惡吧？

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-5 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Wizard! Defeat the Gorger!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-5 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">用巫師打敗殭屍，貪婪的掠食者！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">March of Valor</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">狂暴前鋒</>

Text_English:
Your march of valor has stopped the demons from advancing.
The invasion toward Elysium is becoming weaker. /page Keep going. Beelzebub is close by.
Text_Korean:
你的英勇前進終於束縛了佔據墳墓的惡魔。
對極樂世界的入侵越來越弱。 /page距離Belzebub的空間已經不多了，所以讓我們繼續前進。

Text_English:
The demons are getting stronger, but they cannot stop you.
Very good.
Text_Korean:
你走得越遠，出現的惡魔就越強大，但它們無法阻止你。
那太好了。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-8 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-8 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gregor's Will</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">格雷戈爾的維護</>

Text_English:
This is where Gregor found his last memory.
He is gone, but his will lives. /page We are almost there.
Text_Korean:
這是格雷戈爾找到他最後記憶的地方。
雖然格雷戈爾不在這裡，但要繼續他的心。 /page Belzebub 所在的地方所剩無幾，所以請給我力量。

Text_English:
You've already surpassed Gregor.
I am thrilled to see your transformation.
Text_Korean:
作為英雄，你已經超越了格雷果大人。
比較我們第一次見面的時間和現在，我更感動。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-9 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-9 精英</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Fighter's Challenge (8)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">前鋒的挑戰（8）</>

Text_English:
The fallen knight has returned.
Cleanse its corruption once more.
Text_Korean:
被你親手破壞的古老腐化的騎士石像也復活了。
請再次向那些沉迷於腐敗的人展示你的力量。

Text_English:
Your strength is always a marvel for me.
Am I being too obsessed with your victories?
Text_Korean:
畢竟，你用一種隨意的表情來炫耀你的力量。

這幾天迷上了你清爽的樣子，我是不是變態了？

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-7 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Fighter! Defeat the Fallen Knight!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-7 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">作為戰士掃蕩該地區的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Empowered Beelzebub</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">擊敗強大的貝爾西卜</>

Text_English:
Beelzebub is up ahead. He's stronger, so don't let your guards down.
Once he falls, we will be able to obtain more clues. /page Let us liberate the ancient tombs and contain the ripple of power.
Text_Korean:
我很快就會和別西卜見面。我會變得更強，所以不要警惕。
如果你打敗了他，你會找到關鍵線索。 /page 釋放古代英雄的墳墓並檢查權力的浪潮。

Text_English:
This ripple feels different than the ones before.
Thank you for retaking the Catacomb and finding more clues. /page But I am worried. I thought the death priest was behind this,
and yet, we cannot find any trace. Strange…
Text_Korean:
我感覺到一股與現在不同的力量波動。我認為這將是一個關鍵線索。
非常感謝您收復古代英雄的墳墓並找到重要線索。 /page 但是有一些令人不安的事情。我看到了帶來這股力量浪潮的罪魁禍首，
身為死亡祭司，卻一點痕跡都沒有。發生了什麼... .

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-10 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat Beelzebub, Contain the Ripple!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-10 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗Belzebub獲得一波力量！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Pathfinder's Struggle (3)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">使者的奮鬥（三）</>

Text_English:
Your victories are a great help to the light.
You can deliver for sure. /page But it's too early to feel comfortable.
Your struggle must continue until the light shines throughout the world.
Text_Korean:
據說，由於你們的活動，光的力量正在顯示出一點點復甦的跡象。
確實，英雄是產生一定結果的人。 /page 不過這只是一種可能，所以我還是鬆了口氣。
在光的力量投射到世界之前，需要你的鬥爭。

Text_English:
I respect your continued efforts against the empowered darkness.
Others will feel the same way. Arin as well…
Text_Korean:
我向你致敬，感謝你與日益增長的黑暗作鬥爭。
不只是我，每個人都會。或許阿林大人…… .

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Skirmish Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Demons!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[子]戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">打敗惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Reviving the Light (3)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">重振希望之光（3）</>

Text_English:
The light shall be revived...
I take it that you know what I'm talking about. /page But now is a critical moment.
We need your help more than ever.
Text_Korean:
有跡象表明，光的力量會通過你的活動一點一點地顯現出來……
感覺就像您已經聽說過同樣的事情。 /page 但是，這是開始和重要的一點。
請幫助光的力量變得更大。

Text_English:
Your power would make the empowered demons fear you.
The light is growing more vibrant. Thank you.
Text_Korean:
我想你的力量會嚇到更強大的惡魔。
光的力量是活的。謝謝你。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Skirmish Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Liberate the Area!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">解放每個地區！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gladiator's Attack Power (10)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">角斗士的戰鬥之力 (10)</>

Text_English:
I see that you will be going to Avila soon. There will be even stronger demons.
They are also gathering at the fortress. /page You need to increase your attack power if you want to prevail.
Without strength, the demons will rule.
Text_Korean:
很快我們將前往靈魂城堡。也許會出現更強大的惡魔。
並且各個地區的強大惡魔也聚集在城堡中。 /page 想要為他們討回公道，就必須有更強的戰鬥力。
因為弱者對魔鬼的判斷只是一個笑話。

Text_English:
It's time for justice. You are ready for this.
Let them clearly witness justice… They will cry for mercy.
Text_Korean:
我準備好判斷了。我可以做出一個抽象的判斷。
告訴我聰明。你的判斷... .也許你的敵人會流著淚求饒。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Gladiator's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升角斗士的戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Assassin's Attack Power (10)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">刺客大作戰 (10)</>

Text_English:
I haven't seen anyone faster than you so far,
but there are many demons stronger and harder than you. /page Dealing with your weakness is also an important thing to remember.
Increase your attack power.
Text_Korean:
我想我還沒有見過比你更快的人。
但是有很多人比你更堅強。 /page 最大限度地發揮優勢，也是消除劣勢的好方法。
嘗試提高你的戰鬥力。

Text_English:
With speed and strength, no demon shall withstand your attack.
I hope you continue to become stronger.
Text_Korean:
因為速度和力量混合在一起，所以不會有任何惡魔可以擋在你的面前。
希望你有一顆不斷變強的心。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Assassin's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升刺客的戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Wizard's Attack Power (10)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">法師的強戰（10）</>

Text_English:
You need more power to convince the demons.
It's simple logic. Be strong or be gone. /page I know you are not particularly a fan of such simplicity,
but having a little more attack power wouldn't hurt.
Text_Korean:
即使是魔鬼也必須有能力執行你的想法。
這種生物的邏輯很簡單。你是強還是死？ /page 胡說八道的邏輯可能不是你的口味，
如果你插手他們的董事會，你必須有很強的戰鬥力。

Text_English:
You have what it takes to be sufficiently convincing.
Keep going. You will prevail.
Text_Korean:
你已經獲得了在魔鬼的盤子上生存的基礎。

我要你增強戰鬥力，稱霸棋盤。你應該可以的。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Wizard's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升法師戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Fighter's Attack Power (10)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">前鋒的強大戰鬥力 (10)</>

Text_English:
Doesn't it make you angry to see the demons growing stronger?
Well, it may actually help you find more opponents. /page But if you are not stronger, pride will only consume you.
Try to increase your attack power.
Text_Korean:
惡魔變強了，你不生氣嗎？
如果你是，你可能會很高興擁有更強大的敵人。 /page 但是，如果你的水平不比敵人高，你的雙贏也不過如此。
如果你想成為自己的力量標準，那就增加你的戰鬥力。

Text_English:
At this rate, you will be able to defeat any enemy.
Impressive.
Text_Korean: 我可以很自信的說，如果我像這樣不斷變強，無論遇到什麼敵人，我都會測試自己能有多強。這是驚人的。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Fighter's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升戰士的戰鬥力</>
<span color="#ffffff">統治者的黑暗（三）</>

你可以在這裡獲得比以前更多的作品。
現在似乎是一個讓Belzebub的眼睛變弱的機會。 /pageKill Belzebub 並獲得碎片，這樣你就可以擁有這種力量。

你是唯一將收穫統治者散佈的黑暗的人。
您，似乎光明使者經過的地方，光明依然存在。
<span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 3-10 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗Belzebub獲得碎片！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">推廣的重要性（三）</>

到現在為止，你不想打破蓋烏斯大人的記錄嗎？
在最短的時間內成為總司令的記錄。 /page 當然，由於總司令是由拉米爾任命的，單靠晉升是無法實現的。

據說，當你達到最後的軍銜時，你就成為了總司令的候選人。
但你肯定能打破蓋烏斯大人的記錄。
<span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">挑戰一對一戰鬥，贏取晉級石！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">布魯克的恩惠 (3)</>

你現在是想避免看我的臉嗎？
不要那樣做，我會這樣鞠躬，所以請幫我一個忙。

謝謝你。下次你試圖避開它時，我會給你一個更強大的弓。
如果您不想讓恥辱成為您的恥辱，那麼您將不得不幫一個忙。
<span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">獲取和出售裝備！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">March to Avila</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">進軍靈魂城堡</>

Text_English:
It's time to head to the Soul Fortress.
There will be no Bertha, or Miracle's remnants, I suppose. /page We've been there before, but it somehow feels empty.
Now that you are here, we can succeed, right?
Text_Korean:
現在輪到你前往靈魂城堡了。
也許既沒有貝爾塔大人的幫助，也沒有奇蹟大人留下的力量？ /page 這是我經歷過的戰場，但沒有這樣的東西，所以我感到孤獨。
但既然你一直都很堅強，那麼這次你也能成功嗎？

Text_English:
Strange. I can't sense any spirits,
as if they are not here at all. /page This means that the souls are no longer gathering.
Gaius must know about this.
Text_Korean:
這有點奇怪。它失去了保護和淨化靈魂的功能，但和以往不同的是，根本感覺不到靈魂的存在。 /page 表示靈魂沒有聚集。
我也應該將這一現象告知蓋烏斯。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-1 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-1 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">For Bertha</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">對伯莎的安慰</>

Text_English:
We will pass the place where we first met Bertha…
It pains me to think that she had to disappear. /page At least, we can reminisce.
We can pay our respects to her by cleansing the darkness.
Text_Korean:
我要經過我第一次見到貝爾塔大人的地方。你們一起辛苦了...
當我想到他的靈魂被摧毀時，我的心仍然很痛。 /page 讓我們回過頭來想想伯塔大人。
並通過擊敗所有惡魔來安慰靈魂。

Text_English:
Bertha would not see, but we will do this for her.
Oh, and there's something that Gaius said. I'll tell you afterward.
Text_Korean:
我看不到伯塔大人，但那會是一種安慰嗎？你真的很掙扎。
Gaius 說了什麼，我會聽你的，然後告訴你。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-2 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-2 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gladiator's War (9)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">角斗士的戰爭(9)</>

Text_English:
Gladiator, I am here in place of Saint Lady Arin.
It's about the demons. You knew, right? /page The goblin captain has returned.
Do not hesitate.
Text_Korean:
阿林忙於靈魂的性別，所以我決定通知你。
哦！我說的是魔鬼。當然，這將是唯一一次……姬？ /page 你譴責的惡毒地精傭兵首領已經復活並加強了。
不要保持警惕和判斷。你有什麼話要說嗎？過來聽我說。

Text_English:
I know you would win,
but you must remember that /page the demons have become much stronger now.
Now, excuse me. I must go talk to Arin.
Text_Korean:
當然，我以為你會贏，但那個輕浮的惡魔也變得更強了。 /page 但是你是什麼意思？阿琳女神來找我了？
我很困惑。為什麼現在... ?哎呀，沒有。我必須快點。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-1 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Gladiator! Defeat the Goblin Captain!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-1 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">用角斗士擊敗邪惡的地精僱傭兵領袖！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Different Demons</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">另一個惡魔</>

Text_English:
I just met Gaius.
He seemed to be startled. /page It was because of what he found out.
Head to battle first. I will tell you about it once you return.
Text_Korean:
我一直在等蓋烏斯來見你。
您似乎很困惑，但是發生了什麼？ /page 無論如何，我聽到了一些非常令人驚訝的信息。我很驚訝，我什至無法組織它。
我想先去戰場。與此同時，我會把它們放在一起，讓你知道。

Text_English:
It's good to see you back. About what I heard from Gaius,
he said that the demons did not revive but are entirely different beings. /page They may look the same, but they are not.
How could this be?
Text_Korean:
你受苦了。等我總結了一下資料，現在重新出現的惡魔不是複活了，而是不同的存在。 /page 這意味著它們具有相同的外觀但是不同的實體。
這怎麼可能？

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-3 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-3 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Disappeared Incidents</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">缺少亮點</>

Text_English:
So this is an entirely new invasion?
It's hard to believe… /page The council is in shock as well.
But there is no time. We must do what we have to do.
Text_Korean:
是不是長相一樣，但本質不同的惡魔又入侵了？
與之前有一些不同，但事件的流程幾乎相同...... /page 我不太明白。魔法議會似乎也很震驚。
但沒有震驚的餘地。我們必須做我們必須做的事情。

Text_English:
In fact, all of the important incidents are gone.
It seems like they already occurred. /page But how?
Whatever the reason, these demons must want to get rid of us.
Text_Korean:
事實證明，並非所有重要事件都發生了。
感覺就像沒有我們的事件已經過去了。 /page 感覺惡魔已經得到了他們想要的東西？這怎麼發生的... ?
如果我的猜測是正確的，我們現在是惡魔的最大障礙。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-4 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-4 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Butcher</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">擊敗屠夫並檢查</>

Text_English:
Again, the demons look the same, but they are different.
But they all want the same thing—to take over this world. /page If we defeat the butcher, we may learn something important.
We could see if it is holding spirits.
Text_Korean:
回顧一下，相同的外觀，但不同的存在
以與過去惡魔相同的目的入侵我們的世界？ /page 是的！打敗屠夫，你會學到一些重要的東西。
我必須把他打倒，並確保他控制住了自己的靈魂。

Text_English:
The butcher did not have any souls.
It is a different demon indeed, but much stronger. /page Will there be more answers on the top floor?
What are we missing?
Text_Korean:
屠夫現在不像以前那樣包含他的靈魂。
它們看起來相同，但它們似乎是不同的實體。並且更強。 /page 如果你去靈魂城堡的頂部，你能找出你不知道的東西嗎？
我有點害怕我們不知道有多大的交易。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-5 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-5 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Assassin's Revenge (9)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">刺客復仇 (9)</>

Text_English:
The goblin archer is the demon that chased you when you were little.
You might not be here if the others didn't save you back then. /page Thankfully, you are now powerful and ready.
Let the demon feel your wrath.
Text_Korean:
古怪的哥布林弓箭手是在你逃跑時追趕你的惡魔。
如果其他刺客沒有找到它，他們可能已經中了箭。 /page 如果是這樣的話，我們就不會相遇，但幸運的是，我們一起成為了偉大的英雄，
。讓我看看成為英雄的孩子的憤怒。

Text_English:
Perhaps the demon could not recognize you,
but it would feel regret if it did. /page I didn't like this particular demon.
So much for that, I guess.
Text_Korean:
我不知道那個惡魔會不會記得你，
但如果他記得，他會閉上眼睛，非常後悔。 /page 就個人而言，我不喜歡那個惡魔，因為它像它的名字一樣有很多古怪的角落。
嗯，表演值得一聽......

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-3 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Assassin! Defeat the Goblin Archer!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-3 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">作為刺客幹掉古怪的哥布林弓箭手隊長！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Conversation with Arin</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">與阿琳的對話</>

Text_English:
Meeting Lilith without going through the fairy portal,
breaking the seal without the help of Gregor, /page and the disappearance of Miracle.
Important incidents have changed. Did they simply disappear?
Text_Korean: 沒有發生任何重大事件，例如在沒有仙女之門的情況下能夠遇到莉莉絲，在沒有格里高爾幫助的情況下通過封印，以及/pageMiracle的視野沒有出現。是不是因為案子裡的人物都不見了？

Text_English:
It seems that the ritual is not happening either.
Will we see Azrael or Vulcanus? /page It is definitely different from the past.
The ripple did not revive the demons or reverse time.
Text_Korean:
召喚儀式的重要事件似乎也消失了，但最後出現的是阿茲莉爾大人嗎？是火山口嗎？ /page 有這麼多的線索，流程已經從過去發生了變化。
我不認為權力的浪潮創造了魔鬼的複活或時間逆轉。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Elysium</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Conversation with Arin</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Elysium</> /div<span color="#ffffff">與阿琳對話</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">The Secret Key</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">向著秘鑰... </>

Text_English:
Whatever is on the top floor, defeating it would
help us solve this puzzle. /page Perhaps something even more terrible than the demon's revival.
Let us find the secret key to this mystery.
Text_Korean:
擊敗將在城堡頂層戰鬥的未知生物Azrael或Vulcan來解開謎題不是很有幫助嗎？ /page 我認為發生了比惡魔復活更可怕的事情。
快點拿到秘鑰吧。

Text_English:
The new information is keeping the council and Lord Gaius busy.
We must do our best to come closer to the truth.
Text_Korean:
隨著新情報的發現，魔法議會和蓋烏斯大人也更加忙碌起來。
我們也必須努力工作，以便我們能夠盡快了解真相。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-6 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-6 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Fate of Evil</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">魔鬼的本性與終結</>

Text_English:
The goblin magician will try to stop us.
In the end, they are all the same. /page We have to defeat them altogether.
That's the fate of evil.
Text_Korean:
我們很快就會遇到的哥布林薩滿，即使它與以前不同，也會阻止我們。
最後，魔鬼的本質是一樣的。 /page 在這種情況下，你必須以同樣的結局來報答邪惡的本性。
囚禁自己靈魂的最後一句話。

Text_English:
You did well even without memory shards or Bertha.
The end is near. Keep going.
Text_Korean: 沒有人像記憶碎片或伯莎的靈魂一樣幫助我們，但到目前為止你做得很好。現在所剩無幾，振作起來吧。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-7 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-7 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Wizard's Journey (9)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">巫師之旅（九）</>

Text_English:
I know how much you care about the assassin.
That's why you hate the goblin dagger so much. /page It doesn't deserve to be an assassin.
Put a stop to its treachery.
Text_Korean:
我知道你打心底里愛著刺客。
所以你知道我討厭殘忍的地精刺客。 /page打著刺客之名作惡的惡魔一定是不能容忍的
。在靈魂城堡中擊敗那個惡魔。

Text_English:
You know the true value of friendship.
Don't forget that. Together, you will become stronger.
Text_Korean:
你從來沒有表達過，但你很關心你的同事。是不是？
因為他們是推動你的力量。請不要失去那顆心。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-5 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Wizard! Defeat the Goblin Dagger!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-5 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">用法師擊敗殘忍的地精刺客！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">A Hero's Resolve</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">英雄的鐵石心腸</>

Text_English:
Your impressive battles almost made me forget
that the demons are much stronger. /page I admire your resolve. Keep it up.
Text_Korean: 我不知道你的步伐如此強勁，但我感覺惡魔越來越強大了。我尊重你。 /page 讓我們在不失去那顆堅硬的心的情況下解放精神城堡。

Text_English:
You would have felt the increased power of the demons
and yet you never complain. You are a true hero.
Text_Korean: 或許你也覺得魔族變強了，但看著他們毫無表情地戰勝它們而變強，不知道這是否是英雄的真面目。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-8 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-8 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">The Final Gate</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">突破頂門</>

Text_English:
The top floor is near. Bertha and Miracle are not here,
but they will be praying for us.
Text_Korean: 一旦你經過這裡，它是最好的。雖然貝爾塔尼姆和奇蹟大人不在，但我相信他們會給我力量，讓我前進。

Text_English: This new reality will be tough, but we will prevail.
Text_Korean: 我們面臨著與以往不同的現實，但我們將能夠解決它。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-9 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-9 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Azrael and the Ripple of Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">阿茲瑞爾的秘密和力量之波</>

Text_English:
The critical moment is here. Our enemies are strong,
but we will defeat them and find out the secret behind the ripple. /page I am scared, but I also believe in you, Pathfinder.
Text_Korean: 這對我們來說是一個非常重要的時刻。你將不得不與一個可怕的生物打交道，但如果你贏了，你將揭開力量波動的秘密。 /page 我很害怕，但我相信你。光導

Text_English:
It is truly a shocking revelation. The new Azrael was not simply using Vulcanus' body,
it was an entirely different demon. /page The ripple will tell us much more.
Great job, Pathfinder.
Text_Korean:
你發現了一些令人驚訝的事情。我們對付的是惡魔阿茲瑞爾，而不是藉用瓦肯屍體的阿茲瑞爾。 /page 我認為我們可以從這次發現的力量浪潮中學到很多東西。
這是一場精彩的勝利。光導

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-10 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat Azrael, Contain the Ripple!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-10 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗 Azrael 獲得一波力量！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Fighter's Challenge (9)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">前鋒的挑戰（9）</>

Text_English:
I know that you never have to face an opponent you defeated before.
But the gargoyle raider has returned, much stronger than before. /page Can you make sure that it doesn't come back?
Text_Korean:
你知道你永遠不會和比你弱的人打兩次。
但目前的猛攻掠奪者的石像鬼顯然比以前更強大。 /page 你為什麼不再試試那個惡魔的力量呢？戰鬥機

Text_English:
I see you did not enjoy the battle.
Well, didn't you want to find out? Give me a break!
Text_Korean:
從他的表情來看，他一定對我的提議不滿意。
好吧，你還不想試試嗎？所以請看一看。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-9 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Fighter! Defeat the Gargoyle Raider!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-9 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">用戰鬥機擊敗猛攻怪獸！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Pathfinder's Struggle (4)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">使者的奮鬥（四）</>

Text_English:
I heard a lot of good things about your battles.
Many people are finding hope through your accomplishments. /page I ask you, Pathfinder.
Keep giving us hope. Fight off the demons.
Text_Korean:
你的戰鬥正在成為一個熱門話題，多虧了你，我也聽到了這個消息。
許多人從你的故事中得到了希望。 /page 每次都很抱歉，但這次你也想通過堅決的戰鬥來創作一個給人們帶來希望的故事嗎？

Text_English:
Thank you for giving us hope.
Someday, we shall see the shining light again.
Text_Korean:
再次感謝您給人們帶來希望。
這種希望將有助於盡快恢復光的力量。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Skirmish Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Demons!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[子]戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">打敗惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Reviving the Light (4)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">重振希望之光（4）</>

Text_English:
I heard that Hunt is asking you a lot.
I know that he means good, but it's too much to ask. /page Well, I have nothing to say. I need your help
to revive the light!
Text_Korean:
亨特是在四處走動來幫助我，這是真的嗎？
謝謝你，但為什麼我一直要求你做危險的事情？ /page 之後，我無話可說。但為了重振光明，我們需要你的力量。這次也請借給我你的力量。

Text_English:
Among us, there's no one more powerful.
I hope you understand. We need your help.
Text_Korean:
現在我們誰都沒有能力超越你。
所以，我別無選擇，只能請你幫個忙，所以請理解。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Skirmish Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Liberate the Area!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">解放每個地區！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">推廣的重要性（四）</>

我很弱，但我從來沒有輸過低級別的比賽。
畢竟，我有朋友比我低，因為他們是士兵中最好的。在一對一的比賽中籤出 /page 怎麼樣？

我不知道你不能知道你對手的等級。
因為我與熟悉的面孔競爭...這是我的疏忽。 /page 但是您可能永遠不會輸給較低的排名。
哦，這不是我的叔叔。
<span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">挑戰一對一戰鬥，贏取晉級石！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">失寵（4）</>

我想我很快就會和你一起去冒險。
所以我必須準備好在我不在的時候運行鍛爐。 /page 所以請。相反，讓我盡我所能來幫助你。
你現在咕噥了什麼？
太感謝了。但我有沒有喃喃說，給予很多獎勵比全心全意幫助更好？ /page你之前不是說過嗎！讓我把它保存在我的記憶中。
<span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">獲取和出售裝備！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">統治者的黑暗（四）</>

阿茲莉爾身上的仇恨之火越來越強烈。
即使是異種存在，它的力量也是非常危險的。 /page 你把他打倒，拿一塊來奪取他的力量怎麼樣？

統治者的力量將幫助你對抗總有一天會到來的絕對黑暗。
收集碎片的戰鬥並不容易，但請確保您不會錯過它。
<span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 4-10 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗 Azrael 獲得碎片！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gladiator's Attack Power (11)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">戰鬥極限(1)</>

Text_English:
It is unclear why the Sky Castle reappeared.
But you know that they are stronger than before, right? /page You may feel confident, but I must say that you always need to be prepared.
Increase your attack power.
Text_Korean:
不知道為什麼消失的天空城堡會重新出現，但經歷過戰鬥的人都知道那裡的惡魔很強大，對吧？ /page 即使你有信心，我想你也需要做好準備。
讓我們嘗試比現在更多地提高我們的戰鬥力。

Text_English:
At this rate, you may do well at the castle gates.
You will grow even stronger through battle.
Text_Korean:
你必須處理它才能找出答案，但我認為這對於入口來說已經足夠了。
如果是你，通過入口後，戰鬥中可能會變得更強大。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Gladiator's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升英雄戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Retaking the Sky Castle</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">天城之戰重新開始</>

Text_English:
Instead of Remiel, I will help you retake the Sky Castle.
Surprised? I was once a warrior myself. /page We should get going while the lord commander continues his investigation.
Enter the castle and defeat the demons.
Text_Korean:
既然苧麻大人不在，那我就來幫你積累空城戰的經驗吧。
這很奇怪嗎？很難相信，但我是過去最好的戰士之一。 /page 不管怎樣，在總司令得到信息的時候，我們必須儘自己的一份力量。
進入天空城堡並擊敗惡魔。

Text_English:
Does the reappearance of the Sky Castle means that Nidhogg has returned?
That's a terrible thought. /page The council is in shock with some new revelations.
I am growing increasingly wary of what lies ahead.
Text_Korean:
天城歸來，也就意味著尼德霍格歸來？
我越想它，它就越可怕。 /page 哦，當總司令和魔法委員會發現一些信息時，我驚呆了。
我很擔心這是什麼信息，但我的心的一側卻在燃燒。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-1 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-1 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Vivian's Peace</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">薇薇安永遠安息…… </>

Text_English:
The spirits of the fallen heroes reappeared as well.
Why is that the case? /page Is it Vivian? These heroes were once my comrades.
Help Vivian find peace.
Text_Korean:
在天空之城死去的英雄們的靈魂也重新出現了。
沒有人打電話給他們，但他們是如何重新出現的？ /page 是先輪到薇薇安嗎？那些英雄是與我並肩作戰的同志。
為我的戰友薇薇安祈禱。

Text_English:
I hope the spirits would find eternal peace,
but there's no way of telling… Nothing is easy. /page This may also mean that Perez has come back, too.
This isn't going to be easy.
Text_Korean:
真想讓他們永遠安息，可現在的水流是不可預知的……這個世界上沒有什麼是容易的。 /page 那些朋友的再次出現，是不是意味著貝雷斯也在呢？
這將是一場令人討厭的戰鬥。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-2 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-2 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Worlds Alike</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">同一個世界</>

Text_English:
The lord commander told me what he found out. I am in shock.
It's not the demons that resurrected it is us that are in a different world! /page This is a world that resembles our own.
We need more information. Defeat the demons and acquire more ripples.
Text_Korean:
總司令給了我到目前為止我們找到的信息。我聽了也很震驚。
不是惡魔復活了，而是我們來到了另一個世界！ /page 這是我們的世界，但它是另一個世界。
我需要更多信息，所以打敗魔鬼並獲得一波力量。

Text_English:
So the ripple cut through space and time to entirely relocate Elysium…
Does this even make sense? This place looks so much like ours… /page Who in the world did this? I am scared to know...
We must keep it together.
Text_Korean:
一股未知力量的波動，移動著時空，移動著整個極樂世界……
這有意義嗎？還有一個如此相似的世界…… /page 我很害怕也很好奇這是誰做的以及出於什麼目的。
您還需要保持警惕。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-3 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-3 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Another Avelin</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">再戰艾弗林</>

Text_English:
We need to keep moving.
The other Avelin should be nearby. /page Bring her peace, as if she is the one we knew.
Text_Korean:
仍在尋找更隱藏的東西，我們繼續前進。
Avelin 不，是時候面對另一個 Avelin。 /page 考慮一下她的艾芙琳，讓她休息一下。

Text_English:
Everything makes sense if this is a different world.
It explains why we are missing those that helped us. /page Reaching Lilith in this world does not require the fairy portal,
and Azrael is just a demon here.
Text_Korean:
是啊，如果這是一個不同的世界，我迄今為止遇到的事情就毫無意義。
這意味著我們在這個世界上需要的東西在這裡毫無意義。 /page Lilith 這裡可以不用仙門，
因為這裡的 Azrael 只是一個惡魔 Azrael。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-4 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-4 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Strike of Fury</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">貝雷斯的狂暴打擊</>

Text_English:
You don't have to have feelings toward the spirits here.
They are not the ones we knew. /page But Perez is different.
His cruelty would be the same. Bring him justice.
Text_Korean:
那麼，從現在開始，不要把感情寄託在英雄的靈魂上。
因為他們看起來一樣，但他們不同，他們甚至不認識你。 /page 但我可以對佩雷斯施加更多的憤怒。
殘酷和兇猛將是相同的。讓他打敗他。

Text_English:
Good job. You are doing very well.
I sense that you are increasingly becoming a true hero. /page The lord commander has more news. I will tell you soon.
Text_Korean:
到目前為止，你做得很好。即使面對令人驚訝的事實，你也不會動搖。
我能在你身上感受到一個完整英雄的性格。 /page 很快總司令會告訴你另一個事實。聽我說。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-5 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-5 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gladiator's War (10)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">角斗士的戰爭 (10)</>

Text_English:
Did you hear? We are at a different world…
I was so scared that I almost fainted. /page There is no point in finding the demons for revenge.
This is a war for our safe return.
Text_Korean:
你聽到消息了嗎？難道我們來到了另一個世界……
我非常驚訝和害怕，我幾乎要黑了。 /page 那麼尋找作為複仇目標的惡魔是沒有意義的。
我們必須打一場戰爭才能回來。

Text_English:
I don't know how the war will end,
but I will be here for you until the end.
Text_Korean: 我不知道你未來的戰爭會是什麼樣子，但我會幫助你直到最後。這是一場美妙的勝利。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Skirmish Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Gladiator! Cleanse the Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">作為角斗士在每個地區掃除邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Assassin's Revenge (10)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">刺客復仇 (10)</>

Text_English:
There is no one to revenge in this world. They just look the same.
The only one that deserves revenge is the one behind all of these. /page We must defeat the demons and find a way back.
We can do this. It would be a great story to tell.
Text_Korean:
這個世界上沒有人可以報復你。這是同一件事，但它是不同的。
從現在開始，對那些用權力的浪潮讓我們變成這樣的人報仇。 /page 擊敗惡魔，倖存下來並找到回去的路。
如果你活下來並回來，這將是一個巨大的報復。

Text_English:
The battle is different, but it all comes down to protecting our world.
I am not sure how we will go back. But I trust you for what it's worth.
Text_Korean:
戰鬥的意義變了，但服務世界的本質是一樣的。
其實，我不知道我還能不能回去，但我想它會因為你而實現。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Skirmish Mission </>/div<span color="#ffffff">Assassin! Cleanse the Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">用刺客橫掃各個地區的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">The Ripple's Effect</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">力波對世界的影響</>

Text_English:
We found out something about the effects caused by the ripple of power.
We are not moved to a different world. Instead, the ripple created a portal. /page For some reason, we fell into the portal,
but that also means that we have a way back.
Text_Korean:
我必須告訴你一件嚴肅的事情。我發現了力波對世界的影響。
它並沒有把我們帶到另一個世界，而是打開了一條通道。當/page通道打開時，據說我們是在另一種力量的作用下流入的。
聽說已經有回去的路了，還是可以去的。

Text_English:
This is a world that the demons won.
Without you, our own world would look like this. /page Now, you are liberating this world as well.
They say that there are other worlds beyond this... /page Parallel universe? It confuses me, but basically, they say that it's a place
that is just like ours, only much stronger...
Text_Korean:
據說，這個世界已經被惡魔陰謀得逞了。
如果沒有你，我們的世界就會變成這樣。 /page 而隨著你的行動，這個地方也正在逐漸被解放。
但他說似乎在這個世界之外還有另一個世界。 /pageParallel 宇宙？不知道是不是很難說，但我說過這裡會和原來的世界差不多。然而，卻檢測到了一股強大的地獄能量。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Elysium</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Conversation with Broch</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 極樂世界</> /div<span color="#ffffff">與破碎者對話</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Journey to Another World</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">異世界之旅</>

Text_English:
They say that if you can disrupt the ripple at the Sky Castle,
another world would open. What say you? /page It may be a world of even more powerful evil.
You choose. But if you continue, do not stop.
Text_Korean:
都說，只要干擾到天宮邊緣的力量波動，就能開闢出另一個世界。你會怎麼做？ /page 一個可能有比現在更強大的惡魔的世界。
選擇權在你。如果你也想解放那個世界，就不要停止前進。

Text_English:
Your valor is always impressive. You know no fear
even against the strongest demons. /page Your journey would make you even more powerful.
But always be prepared, especially when you can.
Text_Korean:
還有，你很勇敢。可能有更強大的敵人，但
無所畏懼地前進。是英雄的使命感嗎？ /page 不管是什麼原因，如果你去那個世界，你會很強大。
只要確保您在這裡準備充分。為了不掉在那裡... .

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-6 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-6 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Jin's Shadow</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">靳魂心準備</>

Text_English:
Defeat the spirit when you are ready.
You must stay strong. This is nothing compared to what you have gone through.
Text_Korean:
當你做好心理準備時，拿下金的靈魂。
以幽默克服當前困難的心態。

Text_English:
The possibility of meeting an even stronger Jin...
That would quite be burdensome, no? You must be stronger.
Text_Korean: 如果你認為自己會打開下一個世界，遇到比現在更強大的晉魂，那不是很累嗎？如果預期失敗，你必須變得更強大。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-7 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-7 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Battle Calm</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">下定決心的戰鬥</>

Text_English:
I got too excited to see you in action.
There is still a long way to go. /page Nidhogg is still out there,
so you need to be calm in the battles ahead.
Text_Korean:
我想我對你的勇氣感到有些興奮。
仍有許多強大的敵人需要擊敗。 /pageSieg 的靈魂並不強大，尤其是 Nidhogg。
重新振作起來，戰鬥吧。

Text_English:
I guess I was the only one who needed to be calm.
You are stable as a rock. My apologies.
Text_Korean:
猜猜我是唯一一個分心的人？哈哈。我為此感到羞恥。
您堅定不移且始終如一，但我一直在嘮叨您。對不起。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-8 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-8 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Wizard's Journey (10)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">巫師之旅 (10)</>

Text_English:
The end of this battle is near. But you would continue the war, right?
Make sure you are fully prepared.
Text_Korean:
這裡的旅程即將結束。你會馬上開始你的下一個旅程嗎？
確保您的旅程保持原樣。

Text_English:
What will happen when this is all over?
I hope you find peace and tranquility.
Text_Korean:
你的旅程有一天會結束嗎？
希望旅途的盡頭充滿平安與幸福。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Skirmish Mission </>/div<span color="#ffffff">Wizard! Cleanse the Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務<//> /div<span color="#ffffff">用巫師掃蕩每個區域的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Fighter's Challenge (10)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">前鋒的挑戰（10）</>

Text_English:
I see you are getting ready before the fight against Nidhogg.
You know the value of being prepared. /page Defeat these demons as part of that preparation.
Text_Korean:
它在更強大的 Nidhogg 的挑戰之前燃燒。
您知道，為挑戰做準備並不害羞。 /page 準備迎接重大挑戰並擊敗惡魔。

Text_English:
I can see how powerful you've become.
I hope you can defeat Nidhogg as well.
Text_Korean:
看起來你比第一個更強壯，所以你甚至不能熱身。
我希望你也能打敗 Nidhogg。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Skirmish Mission </>/div<span color="#ffffff">Fighter! Cleanse the Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[子]戰鬥任務<//> /div<span color="#ffffff">作為戰士橫掃各個地區的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Returning the Favor</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">教學重酬</>

Text_English:
Soon, you will face Zic again. You know, he was a great teacher.
But the new Zic is different. He would be ruthless.
Text_Korean:
我會遇到Zeke的精神。他的教學很棒。
但是要小心，這裡的 Zeke 會毫不留情地攻擊你，而不是這樣。

Text_English:
Zic once said that he will always be standing before Nidhogg.
I expect the same here. /page Now that Zic is gone, we earned the passage.
Text_Korean:
我曾經說過，如果你不超過他，你就無法擊敗 Nidhogg。
可能是同樣的事情，儘管這裡的 Zeke 沒有說什麼。 /page既然你打敗了齊格，你就有資格打敗尼德霍格。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-9 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Empowered Evil!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-9 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殲滅更強大的邪惡！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Liberation</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">世界的最後一戰與解放</>

Text_English:
The last fight in this world is near. Be prepared.
You don't need my advice, but this is Nidhogg we are talking about. /page I wish you the best.
Liberate this world, and open the next one.
Text_Korean:
這是世界上的最後一戰。做好準備。
你不需要我的嘮叨，但你在談論 Nidhogg。 /page 祝你好運，這樣你就可以隨心所欲地解放這個世界，打開通往下一個世界的通道。

Text_English:
Truly impressive. You beat Nidhogg, a much more powerful one, that is.
I can feel the ripple of power opening once more. It's the path to the next world. /page You've done very well. Thank you.
Text_Korean:
那太棒了。我會打敗變得如此強大的尼德霍格。
我感覺到一股強烈的力量。現在，通往下一個世界的通道將被打開。 /page 到目前為止，你做得很好。太感謝了。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-10 Hard</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat Nidhogg, Open the Portal!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-10 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗尼德霍格，開啟通往另一個世界的通道！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">推廣的重要性（五）</>

我一直在想我上次談到的與下層階級的鬥爭。
我得出的結論是，為了擊敗高階，等級需要很高。 /page 如果你獲得比現在更高的排名，你會贏得更多，
然後你會獲得更多的晉升席位，對嗎？立即嘗試！

我知道我想得太簡單了。
但我認為這是一個很有可能獲勝的結論。 /page 有時簡單是正確的答案，不是嗎？
哈哈哈……哈哈…嗯，對不起。
<span color="#ffde00">[子]戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">挑戰一對一戰鬥，贏取晉級石！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">布魯克的恩惠 (5)</>

看你打架，心裡暖暖的。
對不起，我讓你打架... . /page 對不起，我必須再次運行鍛造，所以我會問。

就好像我對你的要求是去一家普通的餐館點你經常吃的東西。 /page 我很感謝你能理解並一起做所有事情。
下次要更真誠。
<span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">獲取和出售裝備！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">統治者的黑暗（五）</>

你已經到了最困難和最重要的階段。
驅散尼德霍格的黑暗並獲得一塊來完成它。

你打得真好。為了製服更強大的尼德霍格…… .
您將克服遇到的任何敵人。總是挑戰極限。
<span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 5-10 Elite</> /div<span color="#ffffff">殺死尼德霍格以獲得碎片！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gladiator's Attack Power (12)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">戰鬥極限（2）</>

Text_English:
A more dangerous world awaits.
Why not do some preparations?
Text_Korean:
現在我要去一個比這裡更強大的惡魔的世界。
您為什麼不將其視為在那之前的準備並增加您的戰鬥力？

Text_English:
I don't know how strong the demons will be,
but I think you can make it.
Text_Korean: 不知道來世的魔族到底有多厲害，但我覺得目前的水平是可以的。請勝利。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Gladiator's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升英雄戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Pathfinder's Struggle (5)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">使者的鬥爭（5）</>

Text_English:
The gate to an even more dangerous world is open.
I am impressed by your dauntless courage against the unknown. /page Make sure that the evil in this world is cleansed.
It would be a good preparation before the next adventure.
Text_Korean:
他打開了通往黑暗世界的大門，那裡比現在更強大。
我佩服你不再害怕未知黑暗的勇氣。 /page在你離開之前一定要平息這個世界的黑暗。
在新的冒險之前，這對您來說是一個很好的準備練習。

Text_English:
I will follow you. I mean, it's not really free riding...
I just want to see what you will become in the end.
Text_Korean:
我會追隨你的勇氣。其實就是搭車，但是...
我想再次通過你看到我勇氣的盡頭。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Skirmish Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Demons!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[子]戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">打敗惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Reviving the Light (5)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">重振希望之光（5）</>

Text_English:
The light is restored, thanks to you.
This world is safe now. /page For one last time, help ensure that the light grows stronger.
Text_Korean:
多虧了你，這個世界的希望之光才重新燃起。
就像一個擁有原始歷史的世界。 /page 我希望你最後一次給光，讓它恢復生機。

Text_English:
Despite the greater danger waiting for us,
many will follow your lead, /page just like me and Hunt.
We will help and do what we can.
Text_Korean:
許多人會跟隨你，即使下一個世界會有更強烈的黑暗等待著你。 /page 像我和亨特一樣想要關注你。
雖然我們很小，但我希望我們能成為你心中的力量。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Skirmish Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Liberate the Area!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">解放每個地區！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">The Flames of Hell</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">地獄火世界</>

Text_English:
I sense a powerful darkness, as if the flames of hell is in front of us.
I am worried. /page This is an entirely different level of evil.
Can we survive? I pray for our victory.
Text_Korean:
我感覺到黑暗比我想像的要強烈。我感受到了地獄的火焰。
我有點後悔不久前關注了你。 /page 你能否以前所未有的黑暗和似乎吞噬生命的力量擊敗地獄之火......祝你好運。

Text_English:
Your victory makes me feel relieved.
Thank you, Pathfinder, for being here.
Text_Korean:
看到你的勝利，我羞愧了一陣子。
謝謝你給我勇氣看你到最後。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-1 Nightmare</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Superior Demons!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-1 Nightmare</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗所有獲得地獄之力的惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Hellfire Demons</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">地獄驅動的惡魔</>

Text_English:
This is a world similar to ours, but the demons are much more powerful.
Without you, it was doomed to fall. /page End this tyranny of evil. Free this world.
Text_Korean:
它和我們生活的世界很相似，但惡魔的力量不同。
因為這是一個沒有你的世界，所以它別無選擇，只能被佔領。 /page 請用自己的力量在嚴酷的現實中拯救這個世界。

Text_English:
It is truly impressive to see you fight against these demons.
I wouldn't dare face them. /page These hellfire demons are strong indeed.
Be careful at all times.
Text_Korean:
很高興你在這裡戰勝了看起來像要凍結的惡魔。 /page 但是地獄火中的惡魔似乎更強大。
當它們出現時請小心。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-2 Nightmare</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Superior Demons!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-2 Nightmare</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗所有獲得地獄之力的惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Hunt's Fear</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">對狩獵的恐懼</>

Text_English:
I take it that you are well prepared for this kind of fight.
You are doing well so far, /page but these are no ordinary demons.
Make sure that you don't let your guards down.
Text_Korean:
似乎你已經做好了準備
在你穿越到一個黑暗的世界之前，彷彿地獄已經到來。到目前為止，看到你打得很好。 /page 但是，這個世界上的惡魔似乎比預期的要強大。
在這場戰鬥結束後考慮休息一下。

Text_English:
Come to think of it, you've been working so hard lately.
Why not take a vacation? /page You can always return to your own world.
Oh, I'm not saying this because I am scared.
Text_Korean:
想一想，到目前為止，你已經喘不過氣來了。
你為什麼不停下來喘口氣？ /page 有可能回到原來的世界，所以也要考慮一下。
當然，這不是因為我害怕。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-3 Nightmare</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Superior Demons!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-3 Nightmare</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗所有獲得地獄之力的惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Demonic Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">惡魔獲得的力量</>

Text_English:
Gaius found something.
The council is examining it. /page Depending on what it is, we may better understand what needs to be done.
Prepare for battle.
Text_Korean:
蓋烏斯似乎發現了什麼。
您說您目前正在與魔法委員會進行分析。 /page 取決於它的結果，除了解放這個世界之外，可能還有其他目標。結束這場戰鬥吧。

Text_English:
Well done! Another great victory. We also have news.
It seems like there is a source to the darkness. /page It provides hellfire energy to the demons.
I will tell you more as soon as I hear something.
Text_Korean:
這又是一場美妙的勝利。及時，新的信息已經到來。
這個世界的惡魔似乎擁有力量之源。 /page這是惡魔供應他們從力量洗禮中獲得的地獄之火的地方。
一旦有新信息可用，我們將通知您。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-4 Nightmare</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Superior Demons!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-4 Nightmare</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗所有獲得地獄之力的惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gladiator's Judgment (1)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">角斗士的審判（一）</>

Text_English:
The shadow, Rattus, is a totally different demon
than the one you fought before, /page but it deserves the same fate as the others.
Bring justice to this demon.
Text_Korean:
拉圖斯，這個世界的地獄掠奪者，比其他世界的拉圖斯還要強大。我會像正義的法官一樣冷笑。 /page 但是你的裁判會是另一回事，不是嗎？
請給那個惡魔一個不可抗拒的判斷。

Text_English:
Too see so many suffering from such demons…
Does justice have no sway in this world? /page You must end this tragedy.
Continue the work you have begun!
Text_Korean:
眼見正義被如此強大的邪惡踐踏，不知道沒有力量的正義是否就像幻覺。 /page 在這樣的世界裡，你是正確的判斷者，
我認為要保持這種資格需要無盡的努力。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-3 Nightmare</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Gladiator! Defeat the Shadow Rattus!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-3 Nightmare</> /div<span color="#ffffff">使用角斗士來審判地獄掠奪者拉圖斯！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Assassin's Strike (1)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">刺客對決（一）</>

Text_English:
The sword master is much more powerful
than the one you fought before. /page You must defeat it.
For revenge, for victory.
Text_Korean:
黑暗骷髏騎士團長擁有更強大的部下和更強大的黑暗力量。是個難纏的對手。 /page 但是你必須能夠擊敗
才能有能力完成你的複仇。採取措施為未來而戰。

Text_English:
I may be too harsh on you.
This war is changing me... /page But to see you prevail, I feel a little more relieved. Good job.
Text_Korean: 我想我正在一點一點地改變。即使我很了解你的心，我還是在嚴厲地驅使你。 /page 恐怕我不知道自己是變強了還是變壞了，但如果我能在你身邊，還是變強吧？這是一場美妙的勝利。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-4 Nightmare</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Assassin! Defeat the Sword Master!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-4 Nightmare</> /div<span color="#ffffff">作為刺客殲滅黑暗骷髏指揮官！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">For Hunt</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">狩獵的安慰... </>

Text_English:
Words about Gote are spreading,
that he may have demon blood... /page I don't like how it sounds.
Defeat the monster that defiled his name.
Text_Korean:
有傳言說哥特大人即使在黑暗的世界裡也會以敵人的身份出現。
我想知道他是否混入了一些惡魔之血。 /page 我討厭謠言，但我很沮喪，因為我不知道為什麼。
請擊敗其他看起來像那個被玷污的哥特大人的生物。

Text_English:
I have no idea whether the rumors are true.
Gote may have been influenced by Rachel indeed, /page but I cannot stand the vile words against him.
Thank you for understanding me.
Text_Korean:
不知道是哥特從蕾切爾那裡得到了黑暗之力重新出現在這個世界上的緣故，還是傳聞是真的。 /page 但是我無法忍受被我的熟人哥特侮辱的感覺。
謝謝你安慰我。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-5 Nightmare</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Superior Demons!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-5 Nightmare</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗所有獲得地獄之力的惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">The Source</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">地獄之力的源泉</>

Text_English:
There's more news about the source that is empowering the demons.
It can be found in the place where the area boss used to be. /page If we can liberate each area from the source,
this world may be free after all.
Text_Korean:
關於賦予惡魔力量的來源的信息已經出現。
據說這個地方是每個地區的負責人所在的地方。 /page我相信，如果我們去除賦予惡魔無限地獄力量的源頭，這個可怕的世界也會得到解放。

Text_English:
Make no mistakes. It will be a tough journey,
but you must persevere. /page Perhaps if you have someone dear to you...
Were you thinking about Arin? I'm just joking.
Text_Korean:
一段沒有想像中那麼輕鬆的旅程。
為什麼可以理解但重要的地方總是老闆所在的地方？ /page 在這樣的時代，我們需要愛的力量去信任和依靠。
說這話的時候，我想起了阿林大人…… ?不要誤會我的意思。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Elysium</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Conversation with Hunt</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 極樂世界</> /div<span color="#ffffff">與亨特交談</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">A Hero's Destiny</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">英雄難逃的命運</>

Text_English:
I am shaken by the power of the demons.
How can you fight against these monsters? /page I would have run away...
But you are always here, destined to fight.
Text_Korean:
再一次，我為這個世界的惡魔之力而戰栗。
你怎麼能一直對付這些可怕的敵人？ /page 這似乎是我想避免的命運。
按照我們的命運，這一次我們必須再次戰鬥，所以我祝你好運。

Text_English:
You did well, but I worry if you are growing tired.
When would this all end... /page Would there be even more stronger demons?
Whoever is behind this, they must pay.
Text_Korean:
你贏得很好，但我擔心你越來越難。
惡魔的世界會在哪裡結束，邪惡的世界會在什麼時候結束...... . /page 恐怕還有比這更強大的惡魔存在的世界。
這樣一個世界的創造者一定是最邪惡的。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-6 Nightmare</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Superior Demons!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-6 Nightmare</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗所有獲得地獄之力的惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Grandfather's Diary</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">爺爺的日記</>

Text_English:
I found my grandfather's diary.
It had many stories about his heroic adventures. /page If I find something interesting, I will tell you.
I'll be reading while you are fighting.
Text_Korean:
我偶然發現了我祖父的日記。
它是關於具有令人興奮的傳奇的英雄的。 /page 我急於閱讀，如果我發現一些有趣的東西，我會告訴你。
我們很快就會在冒險中見到你。

Text_English:
I know, I know... I should have helped you instead of reading a book.
But hey, I found something interesting. /page The diary talks about the world that they explored, and
it sounds a lot similar to this one. Perhaps the others have been here before.
Text_Korean:
很抱歉，你在努力奮鬥的時候一直在看你的日記。
但我發現了一些有趣的東西。 /page這是對他祖父遇到的英雄所經歷的世界的描述，
與這個世界非常相似。這意味著有人已經到過這個世界。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-7 Nightmare</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Superior Demons!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-7 Nightmare</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗所有獲得地獄之力的惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">A Hero's Legacy</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">前任英雄留下的功課</>

Text_English:
My grandfather did not seem to believe what the other heroes said about this world,
but I was so surprised that they knew. /page Perhaps the hero who traveled across failed to save this world.
It's a legacy that you must complete.
Text_Korean:
我爺爺不相信一個彷彿經歷過這個世界的英雄的話，但我讀的時候起雞皮疙瘩。 /page 看來他並沒有解放這個世界。
你似乎是唯一一個能解決他給你的作業的人。

Text_English:
Repeated battles and stronger demons...
I know it is a great burden, but please be strong. /page You have much more to accomplish.
Text_Korean:
反复的戰鬥，與更強的惡魔打交道的痛苦。
這樣的事情會讓你筋疲力盡，但請堅強。 /page 你會變得更強大，並取得別人無法做到的壯舉。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-8 Nightmare</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Superior Demons!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-8 Nightmare</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗所有獲得地獄之力的惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Wizard's Determination (1)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">法師的決心（一）</>

Text_English:
It seems like demons like the sword master never die.
Or are there just too many of them? /page Either way, it's a demon that you would not like.
Its return is annoying. Defeat it once more.
Text_Korean:
像黑暗骷髏騎士這樣的惡魔似乎沒有永恆的死亡。
或者是它們看起來很相似，無法區分它們？ /page 你是一個違背你討厭的自然法則的惡魔。
刺客打敗了你，但請打敗再次出現的惡魔。

Text_English:
Where does evil come from? Its tendency to go against nature?
That may sound innovative for some, but do not be fooled. /page It's another way by which the demons lure you.
Going against something that is good for all is not innovation.
Text_Korean:
邪惡是邪惡的，因為它違反了天意或規則嗎？
但是當你弄錯了，這聽起來像是一件革命性的事情。 /page 這是一個甜蜜的誘惑。
但是，打破有利於所有人的規則不應被視為創新。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-6 Nightmare</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Wizard! Defeat the Sword Master!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-6 Nightmare</> /div<span color="#ffffff">用巫師擊敗黑暗骷髏指揮官！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Fighter's Calling (1)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">前鋒的血洗 (1)</>

Text_English:
You must have faced enemies who use magic,
but hell's Rachel is no ordinary opponent. /page I don't want to excite you, but I am simply worried.
Prove me wrong.
Text_Korean:
你有與使用魔法的對手戰鬥的經驗嗎？
但地獄女巫雷切爾將比她以前的對手更難對付。 /page 我不是故意挑釁你的遊戲，但這是真的。
請打敗那個惡魔，讓我的擔心白費。

Text_English:
I was a fool! Great job!
This battle must have taught you a lot.
Text_Korean:
而且，我的擔心是徒勞的。
但這場戰鬥對你來說也是一次寶貴的經歷。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-8 Nightmare</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Fighter! Defeat Hell's Rachel!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-8 Nightmare</> /div<span color="#ffffff">作為戰士擊敗地獄女巫雷切爾！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">A Different City</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">異次元城市</>

Text_English:
We call it Luemos because it looks the same,
but this is technically a different city, right? /page We need to figure out how to call this place after it is liberated.
Let me think about it.
Text_Korean:
我們為了方便起見叫它Ruemos，但嚴格來說，它是異世界的城市，不應該叫不同嗎？解放/page後，我覺得有必要把它和原來的Ruemos區分開來。
解放後我必須考慮一下。請。

Text_English:
I've been thinking, and it seems best
to call this place Luemos as well. /page We won't be moving back and forth after all.
Liberation is near. Keep going!
Text_Korean:
我一直在考慮，但與其稱它為地獄的Ruemos，還不如直接稱它為Ruemos。 /page 畢竟，我們生活的世界並不重疊。
現在我們正處於完全解放的邊緣。感謝你的付出。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-9 Nightmare</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Superior Demons!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-9 Nightmare</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗所有獲得地獄之力的惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">The First Source</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">摧毀第一個邪能能量源</>

Text_English:
We are about to enter the place where the source is.
It will be a difficult battle. /page If we win, it would be the first step
toward cleansing the darkness.
Text_Korean: 這個世界的最後境界 Ruemos 和地獄之力的第一個來源。這將是一場艱苦的戰鬥。 /page 但是如果你贏了，這將是驅散這個世界更強大的黑暗的成功的第一步。贏。

Text_English:
You achieved a great victory against Caligula.
Even the hellfire could not stop you. /page Now that the first source of hellfire is gone,
there will be less darkness. Thank you.
Text_Korean: 就連被地獄之火吞沒的地獄犬，它們的主人卡里古拉也精彩的擊敗了它們。 /page 至此，我們已經消除了第一個邪能之源，黑暗勢力將逐漸減弱。謝謝。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-10 Nightmare</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat Caligula, Destroy the Source!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-10 Nightmare</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗卡利古拉以阻止地獄的力量！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Spread the Light! (1)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">宣揚光的力量（一）</>

Text_English:
You have a powerful light within you.
You must spread it throughout this forsaken world. /page Teach the demons a lesson.
They will fall one after another.
Text_Korean:
你擁有強大的光能。我們必須在一個強大的黑暗統治的地方傳播光明的力量
地獄比比皆是。 /page 像使用狼牙棒一樣使用光的力量，讓這裡的惡魔嚐嚐它的滋味。
他們會屈服的。

Text_English:
Stronger darkness must be dealt with stronger light.
Let it shine all the way.
Text_Korean:
強大的黑暗驅散了更強大的光。
因為如果您不透露更多信息，它可能會被吞下。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Skirmish Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Demons!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[子]戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">打敗惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Flower in the Dirt (1)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">泥中花（一）</>

Text_English:
In this place, light is like a flower blossoming in the dirt.
Protect the flower. I beg you.
Text_Korean:
在這個充滿地獄能量的地方，光就像一朵在泥濘中綻放的花朵。
請保護這朵花。我求你。

Text_English:
I forgot about the other flower.
That is you, Pathfinder. Thank you for your valor.
Text_Korean:
我只是在想我們帶來的光的力量，但有一朵花我忘記了。
我認為你是在這個世界的泥濘中綻放的花朵。謝謝你。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Skirmish Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Liberate the Area!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">解放每個地區！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">促銷價值（1）</>

光明使者，這裡的惡魔比之前強大多了。
所以我認為即使是像麻雀一樣小的力量也會幫助你。不要錯過 /page 促銷，因為它的價值正在增長。

一兩次促銷不會有任何區別。
但這個小小的開始會導致班級變化。
<span color="#ffde00">[子]戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">挑戰一對一戰鬥，贏取晉級石！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">布羅克的懇求（一）</>

鑑於這裡的情況，我應該求你而不是要求它。
我會挖掘地面並建造一座寺廟，所以請收集設備並出售它。

實際上，我比以前更注意了，因為獎勵會比我的弓更好。
從現在開始，不，聽我的懇求。
<span color="#ffde00">[Sub] 戰鬥任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">獲取和出售裝備！ </>
<span color="#ffffff">統治者的原始（一）</>

即使是被認為是統治者中最弱的卡利古拉，也擁有可怕的力量。
當然你贏了，但是......這種力量肯定會有所幫助。 /pageKill Caligula 並獲得更多碎片來增加你的力量。

你可以責怪我把我帶入了一場艱苦的戰鬥。
但請理解我希望對您有所幫助的願望。
<span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 1-10 Nightmare</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗卡利古拉獲得碎片！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Gladiator's Attack Power (13)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">戰鬥極限（3）</>

Text_English:
So what's hellfire like? Not so easy?
Why don't you increase your attack power before heading to the next area?
Text_Korean:
被地獄的力量擊中是什麼感覺？那不是很容易嗎？
為什麼不在繼續下一個區域之前檢查一下自己的力量？

Text_English:
Increasing your strength is not an easy thing to do,
but you will acquire better equipment that will help you along the way.
Text_Korean: 戰鬥力將難以提升。但是這裡的冒險會給你更好的裝備，讓你變得更強壯，所以給它你的力量。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] Upgrade Mission</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Increase Your Gladiator's Attack Power</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub]強化任務</> /div<span color="#ffffff">提升英雄戰鬥力</>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Bella's Concern</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">貝拉的幻覺</>

Text_English:
I almost get confused when I see these demons in the forest,
as if these demons took over our forest. /page Everything is different yet so similar...
Help me get rid of these thoughts.
Text_Korean:
當我看到更強大的惡魔出現在森林中時，我想我是在妄想。
這是一種幻覺，好像更強大的惡魔接管了原始世界的仙女森林。我認為這是因為其他惡魔出現在一個看起來像 /page 的空間中。
請幫助我阻止我的幻想變成現實。

Text_English:
I heard that the worlds are connected
through Elysium in our world. /page If the demons in this world take control of the portal,
my worries may come true. Please make sure that it doesn't.
Text_Korean:
第二世界因為與原世界的力量波動而打開，
既然你打開了通道，世界上的每個人都知道極樂世界和通道是相連的。 /page 如果這個世界的強大惡魔通過開放的通道進入原始世界，幻想將成為現實。請不要讓這種情況發生。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-1 Nightmare</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Superior Demons!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-1 Nightmare</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗所有獲得地獄之力的惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">The Black Veil</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">神秘的黑暗</>

Text_English:
It must be no coincidence that the power of hell
took over this world. Someone must be behind all of these. /page The magic council thinks the same.
Defeating the demons will tell us what's behind the black veil.
Text_Korean:
想來想去，地獄之力席捲這個世界似乎並非巧合。一定有人出於某種目的讓惡魔變得更強大。 /page魔法委員會也有同樣的期望。會有不為人知的黑暗。
如果你打敗了惡魔，你能找到黑暗嗎？

Text_English:
I thought it was the death priest behind the black veil,
but there is no way to tell. /page Perhaps we may know more as we destroy the sources.
Whoever it is, it would not like to see that.
Text_Korean:
黑屏讓我想起了死亡牧師，但直到現在都沒有任何痕跡。
我什至很難預測它到底是誰。 /page如果你破壞地獄的能量源，它就會出現，對吧？
這違背了他的目的。你做得很好。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-2 Nightmare</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Superior Demons!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-2 Nightmare</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗所有獲得地獄之力的惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">Wizard's Determination (2)</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">法師的決心（二）</>

Text_English:
So many have suffered painful death
because of the blood addict. /page We must bring down this horrible creature.
Be careful. It would be a dangerous fight.
Text_Korean:
許多生命正被血獵魔蝠蹂躪，這是一種似乎從地獄中出現的怪物，以獲取生物的鮮血。 /page渴望熱血的惡魔需要冷酷的懲罰。
但你也必須小心。真是個危險的對手。

Text_English:
Your decisiveness is a critical weapon
against your enemies. Thank you.
Text_Korean:
不僅僅是在戰鬥中的準確判斷，對目的的清醒決心
我認為你真正的武器。這是一場偉大的戰鬥。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-1 Nightmare</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Wizard! Defeat the Blood Addict!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-1 Nightmare</> /div<span color="#ffffff">用巫師擊敗血獵魔蝠！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">A Hero's Cause</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">英雄為了什麼而戰</>

Text_English:
Are you getting tired from all these battles?
If so, ask yourself. /page Why do you fight? What is your purpose?
If you can't answer now, I hope you can after this battle.
Text_Korean:
你不厭倦日益激烈的戰鬥嗎？
在那種情況下，想想這個問題。 /page 你為什麼而戰？你為了什麼而戰？
如果你忘記了，我希望你能在這場戰鬥中找到答案。

Text_English:
Remember that you must not forget why you are doing this.
I need you to keep reminding yourself. /page We believe in you. But then again,
it is you who will decide.
Text_Korean:
據說盲目地做任何事情都會淹沒你的目的。
我很擔心你，所以想想吧。 /page 我們寄希望於您，但您的想法可能與我們不同，您的戰鬥不是您的職責。

Text_English: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-3 Nightmare</>/div<span color="#ffffff">Defeat the Superior Demons!</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffde00">[Sub] ACT 2-3 Nightmare</> /div<span color="#ffffff">擊敗所有獲得地獄之力的惡魔！ </>

Text_English: <span color="#ffffff">The Goal of the Enemy</>
Text_Korean: <span color="#ffffff">森林惡魔的目的</>

Text_English:
What do the demons want?
They can't think for themselves. /page Perhaps they are working for someone.
One way or another, we must find out.
Text_Korean:
惡魔獲得地獄之力的目的是什麼？
尤其是森林怪物不會理性判斷移動。我想看看 /page 是否沒有為其他人移動。
因為他們的目的與我們為之奮鬥的動機有關。

Text_English:
Your battle revealed to me that
the monsters are being controlled. /page The council and Gaius think the same way.
The random attacks are, in fact, coordinated. They have a purpose.
Text_Korean:
我在看你的戰鬥時意識到了這一點。森林中的怪物看似漫無目的的移動，卻是在某種東西的控制下戰鬥。 /pageMagic Council 和 Gaius 的意見是一樣的。
那些認為自己盲目進攻的人是有目的的。
