Text_English:
Do you feel the light weakening?
We sustained high damage from the attack by the darkness. /page It is time for a counterattack.
Purify the areas taken over by the darkness!
Text_Korean:
你能感覺到光的力量越來越弱嗎？
你在黑暗的攻擊中受到了很大的傷害。 /page 現在輪到我們嘗試反擊了。
負責清理被黑暗佔據的冒險區域！

Text_English:
Thanks to you, our counterattack was a success,
but we must always be prepared against the darkness.
Text_Korean:
因為你們的努力，我們的反擊成功了。
但是，請始終為尚未消失的黑暗攻擊做好準備。

Text_English:
The demons are invading us from all sides.
Can you help us fight against these monsters?
Text_Korean:
惡魔不斷地在籠罩世界的黑暗中出沒。
您願意幫助我們每天與他們作戰嗎？

Text_English: Thank you very much. This is a small token of our appreciation.
Text_Korean: 太感謝了。請接受我小小的幫助作為回報。

Text_English:
Words about your might is bringing many challengers to the PvP arena.
Defeat them and become more stronger.
Text_Korean:
關於你實力的謠言正在召集戰士進行一對一的戰鬥。
那些想與你戰鬥的人，與他們競爭以獲得名聲和經驗。

Text_English:
Impressive. There will be many more challenges ahead.
Let us continue until you become the best! I believe in you.
Text_Korean:
它和聽起來一樣棒。許多挑戰等待著未來。
但是，讓我們努力工作，直到我們成為最好的那一天！你可以做到

Text_English:
With your comrades, you can achieve much more than by yourself.
Fight together in a Team Match.
Text_Korean:
通過與同事合作，即使是艱鉅的任務也可以完成。
與在團隊戰鬥中等待您的隊友一起加入。

Text_English: Don't forget: stronger together.
Text_Korean: 別忘記了！我們可以一起克服任何困難...

Text_English:
The fastest way to become stronger
is to fight in a duel match. Don't you want to become stronger?
Text_Korean: 在變得更強大的眾多方法中，提升能力的最快方法是持續玩決鬥模式！你不想快速變強嗎？

Text_English: Your challenge will be epic. I will be cheering for you.
Text_Korean: 你已經開始了一個巨大的挑戰。我們會支持你。

Text_English:
Hero's Tower is in danger.
Protect it from the darkness!
Text_Korean:
光明與黑暗的平衡被打破，英雄塔的結界處於危險之中。
保護黑暗觸手可及的英雄之塔。

Text_English:
Evil is never lazy.
They will always come back again.
Text_Korean:
惡勢力勤勞，似乎是真的。
黑暗將繼續試圖侵占塔，所以我希望你會繼續保護它。

Text_English:
Share your friendship with your comrades.
They will be happy to know that you care.
Text_Korean:
與您的同事分享光明的友誼。
如果將您的恩惠傳遞給他們，您將非常高興。

Text_English:
With friendship comes a new adventure.
It will be a great help to this war.
Text_Korean:
如果我們彼此建立友誼，我們將永遠在一起。
這對保護這個世界有很大幫助。

Text_English:
So many places have fallen because of the darkness.
There is one particular place that I need you to reclaim.
Text_Korean:
比我們想像的更多的地方陷入了黑暗。
特別是，有些地方黑暗盛行。讓我戰勝那裡的黑暗。

Text_English:
You did very well.
Keep it up!
Text_Korean:
確實，您出色地完成了您的使命。
請記住，這不是結束，給我更多的力量。

Text_English:
An item's spirit becomes a flame when it is empowered.
Try leveling up your item.
Text_Korean:
寄宿在裝備中的靈魂，在強化裝備時，會散發出火花。
如果你也想看煙花，何不嘗試升級你的裝備呢？

Text_English: The flame of upgrade is big and beautiful.
Text_Korean: 讓裝備更強大的煙花又大又漂亮。

Text_English:
Two items upgraded to the highest level can be infused.
Through infusion, you can create a much more powerful item. /page If you bring me a maximum of two items, I can show you how it's done.
Text_Korean:
最大程度強化的兩種設備可以組合使用。
通過合成，它重生為更高級別的設備。 /page 如果你帶上兩件強化到極致的裝備，我就給你看看魔法。

Text_English: A new equipment is always wonderful… I think it suits you well.
Text_Korean: 新裝備總是很棒...看起來很適合你。

Text_English:
A heated battle is the best way for a hero to arise.
The Team Match arena is the place where you can find such battle.
Text_Korean:
暴力戰鬥是培養真正英雄的基礎。
大田隊是一個給你那種體驗的地方。來個挑戰怎麼樣？

Text_English: A single win does not make you a hero, but you may become one after many.
Text_Korean: 一場胜利不能成就英雄，但如果你繼續前進，你會沒事的。

Text_English:
Hurry! A Guild Match has begun.
Prepare for battle. Your guild's honor depends on it.
Text_Korean:
你必須快點。公會之間的戰鬥已經開始。
賭上公會的榮譽，請戰鬥。

Text_English: The first step of the best guild starts from your participation.
Text_Korean: 不要忘記，成為最好的公會的第一步是從你參與戰爭開始的。

Text_English:
The demons are collecting gems filled with mysterious powers.
The one that guards the gems can be defeated only through special means. /page You may be able to defeat the guard.
Retrieve the gems and become stronger.
Text_Korean:
據說惡魔們正在收集具有神秘力量的魔法珠寶。
看來，保護它的守望者只能以特殊的方式擊敗它。 /page 你可以打敗守望者。
收回寶石以增加您的力量。

Text_English:
Great! I knew you would succeed.
That gem suits you well.
Text_Korean:
那太棒了。我以為我還是會這樣做。
我認為這顆寶石配得上英雄的力量。

Text_English:
A great darkness is awake.
Countless lives were lost because of it a hundred years ago.
If we cannot retake control, there will be a massacre.
Stop the darkness and bring it back to where it belongs.
Text_Korean:
我感到一個邪惡而巨大的黑暗正在誕生。
這些是一百年前無數犧牲後平息的黑暗。
如果他們不讓他們再次入睡，那將是一場災難。
請用你的勇氣和力量來阻止黑暗的巨大運動。

Text_English: The seal is complete, but that was very close.
Text_Korean: 你剛剛成功封印了它。但你不應該放鬆。

Text_English:
Experience is crucial for winning the war against the darkness.
You would learn much from duel matches.
Text_Korean:
要阻止不斷增長的黑暗勢力，你需要各種戰鬥經驗。
在通過決鬥模式獲得經驗時，您為什麼不開始奔跑呢？

Text_English:
Repeated duels will help you succeed in your adventures.
Prepare yourself every day.
Text_Korean:
反复的挑戰將對未來的冒險有很大的幫助。
我每天都在磨練自己的技能。

Text_English:
A match to find the strongest is taking place.
This is a good chance to see how strong you've become.
Text_Korean:
舉行了一場比賽以確定最強者。這是您測試技能的機會。
看看目前的成就如何？

Text_English:
Whether it is a sweet victory or a bitter loss,
you will find it helpful. Good job.
Text_Korean:
勝利的甜蜜果實或苦澀但經歷過的失敗。
任何事情都會對你有很大幫助。好工作。

Text_English:
Have you heard the legend about the endless tower?
Many heroes are still trying to reach its top floor, /page but no one has ever reached it yet.
I wonder what it's like…
Text_Korean:
你有沒有聽說過一座必須不斷攀登的塔的傳說？
許多冒險家仍在挑戰最後。 /page 但還沒有人弄清楚。
塔的盡頭在哪裡？

Text_English:
Perhaps you will reveal the top floor one day.
If you do, make sure that you tell me what it's like!
Text_Korean:
如果是你，我想總有一天你能揭開塔的盡頭。
如果您知道塔的盡頭是什麼，請告訴我。

Text_English:
Unity among heroes can be a great source of power.
Would you like to test that power?
Text_Korean:
像你們這樣的英雄的團結將使我們比我們的士兵更強大。
有一個考驗團結力量的戰場，何不試試呢？

Text_English:
That was a great challenge. There are many things that determine a team's victory and defeat.
Don't miss the importance of formations and balanced characters.
Text_Korean:
這是一個巨大的挑戰。團隊比賽的輸贏取決於幾個因素。
不要錯過戰略組建管理甚至成員的成長。

Text_English:
It is always a good idea to level up an item.
Before you go to battle, try upgrading your items.
Text_Korean:
你越是精煉和升級你的裝備，你就越能看到光明。
請升級你的裝備，為未來的戰鬥做好準備。

Text_English:
Your upgrades have proven to be very useful. Good work.
But don't feel too comfortable just yet.
Text_Korean:
你升級的裝備會發出漂亮的光芒！你做得很好。
但你不是想使用它，是嗎？

Text_English:
Fully upgraded items can become even more stronger through infusion.
Would you like to see?
Text_Korean:
升級後的裝備可以通過合成轉化為更強大的裝備。
為什麼你感覺不到力量？

Text_English: Can you feel the power of your new equipment? It will turn out to be very useful.
Text_Korean: 感受到新裝備的威力了嗎？它可能對你有很大的幫助。

Text_English:
Loyalty is something that you must keep among your comrades.
Be loyal to who stands next to you.
Text_Korean:
忠誠是一個詞...這是與人交往的規則之一…… .
所以我的意思是……現在我要求我的同志們盡我所能。

Text_English: I hope you always have close comrades.
Text_Korean: 我希望我一直與我的同志們保持密切的關係。

Text_English:
Once you get used to it, a good item reveals its true value.
Would you like to test it against the demons?
Text_Korean:
如果你不斷使用好的設備並習慣它，你會發現隱藏的價值。
為什麼你在與惡魔的戰鬥中感受不到呢？

Text_English:
The owner must know the true value of a powerful item.
Through the battles, you will learn how to communicate with your equipment.
Text_Korean:
強力裝備的真正價值，用在它的主人身上是眾所周知的。
通過不斷的戰鬥與您的設備進行交流會很有幫助。

Text_English:
Phew… It's time for my patrol shift.
You know, I am too weak to fight against a demon. /page Perhaps you can take care of them?
It's not much, but I can give you some reward.
Text_Korean:
呸…是時候進行我當地的定期巡邏了。
如你所知，我很擔心，因為我沒有能力打敗魔鬼。 /page 有能力消滅邪惡的英雄不會這樣做嗎？
即使是士兵的指揮棒，我也會感謝。

Text_English:
I knew you would succeed. I'll probably starve once I give you the reward…
But my life is more important than a single meal. Thank you!
Text_Korean:
我也相信了。如果我給你獎勵，你將不得不餓到明天，但是......
生命更重要，所以請繼續索取。熱熱！

Text_English:
Pathfinder, I would like to see how strong you've become.
Test yourself through challenges and come back to me.
Text_Korean:
光明使者，我想確認一下你的能力。
通過挑戰測試您的技能並告訴我。

Text_English:
It is important to know your true strength.
That way, you can plan ahead.
Text_Korean:
了解自己的能力也是英雄非常重要的能力。
這是因為您需要了解自己的實力來製定策略和目標。

Text_English:
Busy! There are so many things to do when there is a Guild Match.
Didn't you join the match? Go and protect your guild's honor!
Text_Korean:
哦，我很忙！公會之間的權力爭奪變得更加頻繁，因此工作如潮水般湧入。
對了，你不參加戰爭嗎？讓榮譽升騰而至。

Text_English: I take it that the battle was fierce. Well done.
Text_Korean: 看裝備的痕跡，公會戰似乎很激烈。幹得好。

Text_English:
The power of death has returned from slumber.
It must be linked to what is happening now, with the invasion and the darkness. /page This power must return to its prison,
or else, we may not see the dawn.
Text_Korean:
死亡的巨大能量已經從沉睡中甦醒。
這似乎與正在發生的黑暗襲擊無關。 /page 我們必須利用我們迄今為止所開發的所有力量讓強大的敵人重新入睡。
否則，連一絲曙光都不會消失。

Text_English: You are a true hero. Thank you for protecting the light.
Text_Korean: 你的力量和勇氣讓我覺得你是我們的黎明。

Text_English:
Do you know about the magical gems used for item upgrades?
Take them from the demons and become stronger.
Text_Korean:
你知道增強裝備威力的魔法寶石嗎？
讓英雄奪回惡魔正在收集的東西並擁有這種力量。

Text_English:
I can sense the powerful magic from the gems.
Great job. Now, time to become stronger.
Text_Korean:
我能感受到強大到連我這樣的士兵都能感受到的魔力。
你真的很努力。來吧，變得更強大。

Text_English:
Your comrades have called, and they are waiting for your response.
Show them your loyalty.
Text_Korean:
同志的號召，等待您的回應。
顯示您對他們的忠誠度。

Text_English: It is always good to have a trustworthy comrade.
Text_Korean: 你能聽到嗎？同志們的堅強... .你的戰友也會報答你。

Text_English:
Pathfinder, I sense weakness in your equipment.
Why not upgrade them?
Text_Korean:
光明使者，我感覺你裝備的能量很弱。
升級裝備怎麼樣？

Text_English:
When you have time, always try to check your equipment.
Upgrading them will also prove to be extremely helpful.
Text_Korean:
在您負擔得起的情況下檢查您的設備是個好主意。
嘗試使設備更強大的方法也會有很大幫助。

Text_English:
It's time to get a more powerful item by infusing fully upgraded items.
This will prepare you against future enemies.
Text_Korean:
最好是升級和合成設備以製造更強大的設備。
這是為更強大的敵人到來做準備。

Text_English:
Infusion helps you bring out greater power from your item.
It is not easy, but it is definitely worth a try.
Text_Korean:
裝備合成是提升裝備等級的一種方式。
這並不容易，但是如果您想變得更強大，請繼續努力。

Text_English:
A supply route has been cut off by the demons.
Can you help us retake it?
Text_Korean:
惡魔擋住了去路，阻礙了戰鬥中的兵力補給。
您介意為我們的供應鋪平道路嗎？

Text_English: Thanks to you, we could safely send in the supplies. May the angels bless your soul.
Text_Korean: 多虧了您，供應才順利完成。太感謝了。保持良好的工作。

Text_English:
The demons are causing so much damage.
Can you defeat them so that I, I mean, we, could ensure our safety?
Text_Korean:
你的許多盟友都因頻繁的惡魔襲擊而受到傷害。
為了我自己的安全，你介意打敗邪惡嗎？

Text_English: It was a great victory! Thank you for protecting me, I mean, us.
Text_Korean: 這是一個偉大的報復！謝謝你看著我，不是我們。

Text_English:
Before being a blacksmith, I was once a warrior myself.
I am no longer that person, but your battles remind me of the older days. /page The heat of the battle is always ready for those who dare.
You can always find a match.
Text_Korean:
我現在是一名鐵匠，但我也是一名優秀的戰士。
即使我失去了力量，看到你們讓我熱血沸騰。 /page 即使是現在，一場爭奪彼此能力的戰鬥仍在繼續。
你想讓我的血液也熱起來嗎？

Text_English:
I can see how tough the battle was.
Thank you for reminding me.
Text_Korean:
你體內殘留的熱量說明了戰鬥的強度。
它提供了足夠的熱量。謝謝你。

Text_English:
Hero's Tower is being corrupted by the darkness!
Defeat the invading demons and restore the sacred tower!
Text_Korean:
趁著我的弱點，聖域英雄之塔正被黑暗吞沒。
您必須驅除籠罩塔樓的黑暗，並將其恢復為聖地。

Text_English: I need to contain the darkness inside me. Meanwhile, I ask you to protect the tower on my behalf.
Text_Korean: 負責塔的守衛，直到我內心的絕對黑暗消失。

Text_English:
Purification and restoration must take place hand in hand.
Help me with purification. I will work on restoration.
Text_Korean:
黑暗的消滅和世界的淨化只有齊頭並進，才能成功。
我請你根除黑暗。我祈求世界的淨化。

Text_English:
Thanks to you, the darkness is retreating.
I am happy that my prayers for your safe return were answered.
Text_Korean:
看來，黑暗的氣勢也被你的努力給壓碎了。
另一方面，我祈禱你平安歸來。我很高興它完成了。

Text_English:
I feel safe watching you defeat all those demons.
Perhaps you can challenge yourself against many more.
Text_Korean:
看到你這幾天的表現，我就放心了。
我想我可以打敗很多惡魔。試試看怎麼樣？

Text_English:
What a great victory!
Oh, this has nothing to do with my mission. Trust me!
Text_Korean:
我也很尷尬地說這是一個挑戰，因為它是一個完美的成功。
嘿！這真的不是我的工作。請相信我！

Text_English:
It is important to participate in a Team Match.
Trust me. You will understand once you experience it.
Text_Korean:
體驗多對多的戰鬥很重要。相信我的經驗。
嗯？是不是一副可疑的樣子？有了經驗，你就會明白我的意思。

Text_English:
So? Don't you think this would help you in battle?
You knew already? I'm embarrassed.
Text_Korean:
如何？你不認為這種經歷也會幫助你與魔鬼的戰鬥嗎？
你已經知道了嗎？嗯，你有讓我難堪的天賦。

Text_English:
You need insight in a strategic battle.
Sharpen your insight by participating in many Guild Matches.
Text_Korean:
在戰術戰鬥中，洞察力很重要，因此您需要培養這種能力。
你有天賦，所以讓我們通過許多公會戰來培養洞察力。

Text_English:
Your insight has become sharper than ever.
Well done, my friend.
Text_Korean:
怎麼樣你的洞察力不是很有幫助嗎？
無論你贏與否，你都做得很好。

Text_English:
Those mysterious magical gems that the demons are collecting…
I mean those gems that can improve your items... /page If I can study them, they may prove to be very useful.
Can you bring me those gems?
Text_Korean:
惡魔正在收集的神秘魔法寶石。
是的，提高裝備屬性的寶石。 /page 如果你學習了，對你會有很大的幫助。
您不能為我或我們帶來寶石嗎？

Text_English:
Ah… Shiny and clear. What a beautiful rock.
Oh, I almost forgot. Well done, my friend. Well done.
Text_Korean:
吧台，閃閃發光……傑出的...這顆寶石是真的。非常酷
嘿嘿，我對此非常著迷。你真的做得很好。

Text_English:
I don't know how I am going to buy a house like this…
You seem to be doing well. Can you share your secret?
Text_Korean: 很難決定什麼時候存一兩分錢買房…… .想想看，聽說你存錢不錯，不如給我看看？

Text_English:
You made that much already? That's amazing.
I feel that I can to better, too! Thank you.
Text_Korean:
你的意思是你已經籌集了那麼多錢！很神奇，俗話說。
看到你給了我希望。

Text_English:
Can you see my hands shaking? This gold coin… I got this
by collecting copper and then silver, one by one, piece by piece. /page I was so happy to finally have this gold coin.
There is no easy way to be rich. You need to take all of the steps, fair and square.
Text_Korean:
你能看到我顫抖的手嗎... ?這枚金幣是通過從每枚硬幣中收集一分錢並將其兌換成銀幣而獲得的。 /page 我為一枚金幣走了一條艱難的路，但我很高興能拿到它。
致富沒有王道。像我這樣慢慢收集很重要。

Text_English:
Unbelievable! How did you? Never mind.
You have the potential to be rich. I am impressed.
Text_Korean:
不，這太神奇了！如果你曾經做錯什麼... ?不好了。
您有足夠的品質致富。那太棒了。

Text_English: Arc Angel Remiel
Text_Korean: 大天使拉米爾

Text_English: Prophet Miracle
Text_Korean: 奇蹟，人類的先知

Text_English: Lord Commander Gaius
Text_Korean: 總司令蓋烏斯

Text_English: Blacksmith Broch
Text_Korean: 鐵匠壞了

Text_English: Forest Keeper Bella
Text_Korean: 森林守護者貝拉

Text_English: Saint Lady Arin
Text_Korean: 新夫人阿琳

Text_English: Grand Wizard Gratia
Text_Korean: 巫師格拉齊亞

Text_English: Lucci
Text_Korean: 拉米爾的朋友露西

Text_English: Soldier Hunt
Text_Korean: 極樂世界狩獵戰士

Text_English: Angel Daniel
Text_Korean: 天使丹尼爾
團結合作
戰鬥力極限
